28-Year-Old Chef Found Dead at San Francisco Mall
28 岁大厨在旧金山购物中心发现尸体

28 岁 的老厨师在旧金山购物中心发现尸体

the-Year-Old Chef Found Dead at San Francisco Mall
年老的厨师在旧金山购物中心发现尸体
2017-Year-Old Chef Found Dead at San Francisco Mall
2017 - 2017 年老大厨在旧金山购物中心发现尸体
A 28-year-old chef who had recently moved to San Francisco was found dead in the stairwell of a local mall this week.
一位28岁的厨师最近搬到了旧金山,这星期被发现死在一家当地商场的楼梯井里。

The body found at the Westfield Mall Wednesday morning was identified as 28-year-old San Francisco resident Frank Galicia, the San Francisco Medical Examiner's Office said.
旧金山医学检查师办公室说,星期三上午在威斯特菲尔德购物中心发现的尸体被确认为旧金山28岁的居民Frank Galicia。

The San Francisco Police Department said the death was ruled a homicide and an investigation is ongoing.

The San Francisco Police Department said the death was ruled a homicide and an investigation is underway.
旧金山警察局表示,这起死亡案被裁定为杀人案,目前正在进行调查。
The victim's brother, Louis Galicia, told ABC station KGO in San Francisco that Frank, previously a line cook in Boston, had landed his dream job as line chef at San Francisco's Sons & Daughters restaurant six months ago.
受害者的兄弟路易斯?加利西亚(Louis Galicia)对旧金山ABC电视台KGO表示,弗兰克(Frank)曾是波士顿的一家线厨,六个月前在旧金山儿子和女儿餐厅找到了他理想的线厨。

Junior doctors strike : Calls for new industrial action
青少年医生罢工:呼吁采取新的产业行动
Junior doctors strike : Calls for renewed industrial action
青少年医生罢工:呼吁重新采取工业行动
Junior doctors strike : Calls for immediate industrial action
青少年医生罢工:呼吁立即采取工业行动
Junior doctors strike : Calls for more industrial action

Junior doctors strike : Calls for emergency industrial action
青少年医生罢工:紧急产业行动呼吁
Representatives of junior doctors have called on their union to authorise fresh industrial action in their dispute about a new contract.
初级医生的代表们呼吁他们的工会在他们争论新合同时授权新的产业行动。
Representatives of junior doctors have appealed on their union to authorise fresh industrial action in their dispute about a new contract.
初级医生代表呼吁他们的工会在他们争论新合同时授权新的产业行动。
Representatives of junior doctors have asked on their union to authorise fresh industrial action in their dispute about a new contract.
初级医生的代表们要求他们的工会在他们争论新合同时授权新的产业行动。
Representatives of junior doctors have campaigned on their union to authorise fresh industrial action in their dispute about a new contract.
年青医生的代表在他们的工会运动,授权新的产业行动在他们关于新合同的争议。
Representatives of junior doctors have called on their union to authorise new industrial action in their dispute about a new contract.
初级医生的代表们呼吁他们的工会在他们争论新合同时授权新的产业行动。
Representatives of junior doctors have called on their union to authorise renewed industrial action in their dispute about a new contract.
初级医生的代表们呼吁他们的工会在他们争论新合同时授权重新采取工业行动。
The Junior Doctors Committee ( JDC ) of the British Medical Association ( BMA ) is to ask its full council to back more industrial action from early September.
英国医学协会 ( BMA ) 的初级医生委员会 ( JDC ) 要求其全体理事会从九月初开始支持更多的产业行动.
The Junior Doctors Committee ( JDC ) of the British Medical Association ( BMA ) is to ask its full council to back more industrial action from late September.
英国医学会 ( BMA ) 的初级医生委员会 ( JDC ) 要求其全体理事会从九月底开始支持更多的产业行动.
The Junior Doctors Committee ( JDC ) of the British Medical Association ( BMA ) is to ask its whole council to back more industrial action from early September.
英国医学会 ( BMA ) 的初级医生委员会 ( JDC ) 要求其全体委员从九月初开始支持更多的产业行动.
The Junior Doctors Committee ( JDC ) of the British Medical Association ( BMA ) is to ask its general council to back more industrial action from early September.
英国医学协会 ( BMA ) 的初级医生委员会 ( JDC ) 要求其总理事会从九月初开始支持更多的工业行动.
The Junior Doctors Committee ( JDC ) of the British Medical Association ( BMA ) is to ask its wider council to back more industrial action from early September.
英国医学协会 ( BMA ) 的 初级医生委员会 ( JDC ) 要求其更广泛的理事会从九月初开始支持更多的产业行动.
The Junior Doctors Committee ( JDC ) of the British Medical Association ( BMA ) is to ask its full council to back additional industrial action from early September.
英国医学会 ( BMA ) 的初级医生委员会 ( JDC ) 要求其全体理事会支持9月初开始的更多产业行动.

Biles has spent the last three years dominating her sport, winning 15 world championship medals-including 10 gold-with routines so astonishing in their mix of ambition and precision that 1984 Olympic champion Mary Lou Retton called her " the greatest gymnast I've ever seen. "
在过去的三年里,Biles主宰了自己的运动,赢得了15枚世界冠军奖牌,其中包括10枚金牌,其雄心壮志和精准的组合令人惊讶,1984年奥运会冠军MaryLouRetton称她为“我见过的最伟大的体操运动员”。

At my organizations, we have provided free and low-cost gymnastics, based in Harlem, for over 15, 000 urban youth ( primarily black and Hispanic ) and have trained national and international champions.
在我的组织里,我们为1万5千多名城市青年(主要是黑人和拉丁裔青年)提供了设在哈莱姆的低成本免费体操,并培训了本国和国际的冠军。

青年医生拒绝了史蒂夫·亨特的提议,准备进一步罢工
Ministers had hoped to end the dispute over the changes by agreeing to a reformed contract with British Medical Association officials, but 58 per cent of the 37, 000 junior doctors who took part in a ballot had rejected it.
部长们曾希望与英国医疗协会官员商定一项经过改革的合同,从而结束在改革问题上的争议,但在参加投票的37 000名初级医生中,有58%的人拒绝了这一协议。
Ministers had hoped to end the dispute over the changes by agreeing to a reformed contract with British Medical Association officials, but 57 per cent of the 37, 000 junior doctors who took part in a ballot had rejected it.

Ministers had hoped to end the dispute over the changes by agreeing to a reformed contract with British Medical Association officials, but 59 per cent of the 37, 000 junior doctors who took part in a ballot had rejected it.

Ministers had hoped to end the dispute over the changes by agreeing to a reformed contract with British Medical Association officials, but 56 per cent of the 37, 000 junior doctors who took part in a ballot had rejected it.

Ministers had hoped to end the dispute over the changes by agreeing to a reformed contract with British Medical Association officials, but 51 per cent of the 37, 000 junior doctors who took part in a ballot had rejected it.
部长们曾希望与英国医疗协会官员商定一项经过改革的合同,从而结束在改革问题上的争议,但在参加投票的37 000名初级医生中,有51%的人拒绝了这一协议。
In July, Mr Hunt revealed plans to impose the contract saying the NHS was in " no man's land " and any further delay would be damaging for staff and patients.
7月,亨特透露了强制签订这份合同的计划,称NHS位于“无人之地”,任何进一步拖延都将对员工和病人造成伤害。
In July, Mr Hunt revealed plans to impose the contract claiming the NHS was in " no man's land " and any further delay would be damaging for staff and patients.
7月,亨特透露了强制签订合同的计划,声称国民保健服务处在"无人之地",任何进一步拖延都将对工作人员和病人造成伤害。
In July, Mr Hunt revealed plans to impose the contract stating the NHS was in " no man's land " and any further delay would be damaging for staff and patients.
7月,亨特透露了强制签定NHS位于“无人之地”的合同的计划,任何进一步拖延都将损害员工和病人。
The first junior doctors are moved onto the new contract, which includes changes to overnight and weekend working practices to improve care at unsociable hours.
第一位初级医生被转到新的合同中,其中包括改变夜间和周末的工作习惯,以便在无法联系的时间内改善护理。
The first junior doctors are moved onto the new contract, which includes changes to overnight and weekend working practices to provide care at unsociable hours.

新来的初级医生将签下新合同,包括改变夜间和周末的工作习惯,以便在无法联系的时间内改善护理。
The first junior doctors are moved onto the new contract, which includes changes to night and weekend working practices to improve care at unsociable hours.

The first junior doctors are moved onto the new contract, which includes changes to afternoon and weekend working practices to improve care at unsociable hours.
第一位初级医生被转到新的合同中,其中包括改变下午和周末的工作习惯,以便在无法联系的时间内改善护理。
The first junior doctors are moved onto the new contract, which includes changes to evening and weekend working practices to improve care at unsociable hours.
第一位初级医生被转到新的合同中,其中包括改变晚上和周末的工作习惯,以便在无法联系的时间内改善护理。
Dr Ellen McCourt, the BMA's junior doctors " committee chair, said in a statement last night : " Junior doctors still have serious concerns about the proposed contract, particularly that it will fuel the current workforce crisis, and that it fails to treat all doctors fairly. "
英国医学协会的初级医生委员会主席艾伦·麦考特医生昨晚在一份声明中说:“初级医生仍然对拟议合同有严重的担忧,特别是这会加剧目前的员工危机,并且不能公正地对待所有医生。”
Dr Ann McCourt, the BMA's junior doctors " committee chair, said in a statement last night : " Junior doctors still have serious concerns about the proposed contract, particularly that it will fuel the current workforce crisis, and that it fails to treat all doctors fairly. "
英国医学协会的初级医生委员会主席安·麦考特医生昨晚在一份声明中说:“初级医生仍然对拟议合同有严重的担忧,特别是这会加剧目前的员工危机,并且不能公正地对待所有医生。”
Dr Anne McCourt, the BMA's junior doctors " committee chair, said in a statement last night : " Junior doctors still have serious concerns about the proposed contract, particularly that it will fuel the current workforce crisis, and that it fails to treat all doctors fairly. "
英国医学协会的初级医生委员会主席安妮·麦考特医生在昨晚的一份声明中说:“初级医生仍然对拟议合同有严重的担忧,特别是这会加剧目前的员工危机,并且不能公正地对待所有医生。”
Dr Helen McCourt, the BMA's junior doctors " committee chair, said in a statement last night : " Junior doctors still have serious concerns about the proposed contract, particularly that it will fuel the current workforce crisis, and that it fails to treat all doctors fairly. "
英国医学协会的初级医生委员会主席海伦·麦考特医生昨晚在一份声明中说:“初级医生仍然对拟议合同有严重的担忧,特别是这会加剧目前的员工危机,并且不能公正地对待所有医生。”
Dr Mary McCourt, the BMA's junior doctors " committee chair, said in a statement last night : " Junior doctors still have serious concerns about the proposed contract, particularly that it will fuel the current workforce crisis, and that it fails to treat all doctors fairly. "
英国医学协会的初级医生委员会主席MaryMcCourter医生在昨晚的一份声明中说:“初级医生仍然对拟议合同有严重的担忧,特别是这会加剧目前的员工危机,并且不能公正地对待所有医生。”
Dr Anna McCourt, the BMA's junior doctors " committee chair, said in a statement last night : " Junior doctors still have serious concerns about the proposed contract, particularly that it will fuel the current workforce crisis, and that it fails to treat all doctors fairly. "
英国医学协会的初级医生委员会主席安娜·麦考特医生在昨晚的一份声明中说:“初级医生仍然对拟议合同有严重的担忧,特别是这会加剧目前的员工危机,而且它不能公正地对待所有的医生。”
With just eight weeks before the first group of doctors are moved onto the new contract, progress needs to be made and time is running out.
在第一批医生签约前只有8周,需要取得进展,时间已经不多了。

军事事务局努力通过会谈解决争端,但遭到政府不愿介入,有时还发出震耳欲聋的沉默。

The last strike at the end of April saw the postponement of nearly 13, 000 routine operations and 100, 000 appointments as nurses and consultants were drafted in to provide cover for doctors on the picket line.
4月底的最后一次罢工推迟了近13 000次例行手术,并安排了100 000名护士和顾问,为警戒线上的医生提供掩护。
The last strike at the end of April saw the postponement of nearly 13, 000 routine operations and 100, 000 appointments as nurses and specialists were drafted in to provide cover for doctors on the picket line.
4月底的最后一次罢工推迟了近13 000次例行手术,并征集了100 000名护士和专家,为警戒线上的医生提供掩护。

部长们曾期望与英国医疗协会官员商定一项经过改革的合同,从而结束在改革问题上的争执。
The BMA wants better weekend pay for the 54, 000 junior doctors who would be subject of the contract.
英国医学协会希望向5万4千名初级医生支付更高的周末工资,这些医生是合同的主体。
The BMA wants better weekend pay for the 54, 000 junior doctors who would be part of the contract.

The BMA wants better evening pay for the 54, 000 junior doctors who would be subject of the contract.

The BMA wants better night pay for the 54, 000 junior doctors who would be subject of the contract.
BMA希望,5万4千名初级医生的夜间报酬会更好,他们将接受合同的约束。
The BMA wants better holiday pay for the 54, 000 junior doctors who would be subject of the contract.
医管局希望,5万4千名受合约约束的初级医生得到更高的假日工资。
Daniel Mortimer, chief executive of NHS Employers, called on junior doctors not to go ahead with any strikes.
NHS雇主首席执行官丹尼尔·莫蒂默呼吁初级医生不要进行任何罢工。

Mr Mortimer said : " Industrial action achieves little or nothing, but places pressure on already stretched teams and services and causes worry, distress and disruption for patients, carers and their families. "

Over the last two months we have been talking with the Junior Doctors Committee and have, along with the Department of Health and others, responded positively to their concerns regarding the Guardian Role and Whistleblowing.
在过去两个月里,我们一直与初级医生委员会对话,并与卫生部和其他方面一道,积极回应他们对监护人角色和惠斯布劳的担忧。

Over the last two months we have been working with the Junior Doctors Committee and have, along with the Department of Health and others, responded positively to their concerns regarding the Guardian Role and Whistleblowing.
在过去两个月里,我们一直与初级医生委员会合作,并与卫生部和其他方面一道,积极回应他们对监护人角色和惠斯布劳的担忧。
Over the last two months we have been meetings with the Junior Doctors Committee and have, along with the Department of Health and others, responded positively to their concerns regarding the Guardian Role and Whistleblowing.
在过去两个月中,我们与初级医生委员会举行了会议,并与卫生部和其他方面一道,积极回应了他们对监护人角色和惠斯布劳的担忧。
Employers were hopeful that the continued positive engagement on other important topics-such as deployment, flexibility in training, additional training for those returning from career breaks, costs of training, mutual recognition of syllabus, study leave and the gender pay gap in medicine-were a sign of how serious employers, Health Education England and the Department of Health were about honouring the agreements reached with the BMA in November, February and May.
雇主希望,在其他重要议题上,如部署、培训的灵活性、对从职业生涯中断返回的人员的额外培训、培训费用、对教学大纲的相互承认、学习假和医学中的性别薪酬差距等,继续积极参与,这标志着雇主、英国卫生教育局和卫生部如何认真履行在11月、2月和5月与巴林环境部达成的协议。
Employers were hopeful that the continued positive engagement on other important topics-such as deployment, mobility in training, additional training for those returning from career breaks, costs of training, mutual recognition of syllabus, study leave and the gender pay gap in medicine-were a sign of how serious employers, Health Education England and the Department of Health were about honouring the agreements reached with the BMA in November, February and May.
雇主希望,在其他重要议题上,如部署、培训中的流动性、为那些从职业生涯中断中返回的人提供的额外培训、培训费用、对教学大纲的相互承认、学习假和医学中的性别薪酬差距等,能够表明雇主、英国卫生教育局和卫生部如何认真履行在11月、2月和5月与巴林环境部达成的协议。
Employers were hopeful that the continued positive engagement on other critical topics-such as deployment, flexibility in training, additional training for those returning from career breaks, costs of training, mutual recognition of syllabus, study leave and the gender pay gap in medicine-were a sign of how serious employers, Health Education England and the Department of Health were about honouring the agreements reached with the BMA in November, February and May.

Employers were hopeful that the continued positive engagement on other relevant topics-such as deployment, flexibility in training, additional training for those returning from career breaks, costs of training, mutual recognition of syllabus, study leave and the gender pay gap in medicine-were a sign of how serious employers, Health Education England and the Department of Health were about honouring the agreements reached with the BMA in November, February and May.

Employers were hopeful that the continued positive engagement on other key topics-such as deployment, flexibility in training, additional training for those returning from career breaks, costs of training, mutual recognition of syllabus, study leave and the gender pay gap in medicine-were a sign of how serious employers, Health Education England and the Department of Health were about honouring the agreements reached with the BMA in November, February and May.

Thousands of heart attack patients are to benefit from a £2-a-day drug, after officials recommended it be given to more people for longer.
数千名心脏病发作的病人将受益于每天2英镑的药物,此前,官员建议将这种药物长期提供给更多人。

Anti-clotting drug ticagrelor slashes the risk of repeat attacks for people with heart disease.
抗淋巴结瘾药物会使心脏病患者再次发作的风险降低。
Anti-clotting drug ticagrelor slashes the chance of repeat attacks for people with heart disease.
抗淋巴结瘾药物使心脏病患者再次发作的几率下降。
Anti-clotting drug ticagrelor slashes the likelihood of repeat attacks for people with heart disease.
抗淋巴结瘾药物对心脏病患者重复发作的可能性大打折扣。
Anti-clotting drug ticagrelor slashes the risk of repeated attacks for people with heart disease.
抗淋巴结瘾药物会降低心脏病患者反复发作的风险。
The drug is already given for 12 months after a heart attack, reducing the risk of a stroke or another attack.
这种药物在心脏病发作12个月后就已经服用,可以降低中风或再次发作的风险。
The drug is already given for 12 months after a heart attack, reducing the chance of a stroke or another attack.
心脏病发作12个月后,这种药物就已经注射了,从而降低了中风或再次发作的几率。
The drug is already given for 12 weeks after a heart attack, reducing the risk of a stroke or another attack.
这种药物在心脏病发作12周后就已经服用,可以降低中风或再次发作的风险。
The drug is already given for twelve months after a heart attack, reducing the risk of a stroke or another attack.
这种药物在心脏病发作12个月后就已经服用,可以降低中风或再次发作的风险。
NHS watchdog NICE has advised that it should be given to people for four years, to further reduce the risk of cardiovascular problems.
NHS监督机构NICE建议,应该给予人们四年时间,以进一步降低患心血管疾病的风险。
NHS watchdog NICE has advised that it should be given to people for 4 years, to further reduce the risk of cardiovascular problems.
NHS监督机构NICE建议,应该给予人们4年时间,以进一步降低患心血管疾病的风险。
But now NHS watchdog NICE has advised that it should be given to people for four years, to further reduce the risk of cardiovascular problems.
但是现在NHS的NICE已经建议,这应该给予人们四年,以进一步降低患心血管疾病的风险。
But now NHS watchdog NICE has advised that it should be given to people for 4 years, to further reduce the risk of cardiovascular problems.
但现在NHS的NICE已经建议,应该给予人们4年的时间,以进一步降低患心血管疾病的风险。
Some 140, 000 people have a heart attack in England every year, and a quarter of these go on to have another attack or a stroke.
在英国,每年大约有14万人心脏病发作,其中四分之一的人会再次发作或中风。

Heart attacks and strokes are caused by the build-up of fatty material in artery walls to form a plaque.
心脏病发作和中风是由动脉壁脂肪物质积聚而形成斑块引起的。

Heart attacks and strokes are described by the build-up of fatty material in artery walls to form a plaque.
心跳和中风的描述是通过在动脉壁上堆积脂肪材料形成斑块。
Heart attacks and strokes are causes by the build-up of fatty material in artery walls to form a plaque.
心脏病发作和中风是由动脉壁脂肪物质积聚而形成斑块引起的。
If the plaque breaks apart it can cause a blood clot, blocking blood to the heart causing a heart attack.
如果斑块断裂,可引起血块,阻塞心脏的血液,导致心脏病发作。

of the plaque breaks apart it can cause a blood clot, blocking blood to the heart causing a heart attack.

And if the clot dislodges it can travel in the blood stream and block blood flow to the brain, causing a stroke.
如果血块脱落,血流会传播到血流中,阻塞脑部的血流,导致中风。
And if the clot dislodges it may travel in the blood stream and block blood flow to the brain, causing a stroke.
如果血块脱落,血流可能流到血流中,阻塞流向大脑的血液,导致中风。

今天公布的《内酯指导文件草案》建议,人们12个月给90毫克血糖,此后三年内每天两次给90毫克血糖加阿司匹林加60毫克。

"

Because information on the efficacy and safety of ticagrelor-particularly the risk of bleeding-beyond three years is limited, the draft guidance does not recommend treatment with it beyond that period.
由于关于ticagrel药疗效和安全性(特别是出血风险超过3年)的信息有限,指南草案不建议在该时期以后再用它治疗。

A culture of political correctness has led to a blind eye being turned to widespread voting fraud in Muslim communities, a devastating government report reveals today.

The former communities secretary, now the anti-corruption tsar, said the intimidation of voters on religious grounds was so bad that police should be allowed to put cordons outside polling stations to protect frightened voters.

The report even suggests putting indelible ink on a person's fingers as they cast their ballot to prevent anyone being able to vote twice.
报告甚至建议,在投票时,在人的手指上涂上不可磨灭的墨水,以防止任何人能投票两次。

" This is not solely to protect against electoral fraud, but to protect local government from the broader culture of corruption and financial fraud that goes hand in hand with it, " he said.
他说:“这不仅是为了防范选举舞弊,也是为了保护地方政府免受腐败和金融舞弊的风气的冲击。”
" This is not solely to protect against electoral fraud, but to protect local government from the broader culture of corruption and financial fraud that goes hand in side with it, " he said.

" It is not solely to protect against electoral fraud, but to protect local government from the broader culture of corruption and financial fraud that goes hand in hand with it, " he said.

Sir Eric made 50 recommendations to clean up the system, including banning political activists from handling postal ballot papers to stop " vote harvesting. "
埃里克爵士提出了50项建议来清理这个系统,包括禁止政治活动人士处理邮递选票以停止“收割选票”。
Sir Eric made 60 recommendations to clean up the system, including banning political activists from handling postal ballot papers to stop " vote harvesting. "

The report, being considered by Theresa May, also calls for tougher checks on registration to prevent the electoral register being used for immigration and benefit fraud.
特雷萨·梅正在审议该报告,该报告还呼吁对选民登记进行更严格的检查,以防止选举登记册被用于移民和利益欺诈。

5月总理正在审议该报告,该报告还呼吁对选民登记进行更严格的检查,以防止选举登记册被用于移民和利益欺诈。
The report, being considered by Leader May, also calls for tougher checks on registration to prevent the electoral register being used for immigration and benefit fraud.

A French court has rejected a bid by Calais authorities to demolish dozens of makeshift shops and restaurants in the Jungle camp where thousands of refugees are living.
一家法国法院拒绝了加来当局提出的拆除丛林难民营内成千上万难民居住的几十间临时商店和餐馆的投标。
A French court has rejected a bid by Calais authorities to demolish tens of makeshift shops and restaurants in the Jungle camp where thousands of refugees are living.
一家法国法院拒绝了加来当局提出的拆除丛林难民营内成千上万难民居住的数十间临时商店和餐馆的投标。
A French court has rejected a bid by Calais authorities to demolish hundreds of makeshift shops and restaurants in the Jungle camp where thousands of refugees are living.
一家法国法院拒绝了加来州当局提出的拆除丛林营地数百间临时商店和餐馆的要求,那里有数千名难民居住。
A French court has rejected a bid by Calais authorities to demolish dozen of makeshift shops and restaurants in the Jungle camp where thousands of refugees are living.
一家法国法院拒绝了加来当局提出的拆除丛林难民营内成千上万难民居住的十几家临时商店和餐馆的要求。
A French court has rejected a bid by Calais authorities to demolish eight of makeshift shops and restaurants in the Jungle camp where thousands of refugees are living.
一家法国法院拒绝了加来当局提出的拆除丛林营内8个临时商店和餐馆的要求,那里有数千名难民居住。
A French court has rejected a bid by Calais authorities to demolish several of makeshift shops and restaurants in the Jungle camp where thousands of refugees are living.
一家法国法院拒绝了加来当局提出的拆除丛林营内几家临时商店和餐馆的要求,那里有数千名难民居住。
At a court hearing this week, Calais authorities had argued the state should be able to knock down a total of 72 makeshift shops where people inside the camp sell goods, from cigarettes to energy drinks, offer haircuts, or sell tea for 50 cents ( 40p ) or basic meals for a few euros in makeshift restaurants.
在本周的法院听证会上,加莱州当局称,国家应当能够淘汰营地内共72家临时商店,在这些商店里,人们出售商品,从香烟到能量饮料,提供发型,或以50美分的价格(40便士)卖茶叶,或在临时餐馆里卖几分钱的基本膳食。
At a court hearing this week, Calais authorities had argued the state should be able to knock down a total of 72 makeshift shops where people inside the camps sell goods, from cigarettes to energy drinks, offer haircuts, or sell tea for 50 cents ( 40p ) or basic meals for a few euros in makeshift restaurants.
在本周的法院听证会上,加莱州当局称,国家应该能够淘汰营地内人们出售商品的72家临时商店,从香烟到能量饮料,提供50美分(40便士)的发型,或在临时餐馆里出售茶叶或几间欧圆基本餐具。
At a court hearing this week, Calais authorities had claimed the state should be able to knock down a total of 72 makeshift shops where people inside the camp sell goods, from cigarettes to energy drinks, offer haircuts, or sell tea for 50 cents ( 40p ) or basic meals for a few euros in makeshift restaurants.
在本周的法院听证会上,加来州当局宣称,国家应当能够淘汰营地内共72家临时商店,在这些商店里,人们出售商品,从香烟到能量饮料,提供发型,或以50美分的价格(40便士)卖茶叶,或在临时餐馆里卖几分钱的基本膳食。
At a court hearing this week, Calais authorities had said the state should be able to knock down a total of 72 makeshift shops where people inside the camp sell goods, from cigarettes to energy drinks, offer haircuts, or sell tea for 50 cents ( 40p ) or basic meals for a few euros in makeshift restaurants.
在本周的法院听证会上,加莱州当局表示,国家应该能够淘汰营地内共72家临时商店,在这些商店里,人们出售商品,从香烟到能量饮料,提供发型,或以50美分的价格(40便士)卖茶叶,或在临时餐馆里卖几分钱的基本膳食。
At a court hearing this week, Calais authorities had stated the state should be able to knock down a total of 72 makeshift shops where people inside the camp sell goods, from cigarettes to energy drinks, offer haircuts, or sell tea for 50 cents ( 40p ) or basic meals for a few euros in makeshift restaurants.
在本周的法院听证会上,加莱州当局表示,国家应该能够淘汰营地内共72家临时商店,这些商店出售商品,从香烟到能量饮料,提供50美分(40便士)的理发服务,或在临时餐馆里出售茶叶或几道欧式基本餐。
At a court hearing this week, Calais authorities had protested the state should be able to knock down a total of 72 makeshift shops where people inside the camp sell goods, from cigarettes to energy drinks, offer haircuts, or sell tea for 50 cents ( 40p ) or basic meals for a few euros in makeshift restaurants.
在本周的法院听证会上,加莱州当局曾抗议说,国家应当能够淘汰营地内共72家临时商店,在这些商店里,人们出售商品,从香烟到能量饮料,提供发型,或以50美分的价格(40便士)卖茶叶,或在临时餐馆里卖几口欧的早餐。
The Calais prefect's office argued the places should be demolished because they represented a parallel economy that did not pay tax, and because they carried fire and sanitation risks.
加莱省省长办公室认为,这些地方应该拆除,因为它们代表着一种不纳税的平行经济,还因为它们带来了火灾和卫生风险。
The Calais prefect's office argued the places should be demolished because they represented a parallel economy that did not pay tax, and because they carried fire and sanitation risk.
加莱省省长办公室认为,这些地方应该拆除,因为它们代表着一种不纳税的平行经济,还因为它们带来了火灾和卫生风险。
The Calais prefect's office argued the places should be demolished because they represented a parallel economy that did not pay tax, and because they carried fire or sanitation risks.
加莱省省长办公室认为,应当拆毁这些场所,因为它们代表着一种不纳税的平行经济,还因为它们带有火灾或卫生风险。
Humanitarian groups had told the court the shops and restaurants were vital, saying the free meals offered by a state-backed association and other groups did not provide enough food for the growing numbers at the camp.
人道主义 团体 告诉 法庭, 商店 和 餐馆 十分 重要, 他们 说, 一 个 国家 支持 的 协会 和 其他 团体 免费 提供 的 食物 不足 以 供 难民营 内 人数 日增 的 人 食用 。
Humanitarian groups had told the court the shops and restaurants were essential, saying the free meals offered by a state-backed association and other groups did not provide enough food for the growing numbers at the camp.
人道主义 团体 告诉 法庭, 商店 和 餐馆 是 必不可少 的, 他们 说, 一 个 国家 支持 的 协会 和 其他 团体 免费 提供 的 伙食, 不足 以 供 难民营 内 人数 日增 的 人 食用 。
Humanitarian groups had told the court the shops and restaurants were crucial, saying the free meals offered by a state-backed association and other groups did not provide enough food for the growing numbers at the camp.
人道主义 团体 告诉 法庭 说, 商店 和 餐馆 是 关键 的, 他们 说, 一 个 国家 支持 的 协会 和 其他 团体 免费 提供 的 伙食 没有 提供 足够 的 食物, 使 难民营 中 的 人数 不断 增加 。
Humanitarian groups had told the court the shops and restaurants were important, saying the free meals offered by a state-backed association and other groups did not provide enough food for the growing numbers at the camp.
人道主义 团体 告诉 法庭, 商店 和 餐馆 是 重要 的, 他们 说, 一 个 国家 支持 的 协会 和 其他 团体 免费 提供 的 伙食, 不足 以 供 难民营 内 人数 日增 的 人 食用 。
Humanitarian groups had told the court the shops and restaurants were necessary, saying the free meals offered by a state-backed association and other groups did not provide enough food for the growing numbers at the camp.
人道主义 团体 告诉 法庭 说, 商店 和 餐馆 是 必要 的, 他们 说, 一 个 国家 支持 的 协会 和 其他 团体 免费 提供 的 伙食, 不足 以 供 难民营 内 人数 日增 的 人 食用 。
Humanitarian groups had told the court the shops and restaurants were valuable, saying the free meals offered by a state-backed association and other groups did not provide enough food for the growing numbers at the camp.
人道主义 团体 告诉 法庭, 商店 和 餐馆 很有 价值, 他们 说, 一 个 国家 支持 的 协会 和 其他 团体 免费 提供 的 伙食 没有 提供 足够 的 食物 供 难民营 中 人数 日增 的 人 食用 。
They argued the makeshift shops and restaurants often provided shelter and free meals to those in need.
他们认为临时商店和餐馆常常为有需要的人提供住所和免费膳食。
They argued the makeshift shops and restaurants often provided shelter or free meals to those in need.
他们认为临时商店和餐馆常常为有需要的人提供住所或免费膳食。
They argued the makeshift shops and restaurants often provided shelter and free food to those in need.

They argued The makeshift shops and restaurants often provided shelter and free meals to those in need.
他们认为临时商店和餐馆经常为有需要的人提供住所和免费膳食。
They argued were makeshift shops and restaurants often provided shelter and free meals to those in need.
他们认为是临时商店,餐馆经常为有需要的人提供住所和免费膳食。
They argued was makeshift shops and restaurants often provided shelter and free meals to those in need.
他们认为是临时商店和餐馆,经常为有需要的人提供住所和免费膳食。
A Lille court ruled there was no legal basis for expelling the people running the 72 makeshift shops, but said the Calais prefect's concerns " were totally understandable. "
里尔的一家法院裁定,驱逐72家临时商店的老板没有法律依据,但是他说,加来州长的担忧是完全可以理解的。
A Lille court ruled there was no legal basis for expelling the people running the 29 makeshift shops, but said the Calais prefect's concerns " were totally understandable. "
里尔的一家法院裁定,驱逐经营这29家临时商店的人没有法律依据,但是他说,加来州州长的担忧是完全可以理解的。
A Lille court ruled there was no legal basis for expelling the people running the 27 makeshift shops, but said the Calais prefect's concerns " were totally understandable. "
里尔的一家法院裁定,驱逐经营这27家临时商店的人没有法律依据,但表示加来州州长的担忧是完全可以理解的。
A Lille court ruled there was no legal basis for expelling the people running the 11 makeshift shops, but said the Calais prefect's concerns " were totally understandable. "
里尔的一家法院裁定,驱逐经营这11家临时商店的人没有法律依据,但表示加来州州长的担忧是完全可以理解的。
A Lille court ruled there was no legal basis for expelling the people running the three makeshift shops, but said the Calais prefect's concerns " were totally understandable. "
里尔的一家法院裁定,驱逐经营三家临时商店的人没有法律依据,但表示加来州州长的担忧“完全可以理解”。
A Lille court ruled there was no legal basis for expelling the people running the two makeshift shops, but said the Calais prefect's concerns " were totally understandable. "
里尔法庭裁定,驱逐两家临时商店的营业员没有法律依据,但表示加来省长的担忧“完全可以理解”。
He said the spaces provided calm meeting points between refugees and volunteers.
他说,这些空间为难民和志愿者提供了平静的交汇点。
He said the spaces provided calm meeting points between refugees and activists.

He said the spaces provided calm meeting points between refugees and Volunteers.
他说,这些空间为难民和义工提供了平静的交汇点。
He said the spaces provided quiet meeting points between refugees and volunteers.
他说,这些空间为难民和志愿者提供了安静的会聚点。
One of the places that had been under threat from demolition was the camp's Jungle Book Kids " Cafe which is run not-for-profit and provides 200 meals a day, English and French classes, and asylum advice for the hundreds of vulnerable unaccompanied minors in the camp.
受到破坏威胁的地方之一是营地的丛林书儿童咖啡屋,该咖啡屋是非营利性的,每天提供200顿饭,开设英语和法语课程,并为难民营中数百名易受伤害的孤身未成年人提供庇护建议。
One of the places that had been under threat from demolition was the camp's Jungle Books Kids " Cafe which is run not-for-profit and provides 200 meals a day, English and French classes, and asylum advice for the hundreds of vulnerable unaccompanied minors in the camp.
受到破坏威胁的地方之一是营地丛林书儿童咖啡屋,该咖啡屋是非营利性的,每天提供200顿饭,开设英语和法语课程,并为难民营中数百名易受伤害的孤身未成年人提供庇护建议。
One of the places that had been under threat from demolition was the camp's Jungle book Kids " Cafe which is run not-for-profit and provides 200 meals a day, English and French classes, and asylum advice for the hundreds of vulnerable unaccompanied minors in the camp.

A letter sent to the Guardian said its closure " would be a catastrophe for these children, some of whom are as young as eight. "
一封写给《卫报》的信中说,封杀这些孩子“将是一场灾难,他们中有一些只有八岁。”
A letter sent to the Guardian warned its closure " would be a catastrophe for these children, some of whom are as young as eight. "

一封写给卫报的信宣布关闭,“对于这些孩子来说,这将是一场灾难,他们中有一些只有八岁。”
Two charities, Help Refugees and L'Auberge des Migrants, on Friday estimated that numbers in the Jungle camp have risen to over 9, 000 people-the highest ever-after a steep increase in arrivals during the summer.
上周五,援助难民组织和移民协会(L'Auberge des Guigrants)估计,丛林难民营的人数已经上升至9000人以上,是夏季抵达人数急剧增长之后人数最多的一次。
Two charities, Help Refugees and L'Auberge aux Migrants, on Friday estimated that numbers in the Jungle camp have risen to over 9, 000 people-the highest ever-after a steep increase in arrivals during the summer.
上周五,两个名为“帮助难民”的慈善机构和L'Auberge aughe Guigrants表示,丛林营地的人数已经上升至9000人以上,是夏季抵达人数急剧增长之后人数最多的一次。
Two charities, Help Refugees and L'Auberge les Migrants, on Friday estimated that numbers in the Jungle camp have risen to over 9, 000 people-the highest ever-after a steep increase in arrivals during the summer.
上周五,两个名为“帮助难民”和“移民”的慈善机构估计,丛林营地的人数已经上升至9000人以上,是夏季来临时急剧增加以来人数最多的一次。
Two charities, Help Refugees and L'Auberge des Migrants, on Friday estimated that numbers in the Jungle camp have risen to over 9, 000 people-the high ever-after a steep increase in arrivals during the summer.
上周五,援助难民组织和移民协会(L'Auberge des Guigrants)估计,丛林难民营的人数已经上升至9000人以上,是夏季抵达人数剧增之后人数最多的一年。

当她担心学费时,共青团县委会于8月9日向她提供了5000元的补贴。

Recently, the related county government department has provided a subsidy totaled 2. 838 million yuan to over 690 poverty-stricken college students.
近日,国家有关部门共向690多名贫困大学生提供了28.38亿元的助学金。
Recently, the related county government department has provided a subsidy totaled 2. 838 million yuan for over 690 poverty-stricken college students.
近日,国家有关部门共对690余名贫困大学生提供了28.38亿元的补助。
It also organized social fund-raising for students who are extremely poor in financial status to help them accomplish their study.
基金会还为经济情况极其差的学生组织社会筹款活动,帮助他们完成学业。

" I thought my elder brother and I cannot afford the college study after my father passed away. It never occurred to me before the county government helped us so timely. " She said gratefully.
父亲去世后,我和我哥哥都负担不起大学的学费。在县政府这么及时地帮我们之前,我从未想到过。她感激地说。

According to the Xinhua news agency, Australia's New South Wales government announced on the 11th day of the month that it will spend 200 million Australian dollars ( about 154 million US dollars ) to launch the biggest renovation on the famous Sydney Opera House since its establishment.

The Sydney Opera House is one of Sydney's landmark buildings, designed by Danish architect Jorn Utzon and built in 1973. It welcomes about 8 million visitors each year.

Non-permanent residents who have lived in Beijing for more than six months and have a stable and legal employment or accommodation or conditions for continuous schooling in Beijing can apply for a residence permit.
在北京居住六个月以上的非永久性居民,在北京有稳定合法的工作或者住宿条件或者继续教育条件的,可以申请居留证。
Non-permanent residents who have lived in Beijing for longer than six months and have a stable and legal employment or accommodation or conditions for continuous schooling in Beijing can apply for a residence permit.
在北京居住满六个月,在北京有稳定合法就业或者住宿条件或者继续教育条件的非永久性居民,可以申请居留证。

of-permanent residents who have lived in Beijing for more than six months and have a stable and legal employment or accommodation or conditions for continuous schooling in Beijing can apply for a residence permit.

to-permanent residents who have lived in Beijing for more than six months and have a stable and legal employment or accommodation or conditions for continuous schooling in Beijing can apply for a residence permit.
在北京居住满六个月,在北京有稳定合法工作或者住宿条件或者继续教育条件的永久居民,可以申请居留证。
Recently, the launch of implementation details of " Residence Permit Provisional Regulations " indicates that the " temporary residence permit " will be upgraded to " residence permit ".
最近,《居住证暂行条例》的实施细节的出台表明,"临时居住证"将升级为"居住证"。

Recently, the release of implementation details of " Residence Permit Provisional Regulations " indicates that the " temporary residence permit " will be upgraded to " residence permit ".
最近发布了《居留证暂行条例》的实施细节,表明"临时居留证"将升级为"居留证"。
Recently, the launched of implementation details of " Residence Permit Provisional Regulations " indicates that the " temporary residence permit " will be upgraded to " residence permit ".
最近推出的《居留证暂行条例》实施细则表明,"临时居留证"将升级为"居留证"。
A responsible person of the relevant department said that the transition from the " temporary residence permit " to " residence permit " means that Beijing will shift its administration for non-permanent residents from the " management " to multi-directional services.
有关部门负责人表示,从“临时居留证”向“居留证”的过渡,意味着北京将把对非永久性居民的管理从“管理”转向多方向服务。
A responsible person of the relevant department said that the transition from the " temporary residence permit " to " residence permits " means that Beijing will shift its administration for non-permanent residents from the " management " to multi-directional services.
有关部门负责人表示,从“临时居留证”向“居留证”的过渡,意味着北京将把对非永久性居民的管理从“管理”转向多方向服务。
A responsible person of the relevant department said that the transition from the " temporary residence permit " to " residency permit " means that Beijing will shift its administration for non-permanent residents from the " management " to multi-directional services.

据了解,2014年7月,沙特德士古公司在中央政府各部门迈出了第一步,发布了针对重大违反税法行为的信息披露方法以及税收抵免管理办法。

除非法事实、法律依据、案件的处理和处罚外,非法当事人和有关中间人的基本信息也将列入"黑名单"。
In addition to the illegal facts, legal structure, the handling and punishment of these cases, the basic information of the illegal parties and the relevant intermediaries will be included in the " blacklist " exposure.
除非法事实、法律结构、案件的处理和处罚外,非法当事人和有关中间人的基本信息也将列入"黑名单"中。
In addition to the illegal facts, legal background, the handling and punishment of these cases, the basic information of the illegal parties and the relevant intermediaries will be included in the " blacklist " exposure.
除非法事实、法律背景、案件的处理和处罚外,非法当事人和有关中间人的基本信息也将列入"黑名单"。
Quality inspection, treasury, customs and other government departments also take relevant disciplinary measures against the " blacklist " parties.
质检 、 国库 、 海关等政府部门也对“黑名单”党采取相关纪律措施.
Quality inspection, treasury, customs and other government departments may take relevant disciplinary measures against the " blacklist " parties.
质检 、 国库 、 海关等政府部门可以对“黑名单”当事人采取相应的纪律措施.
Quality inspection, treasury, customs and other government departments often take relevant disciplinary measures against the " blacklist " parties.
质检 、 国库 、 海关等政府部门经常对“黑名单”政党采取相应的纪律措施.
Quality inspection, treasury, customs and other government departments can take relevant disciplinary measures against the " blacklist " parties.
质检 、 国库 、 海关等政府部门可以对“黑名单”政党采取相应的纪律措施.
Quality inspection, treasury, customs and other government departments are take relevant disciplinary measures against the " blacklist " parties.

Quality inspection, treasury, customs and other government departments must take relevant disciplinary measures against the " blacklist " parties.

( This newspaper ) On the 10th day of the month, the Nantong Municipal Government held a series of cooperation activities at the Shanghai International Convention Center. More than 180 Shanghai enterprises were invited to participate. More than 20 Hu-Tong industry docking projects worth at least RMB 100 million saw on-site signing.

( This newspaper ) On the 10th day of the month, the Nantong Municipal Government held a series of cooperation activities at the Shanghai International Convention Center. More than 180 Shanghai enterprises were invited to participate. More than 40 Hu-Tong industry docking projects worth at least RMB 100 million saw on-site signing.
本月十日,南通市政府在上海国际会议中心开展了一系列合作活动,邀请了180多家上海企业参加,40多个价值不低于1亿元人民币的湖通工业对接项目得到了现场签署。
( This newspaper ) On the 10th day of the month, the Nantong Municipal Government held a series of cooperation activities at the Shanghai International Convention Center. More than 180 Shanghai enterprises were invited to participate. More than 15 Hu-Tong industry docking projects worth at least RMB 100 million saw on-site signing.
本月十日,南通市政府在上海国际会议中心开展了一系列合作活动,邀请了180多家上海企业参加。
( This newspaper ) On the 10th day of the month, the Nantong Municipal Government held a series of cooperation activities at the Shanghai International Convention Center. More than 180 Shanghai enterprises were invited to participate. More than 10 Hu-Tong industry docking projects worth at least RMB 100 million saw on-site signing.
本月十日,南通市政府在上海国际会议中心开展了一系列合作活动,邀请了180多家上海企业参展。
The 20 projects with simultaneous signing have a total investment of RMB 8. 063 billion, involving new energy, new materials, modern services and other industries.
同时签署的20个项目总投资80.63亿元人民币,涉及新能源、新材料、现代服务等行业。
The 20 projects with simultaneous signing have a total investment of RMB 8. 063 billion, involving new energy, new materials, new services and other industries.

Qingdao is China's 12th and also Shandong's first trial city to use and trade emissions.
青岛是中国的第12个试验城市,也是山东首个使用和交易废气的城市。
Qingdao is China's 12th and also Shandong's first pilot city to use and trade emissions.
青岛是中国的第12个试点城市,也是山东首个使用和排放贸易的试点城市。
Qingdao is China's 12th and also Shandong's first demonstration city to use and trade emissions.

Qingdao is China's 12th and also Shandong's first prototype city to use and trade emissions.
青岛是中国的第12位,也是山东首个使用和交易废气的原型城市。
On the 11th day of the month, many companies came to the Qingdao Municipal Emissions Trading Center to submit emissions subscription. After acceptance, they shall pay fees.
本月第11日,许多公司来到青岛市排放交易中心提交废气排放认购单,接受后须支付费用。
On the 11th day of the month, many companies came at the Qingdao Municipal Emissions Trading Center to submit emissions subscription. After acceptance, they shall pay fees.
本月11日,许多公司来到青岛市排放交易中心,提交排放认购书,接受后须支付费用。
On the 11th day of the month, many companies came to the Qingdao Municipal Emissions Trading Center to submit emissions listing. After acceptance, they shall pay fees.
本月第11天,许多公司来到青岛市排放交易中心提交排放清单,接受后将支付费用。
On the 11th day of the month, many companies came to the Qingdao Municipal Emissions Trading Center to submit emissions membership. After acceptance, they shall pay fees.
本月第11天,许多公司来到青岛市排放交易中心,提交排放会员资格,接受后应支付费用。
On the 11th day of the month, many companies came to the Qingdao Municipal Emissions Trading Center to submit emissions license. After acceptance, they shall pay fees.
本月第11日,许多公司来到青岛市排放交易中心提交排放许可证,接受后须支付费用。
On the 11th day of the month, many companies came to the Qingdao Municipal Emissions Trading Center to submit emissions licence. After acceptance, they shall pay fees.
本月十一日,多间公司前往青岛市排放交易中心递交排放许可证,接受后须缴交费用。
The upcoming first single transaction also indicates that Qingdao emissions trading pilot officially kicked off. It will also be the first emissions trading in Shandong and the first city-level emissions trading in China.
即将到来的首次单笔交易也表明,青岛排放量交易试点正式启动,这也是山东首个排放量交易,也是中国首个城市级排放量交易。

The project is a mechanical processing enterprise. Its initial emission rate for the chemical oxygen demand ( COD ) and ammonia ( NOX ) are 0. 514 tons / year and 0. 052 tons / year, respectively.
该项目是一家机械加工企业,其化学氧需量 ( COD ) 和氨 ( NOX ) 的初始排放率分别为每年0.514 吨和0.052 吨/年。
The project is a mechanical processing enterprise. Its initial emission rate for the chemical oxygen demand ( COD ) and ammonia ( NOX ) are 0. 514 tons / yearly and 0. 052 tons / year, respectively.
该项目是一家机械加工企业,其化学氧需量 ( COD ) 和氨 ( NOX ) 的初始排放率分别为每年0.514吨和0.052吨/年。
The project is a mechanical processing enterprise. Its initial emission rate for the chemical oxygen demand ( COD ) and ammonia ( NOX ) are 0. 514 tons / cycle and 0. 052 tons / year, respectively.
该项目是一家机械加工企业,其化学氧需求 ( COD ) 和氨 ( NOX ) 的初始排放率分别为0.514 吨/周期和0.052 吨/年。
The project is a mechanical processing enterprise. Its initial emission rate for the chemical oxygen demand ( COD ) and ammonia ( NOX ) are 0. 514 tons / 2009 and 0. 052 tons / year, respectively.
该项目是一家机械加工企业,其化学氧需量 ( COD ) 和氨 (NOX ) 的初始排放率分别为0.514吨/2009和0.052吨/年。
The project is a mechanical processing enterprise. Its initial emission rate for the chemical oxygen demand ( COD ) and ammonia ( NOX ) are 0. 514 tons / 2012 and 0. 052 tons / year, respectively.
该项目是一家机械加工企业,其化学氧需量 ( COD ) 和氨 (NOX ) 的初始排放率分别为2012年的0.514吨和每年的0.052吨。

空气污染物排放许可证的有偿使用和交易覆盖了该市主要工业企业的电力和热能的生产和供应。

2016年1月1日起,取得环境影响评价的当前排污单位,免予补用。

2016年1月1日起,取得环境影响评价的现有排污单位免予补用。

2016年1月1日起,取得环境影响评价的现有排污单位免予补用。
On January 1, 2016, the existing pollutant discharging unit which obtained environmental impact assessment shall be exempt from expenditure of compensated use.
截止2016年1月1日,获得环境影响评价的现有排污单位,应当免除补偿性使用费用。
The obtaining of compensated emission right is not equal to the obtaining of illegal discharge, so companies cannot discharge pollutants at will.
获得补偿排放权不等于获得非法排放,因此公司不得随意排放污染物。

获得补偿排放权不等于获得非法排放,因此公司必须随意排放污染物。
The obtaining of compensated emission right is no equal to the obtaining of illegal discharge, so companies cannot discharge pollutants at will.
获得补偿排放权并不等于获得非法排放,因此公司不得随意排放污染物。
The obtaining of compensated emission right is only equal to the obtaining of illegal discharge, so companies cannot discharge pollutants at will.
赔偿排放权的取得与非法排放的取得是等同的,因此公司不得随意排放污染物。
Han Hongyan, deputy director of Qingdao Environmental Protection Bureau, introduces that companies of illegal and excessive sewage must be punished in accordance with the relevant laws and regulations. Illegal enterprises cannot be allowed to circumvent punishment via purchasing emission rights.
青岛市环保局副局长韩宏仁介绍说,违法和超量排污企业必须按照有关法律法规受到处罚,不得允许违法企业通过购买排放权规避处罚。
Han Hongyan, deputy director of Qingdao Environmental Protection Bureau, introduces that companies of illegal and excessive sewage must be punished in accordance with the relevant laws and regulations. Illegal enterprises must be allowed to circumvent punishment via purchasing emission rights.

Han Hongyan, deputy director of Qingdao Environmental Protection Bureau, introduces that companies of illegal and excessive sewage must be punished in accordance with the relevant laws and regulations. Illegal enterprises cannot be allowed to circumvent punishment via buying emission rights.

Han Hongyan, deputy director of Qingdao Environmental Protection Bureau, introduces that companies of illegal and excessive sewage must be punished in accordance with the relevant laws and regulations. Illegal enterprises cannot be allowed to circumvent punishment via selling emission rights.
青岛市环保局副局长韩宏仁介绍说,违法和超量排污的企业必须按照有关法律法规受到处罚,不得允许违法企业通过销售排放权来规避处罚。
Han Hongyan, deputy director of Qingdao Environmental Protection Bureau, introduces that companies of illegal and excessive sewage must be punished in accordance with the relevant laws and regulations. Illegal enterprises cannot be allowed to circumvent punishment via trading emission rights.

Han Hongyan, deputy director of Qingdao Environmental Protection Bureau, introduces that companies of illegal and excessive sewage must be punished in accordance with the relevant laws and regulations. Illegal enterprises cannot be allowed to circumvent punishment via acquiring emission rights.
青岛市环保局副局长韩宏仁介绍说,违法和超量排污的企业必须按照有关法律法规受到处罚,不得允许违法企业通过获得排放权来规避处罚。
In other words, we need to crack down on environmental violations through legal means and severely punish the enterprises'over standard discharge behaviors, so as to protect the environment and public health.
也就是说,要依法打击环境污染,严惩企业的排污行为,保护环境和公共卫生。

Now for their own interests, enterprises have raised their enthusiasm of pollution control, cherished limited emissions and reduced emissions of pollutants.
现在,企业为了自身的利益,提高了控制污染的热情,珍惜了有限的排放,减少了污染物的排放。
Now for their own interests, enterprises have raised their enthusiasm of pollution control, cherished reduced emissions and reduced emissions of pollutants.
现在,企业为了自身的利益,提高了控制污染的热情,重视减排和减少污染物排放。

现在,企业为了自身的利益,提高了控制污染的热情,重视限制排放和减少污染物排放。
Now for their own interests, enterprises have raised their enthusiasm of pollution control, cherished reducing emissions and reduced emissions of pollutants.
现在,企业为了自身的利益,提高了控制污染的热情,重视减排和减少污染物排放。
With the economic interests drive, to reduce pollutants'discharge has shifted from the government's mandatory behavior into a conscious market behavior, so as to truly protect the environment, nature and public health.
在经济利益的驱动下,减少污染物排放已经由政府的强制性行为转变为有意识的市场行为,从而真正保护环境、自然和公共卫生。
With the economic interests drive, to reduce pollutants'discharge has shifted from the government's mandatory behavior into a aware market behavior, so as to truly protect the environment, nature and public health.
在经济利益的驱动下,减少污染物排放已经由政府的强制性行为转变为有意识的市场行为,从而真正保护环境、自然和公共卫生。
With the economic interests drive, to reduce pollutants'discharge has shifted from the government's mandatory behavior into a free market behavior, so as to truly protect the environment, nature and public health.

Since the proposition of emissions trading by American economist Dyers in 1968, it has been applied by the United States of America to the management of atmospheric and river pollution sources since the 1970s.
自美国经济学家戴尔斯1968年提出排放权交易以来,美利坚合众国自1970年代以来就一直将其用于大气和河流污染源的管理。

On February 18 this year, the United States and Russia reached a ceasefire agreement on the Syrian conflict. The ceasefire agreement will be implemented since February 27.
今年2月18日,美国和俄罗斯就叙利亚冲突达成了停火协议,停火协议将在2月27日开始实施。
Under the agreement, the ceasefire does not include a military strike against terrorist organizations including " Islamic State " and " Salvation Front ", which were identified by the United Nation Security Council.
根据该协定,停火不包括对联合国安全理事会确定的"伊斯兰国"和"救世阵线"等恐怖组织的军事打击。

根据该协定,停火不包括对联合国安全理事会确定的"伊斯兰国"和"救国联盟"等恐怖组织的军事打击。
Under the agreement, the ceasefire does not include a military strike against terrorist organizations including " Islamic State " and " Salvation Brigade ", which were identified by the United Nation Security Council.
根据该协定,停火不包括对联合国安全理事会确定的"伊斯兰国"和"救世旅"等恐怖组织的军事打击。
Under the agreement, the ceasefire does not include a military strike against terrorist organizations including " Islamic State " and " Salvation Watch ", which were identified by the United Nation Security Council.
根据该协定,停火不包括对联合国安全理事会确定的"伊斯兰国"和"救世观察"等恐怖组织的军事打击。
Under the agreement, the ceasefire does not include a military strike against terrorist organizations including " Islamic State " and " Salvation Iraq ", which were identified by the United Nation Security Council.

In fact, the relationship between the village and the city should companionship with, just like mother and child. No matter strong or weak. There is no need for any party to be governed by the other party. Such a relationship is warm.
事实上,村庄和城市的关系应该像母亲和孩子一样,与母亲和孩子相伴。无论强弱,都不必让任何一方受对方的支配。这种关系是温和的。

Shanghai Songjiang District Traffic Control Department recently used electronic police to monitor whether the driver plays mobile phone while driving. As a result, more than 30 cases were detected in a week.
上海松江区交通管制部门最近使用电子警察来监控司机驾驶时是否使用手机,结果一周内共发现30多起。
Shanghai Songjiang District Traffic Control Department recently used electronic police to monitor whether the driver plays mobile phone while driving. As a result, more than 30 cases were detected in a month.

With the popularity of smart phones, mobile phones become more and more funny. WeChat, microblogging and even games, shopping on Taobao have become normal. It seems that many people cannot leave the phone for a moment, and cannot stop even when driving.
随着智能手机的普及,手机越来越滑稽了。WeChat、微博甚至游戏,在淘宝购物已经司空见惯了,似乎很多人暂时不能离开手机,即使在开车的时候也停不下来。

According to " Road Traffic Safety Act ", mobile phones playing are banned and defined as " behavior preventing safe driving ".
根据《道路交通安全法》,手机游戏被禁止,并被定义为 “ 阻止安全驾驶的行为 ”.
According to " Road Traffic Safety Act ", mobile phones playing are banned and defined as " behavior causing safe driving ".
根据《道路交通安全法》,手机游戏被禁止,并被定义为 “ 导致安全驾驶的行为 ”.
According to " Road Traffic Safety Act ", mobile phones playing are banned and defined as " behavior affecting safe driving ".
根据《道路交通安全法》,手机游戏被禁止,并被定义为 “ 影响安全驾驶的行为 ”.
According to " Road Traffic Safety Act ", mobile phones playing are banned and defined for " behavior preventing safe driving ".

如果交通管制部门下定决心对手机游戏行为宣战,同时驾驶和规范此类措施,则此类非法行为必将受到遏制。
If the traffic control department can be determined to declare war to the mobile phone playing behavior while driving and normalize such measures, these illegal behaviors will surely be curbed.
如果交通管制部门在驾驶时对手机游戏行为宣战并将这些措施规范化,这些违法行为必将受到遏制。
The public security organ shall be strict with household registration management by gradually establishing electronic and paper files for people without Hukou ( household registration ) and ensure the completeness and validity.
公安机关对户口管理应当严格,逐步建立户口无户口人电子文件和纸件档案,保证完整有效。

According to Su Qifang, the village secretary, per capita land cultivation area increases each year. 50 mu ( a unit of area, one " mu " = 0. 0667 hectares ) in the beginning and over 100 mu now. The revenue per mu increases every year and the income of professional farmers also have room for growth every year.
据村长苏齐芳说,人均土地种植面积逐年增加,初期为50亩(单位面积:亩=0.667公顷),现在为100亩以上,每亩收入逐年增加,专业农户的收入每年也有增长空间。

Zhu Baoping, deputy director of the Jiangsu Provincial Agriculture Committee, said that the next step of Jiangsu government is to continue to promote the reform of community cooperation system, encourage farmers to jointly develop and establish a village-level democratic power operation mechanism.
江苏省农业委员会副主任朱保平表示,江苏政府的下一步工作是继续推进社区合作体制改革,鼓励农民共同发展和建立村级民主权力运行机制。
Zhu Baoping, deputy director of the Jiangsu Provincial Agriculture Committee, announced that the next step of Jiangsu government is to continue to promote the reform of community cooperation system, encourage farmers to jointly develop and establish a village-level democratic power operation mechanism.
江苏省农业委员会副主任朱保平宣布,江苏省政府下一步将继续推进社区合作体制改革,鼓励农民联合发展,建立村级民主权力运行机制。
According to Zhu Baoping, they should further move forward the reform, engage in community shares cooperation, quantify the assets to members, fix it to farmers and produce clear property rights.
朱保平认为,应进一步推动改革,开展社区共享合作,对成员资产进行量化,对农民进行修正,并产生明确的产权。
According to Zhu Baoping, they should further move forward the reform, engage in community shares cooperation, quantify the assets to members, fix it to farmers and produce complete property rights.
朱保平认为,应进一步推动改革,开展社区共享合作,对成员资产进行量化,对农民进行整顿,并生产完整的产权。
According to Zhu Baoping, they should further move forward the reform, engage in community shares cooperation, quantify the assets to members, fix it to farmers and produce legal property rights.
朱保平认为,应进一步推动改革,开展社区共享合作,对成员资产进行量化,对农民进行整顿,并产生合法的产权。
According to Zhu Baoping, they should further move forward the reform, engage in community shares cooperation, quantify the assets to members, fix it to farmers and produce new property rights.
朱保平认为,应进一步推动改革,开展社区共享合作,对成员资产进行量化,对农民进行整顿,并产生新的产权。
According to Zhu Baoping, they should further move forward the reform, engage in community shares cooperation, quantify the assets to members, fix it to farmers and produce Clear property rights.
朱保平认为,应进一步推动改革,开展社区共享合作,对成员资产进行量化,对农民进行整顿,并实现产权明确。
According to Zhu Baoping, they should further move forward the reform, engage in community shares cooperation, quantify the assets to members, fix it to farmers and produce secure property rights.
朱保平认为,应进一步推动改革,开展社区共享合作,对成员资产进行量化,对农民进行整顿,并生产有保障的产权。

At present, the new collective economy in southern Jiangsu village mainly consists of four development modes, including asset leasing, enterprise stock, agricultural development and joint development.

月11日晚上,就在这台新电视机前,张东红夫妇及其成百上千的亲戚和朋友见证了这对夫妇女儿的神奇过程,即追赶和扭转,从几乎在预演中被淘汰到几乎获胜。
In the evening of the 11th day of the month, just in front of this new TV set, the Zhang Donghong couple and their thousand of relatives and friends have witnessed the magic process for the couple's daughter to catch up and reverse from almost being eliminated in the preliminaries to almost winning.
月11日晚上,就在这台新电视机前,张东红夫妇及其数千名亲戚和朋友见证了这对夫妇女儿的神奇过程,即追赶和扭转,从几乎在初选中被淘汰到几乎获胜。
At the game, Zhang Binbin was ranked in the middle and lower reaches and it seemed she was still quite far away from the final.
在这场比赛中,张斌被评为中下,她似乎离决赛还很远。

But her parents and friends did not give up, kept watching the live and saw other players finish the game. Zhang Binbin raised her ranks all the way and finally came to the final. At this time, a burst of cheers broke out in her home.
但是,她的父母和朋友并没有放弃,继续观看现场直播,还看到其他球员完成了这场比赛,张斌一路挺身而出,终于进入决赛,这时,她家响起了一阵欢呼声。

He recalled that after Zhang Binbin came into the Xiamen shooting team more than a year later, the team carried out a long shot of gun training, requiring players not to move for half an hour.
他回忆说,一年多后,张斌进入厦门射击队后,该队进行了长时间的枪械训练,要求球员在半小时内不得动弹。

of an athlete, Zhang Binbin and her family are separate more than being together. As she can only return home during festivities, she mainly contacts family members by phone in other time.

The 719 heavy rainfall caused heavy disaster to many cities of Hebei Province and resulted in the flood disaster of some regions in Hebei province. During the period, some people were dead and missing.
719年的强降雨量对河北省许多城市造成了重大灾害,并导致河北省部分地区发生洪水灾害,在此期间,有的人死亡,有的失踪。

719次大洪水对河北省许多城市造成重大灾害,并导致河北省部分地区发生洪水灾害,造成部分人死亡和失踪。
The good man " Lao Tie " sacrificed his life when he helped the community on drainage, leaving a 2-year-old kid and a wife with child. The moving story of the good man " Lao Tie " made the entire provincial capital moved.
那位好汉“老铁”在帮助社区排水时献出了自己的生命,留下一个两岁的孩子和一个带着孩子的妻子,“老铁”的动人故事使整个省会都动了起来。
The good man " Lao Tie " sacrificed his life when he helped the community on drainage, leaving a 2-year-in kid and a wife with child. The moving story of the good man " Lao Tie " made the entire provincial capital moved.

On August 4, the working personnel of Hebei Provincial Cixiao Fund and volunteers of Hebei Brand Association came to his home and offered his relatives with 3, 200-yuan love donation.
八月四日,河北省慈秀基金的工作人员和河北品牌协会的志愿者来到自己的家,为自己的亲人赠送了三千二百元的爱。
On August 4, the working personnel of Hebei Provincial Cixiao Fund and volunteers of Hebei Brand Association came to his house and offered his relatives with 3, 200-yuan love donation.
8月4日,河北省慈秀基金的工作人员和河北品牌协会的志愿者来到他家,向他的亲戚赠送了3200元的爱。

On August 4, the working personnel of Hebei Provincial Cixiao Fund and workers of Hebei Brand Association came to his home and offered his relatives with 3, 200-yuan love donation.

On August 4, the working personnel of Hebei Provincial Cixiao Fund and volunteer of Hebei Brand Association came to his home and offered his relatives with 3, 200-yuan love donation.
8月4日,河北省慈秀基金的工作人员和河北品牌协会的志愿者来到他家,向他的亲戚赠送了3200元的爱。
When Ye Li, the vice president of Hebei Brand Association acknowledged the situation of " Lao Tie ", they immediately decided to carry out " love charity " activities among enterprise members to help " old iron " family to ride out the storm.
当河北品牌协会副会长叶莉承认“老铁”的情况时,他们立即决定在企业成员中开展“爱心慈善”活动,帮助“老铁”家庭渡过难关。
When Ye Li, the vice president of Hebei Brand Association acknowledged the situation of " Lao Tie ", they immediately agreed to carry out " love charity " activities among enterprise members to help " old iron " family to ride out the storm.
当河北品牌协会副会长叶莉承认“老铁”的情况时,他们立即同意在企业成员中开展“爱心慈善”活动,帮助“老铁”家庭渡过难关。
When Ye Li, the vice president of Hebei Brand Association acknowledged the situation of " Lao Tie ", they immediately decided to carry out " love charity " activities among enterprise members to help " old steel " family to ride out the storm.

Hebei Provincial Cixiao Fund, known as Cixiao Fund of the Hebei Volunteer Service Foundation, was initiated by the Hebei Brand Preparatory Committee, and established in August 2015.
河北省慈秀基金,又称河北义工服务基金会慈秀基金,由河北品牌筹备委员会发起,于2015年8月成立。
Hebei Provincial Cixiao Fund, known as Cixiao Fund of the Hebei Volunteer Service Foundation, was initiated by the Hebei Brand Preparatory Commission, and established in August 2015.
河北省慈秀基金,又称河北义工服务基金会慈秀基金,由河北品牌筹备委员会发起,于2015年8月成立。
Hebei Provincial Cixiao Fund, known as Cixiao Fund of the Hebei Volunteer Service Foundation, was initiated by the Hebei Brand Preparatory Council, and established in August 2015.
河北省慈秀基金,又称河北义工服务基金会慈秀基金,由河北品牌筹备理事会发起,于2015年8月成立。
According to a Hong Kong Oriental Daily report made on August 12, the current diamond sales in Mainland China were accused of three major problems, including the false marking of diamond clarity to raise sales price, false diamond weight and unguaranteed aftersales, etc.
根据香港东方日报8月12日的报导,目前中国大陆的钻石销售被指责存在三个主要问题,包括提高销售价格的假钻石标识、假钻石重量和假售后售等。

Antwerp is one of the world's largest diamond trading centers. The diamond cutting technology of local artisans is well-known. All diamonds on sale have undergone rigorous identification, deeply welcomed by the mainland ladies.
安特卫普是世界上最大的钻石交易中心之一,当地手工工匠的钻石切割技术是众所周知的,所有出售的钻石都经过严谨的鉴定,深受大陆女性的欢迎。

Antwerp is one of the world's largest diamond trading centers. The diamond cutting technology of local artisans is highly-known. All diamonds on sale have undergone rigorous identification, deeply welcomed by the mainland ladies.
安特卫普是世界上最大的钻石交易中心之一,当地手工工匠的钻石切割技术是众所周知的,所有出售的钻石都经过严谨的鉴定,深受大陆女性的欢迎。
" A small cloth bag, holding in one's hand, such light-weighted, is worth of almost one million yuan ", a woman surnamed Liu who participated in the purchase of diamonds told of her experience in Antwerp last June to the mainland media.
一位名叫刘的女士向大陆媒体透露了去年六月在安特卫普的经历,她手里拿着一个轻便的布袋,价值近100万元。

" A small cloth bag, holding in one's hand, such light-weighted, is worth of almost one million yuan ", a woman surnamed Liu who participated in the purchase of diamonds told of her experience in Antwerp last November to the mainland media.
一位名叫刘的女士向内地媒体透露了去年11月在安特卫普的经历,她手里拿着一个小布袋,如此轻便,价值近100万元。
She buried the diamond in her lingerie and carried it all day along, including when she went to toilet and took bath.
她把钻石埋在内衣里,并随身携带了一整天,包括去洗手间洗澡时。

她把钻石埋在内衣里,整天都戴着它,包括去洗手间洗澡。
She buried the diamond in her lingerie and buried it all day along, including when she went to toilet and took bath.
她把钻石埋在内衣里,并把它埋了一整天,包括她上厕所洗澡时。
She buried the diamond in her lingerie and kept it all day along, including when she went to toilet and took bath.
她把钻石埋在内衣里,整天都保存着,包括去洗手间洗澡的时候。
She buried the diamond in her lingerie and had it all day along, including when she went to toilet and took bath.
她把钻石埋在内衣里,整天都拿着钻石,包括去洗手间洗澡的时候。
She said the diamond she bought in Antwerp was priced about RMB 55, 000 per gram and diamond of the same quality was retail-priced about RMB 111, 000 in Xia'men.
她说,她在安特卫普买的钻石每克售价5万5千元,在厦门,同样质量的钻石零售价11万1千元。
She said the diamond she bought in Antwerp was priced about RMB 55, 000 per Gram and diamond of the same quality was retail-priced about RMB 111, 000 in Xia'men.
她说,她在安特卫普买的钻石每克售价5万5千元,而同样质量的钻石在厦门零售价11万1千元。
She said the diamond she bought in Antwerp was priced about RMB 55, 000 per gram and diamond of the same quality was retail-priced about RMB 111, 000 in Hua'men.

She said the diamond she bought in Antwerp was priced about RMB 55, 000 per gram and diamond of the same quality was retail-priced about RMB 111, 000 in Dia'men.

Recently, she sold the diamond with 120 % more than the price she bought and earned two hundred thousand yuan.
最近, 她以比她购买的价格高出120%的价格卖出了这颗钻石,赚了20万元.

According to the provisions of the Mainland Customs, diamonds are neither supplies nor necessities during the trip and thus belong to the scope of goods. So such diamond should be declared at entry and exit. Otherwise, it shall be classified as smuggling. People may be sentenced to jail.
根据内地海关的规定,钻石在旅途中既不是供应,也不是必需品,因此属于货品范围。因此,在出入境时,应申报钻石。否则,该钻石会被归类为走私,可判以监禁。
According to the provisions of the Mainland Customs, diamonds are neither supplies nor necessities during the trip and therefore belong to the scope of goods. So such diamond should be declared at entry and exit. Otherwise, it shall be classified as smuggling. People may be sentenced to jail.
根据内地海关的规定,钻石在旅途中既不是供应,也不是必需品,因此属于货品范围。因此,进出境时,应申报钻石。否则,该钻石可列为走私品,可判以监禁。
According to the provisions of the Mainland Customs, diamonds are neither supplies nor necessities during the trip and hence belong to the scope of goods. So such diamond should be declared at entry and exit. Otherwise, it shall be classified as smuggling. People may be sentenced to jail.
根据内地海关的规定,钻石在旅途中既不是供应,也不是必需品,因此属于货品范围。因此,进出境时,须申报钻石。否则,钻石可列为走私品,可判以监禁。
According to the provisions of the Mainland Customs, diamonds are neither supplies or necessities during the trip and thus belong to the scope of goods. So such diamond should be declared at entry and exit. Otherwise, it shall be classified as smuggling. People may be sentenced to jail.
根据内地海关的规定,钻石在旅途中既不是供应品,也不是必需品,因此属于货品范围。因此,在出入境时,应申报钻石。否则,该钻石可列为走私品,可判以监禁。
According to the provisions of the Mainland Customs, diamonds are neither supplies and necessities during the trip and thus belong to the scope of goods. So such diamond should be declared at entry and exit. Otherwise, it shall be classified as smuggling. People may be sentenced to jail.
根据内地海关的规定,钻石在旅途中既不是供应品,也不是必需品,因此属于货品范围。因此,在进出境时,应申报钻石。否则,该钻石会被归类为走私品,可判以监禁。

据外国媒体报道,当地时间月份第10天,英国首相唐宁宫宣布英国首相梅德琳将去瑞士度暑假,但没有透露具体地点。
According to foreign media reports, on the 10th day of the month of the local time, the British Prime Minister's Downing Post announced that British Prime Minister Teresa Mei will go to Switzerland to spend the summer vacation, but did not disclose the specific place.
据外国媒体报道,当地时间月份第10天,英国首相唐宁邮报宣布,英国首相梅德琳将去瑞士度暑假,但没有透露具体地点。
According to some media, after the British referendum off Europe, the new British Prime Minister chose to spend her vacation on the " neutral country ", Swiss on the European continent. This is symbolic.
据一些媒体报导,在英国在欧洲以外举行全民公投后,英国新任首相选择在“中立国”即欧洲大陆的瑞士度假,这具有象征意义。
According to some media, following the British referendum off Europe, the new British Prime Minister chose to spend her vacation on the " neutral country ", Swiss on the European continent. This is symbolic.
据一些媒体报导,继英国在欧洲以外的全民投票之后,英国新任首相选择在“中立国”即欧洲大陆的瑞士度假,这具有象征意义。
The British " Guardian " commented that the symbolic neutrality nature of the Swiss played a role in the choice of the British Prime Minister's first resort.
英国的“卫士”评论说,瑞士人的象征中立性在英国首相的首选中起了作用。
The British " Guardian " commented that the symbolic neutrality nature of the Switzerland played a role in the choice of the British Prime Minister's first resort.
英国的“卫士”评论说,瑞士的象征中立性在英国首相的首选中起了作用。
The British " Guardian " commented that the symbolic neutrality nature of the Swiss played a role in the selection of the British Prime Minister's first resort.
英国的“卫士”评论说,瑞士人的象征中立性在英国总理的首选中起了作用。
The British " Guardian " commented that the symbolic neutral nature of the Swiss played a role in the choice of the British Prime Minister's first resort.
英国的“卫士”评论说,瑞士人的象征中立性在英国首相的首选中起了作用。
British " Daily Telegraph " commented that Teresa Mei chose to take a vacation in Switzerland. This is the first time that the British Prime Minister chose to go vacation in Swiss after Margaret Thatcher.

There are 1, 325 existing intangible cultural heritage projects in Huangshan. Its number and quantity ranked first in Anhui province.

As the inheritance of intangible cultural heritage projects of Anhui province mainly relies on oral and face-to-face passage, many intangible cultural heritage projects are on the verge of failing to be handed down from past generations. So the application of digital technology for conservation is imperative.
由于安徽省非物质文化遗产的继承主要依靠口语和面对面的交流,许多非物质文化遗产的继承项目正处在前世遗留下来的边缘,因此应用数字技术进行保护势在必行。

So the application of digital technology for preservation is imperative.

So the application of digital technology for conservation is imperative.

中国的火星计划即将到来
China's Mars program is Coming

China's Mars program is starting
中国的火星计划正在启动
China's Mars program is due
中国的火星计划到期了
China's Mars program is upcoming
中国的火星计划即将开始
China's Mars program is beginning
中国的火星计划已经开始
China Mars exploration mission aims to achieve surrounding, landing and patrolling at one time, which has never occurred in foreign countries.
中国的火星探测任务旨在实现环绕、降落和巡逻,这在外国从未发生过。
China Mars exploration mission aims to achieve surrounding, landing and patrolling at one time, which has never occurred in other countries.
中国火星探测任务旨在实现环绕、降落和巡逻,而其他国家从未这样做过。
China Mars exploration mission aims to achieve surrounding, landing and surveying at one time, which has never occurred in foreign countries.
中国火星探测任务的目标是实现环绕、着陆和勘测,而这一点从未发生在国外。
China Mars exploration mission aims to achieve surrounding, landing and exploring at one time, which has never occurred in foreign countries.
中国火星探险任务的目标是实现环绕、着陆和探索,而这一点从未发生在国外。
China Mars exploration mission aims to achieve surrounding, landing and watching at one time, which has never occurred in foreign countries.
中国火星探险任务的目标是实现环绕、着陆和观看,这在外国从未发生过。
China Mars exploration mission aims to achieve surrounding, landing and studying at one time, which has never occurred in foreign countries.
中国的火星探测任务旨在实现环绕、降落和研究,这在外国从未发生过。
China's Mars exploration launch target is to step around, land and patrol at one time. Such task has considerable difficulty.
中国的火星探测发射目标是一次绕行、降落和巡逻,这种任务有相当大的难度。
China's Mars exploration launch target is to step around, land and patrol at one time. Such task has considerable difficulties.
中国的火星探测发射目标是一次绕行、降落和巡逻,这种任务有相当大的困难。
China's Mars exploration launch target is to step around, land and patrol at one time. Such task has considerable challenge.
中国的火星探测发射目标是一次绕行、降落和巡逻,这种任务具有相当大的挑战性。
China's Mars exploration launch target is to step around, land and patrol at one time. Such task has considerable challenges.
中国的火星探测发射目标是一次绕行、降落和巡逻,这种任务具有相当大的挑战性。
China's Mars exploration launch target is to step around, land and patrol at one time. Such task has considerable problems.
中国的火星探测发射目标是一次绕行、降落和巡逻,这样的任务有相当多的问题。
China's Mars exploration launch target is to step around, land and patrol at one time. Such task has considerable complexity.
中国的火星探测发射目标是一次绕行、降落和巡逻,这种任务相当复杂。
Because the Mars probe can encounter a time window in 26 months, experts are closely working on the project plan and try to launch the first Mars probe in 2020.
由于火星探测器在26个月中会遇到一个时间窗口,所以专家正紧密合作项目计划,并试图在2020年启动第一个火星探测器。
Because the Mars probe can encounter a time window in 26 months, experts are closely working on the project plan and try to launch the first Mars probe around 2020.
由于火星探测器在26个月内会遇到一个时间窗口,所以专家正紧密合作项目计划,并试图在2020年前后启动第一个火星探测器。
Because the Mars probe can encounter a time window in 26 months, experts are closely working on the project plan and try to launch the first Mars probe by 2020.
由于火星探测器在26个月内会遇到一个时间窗口,所以专家们正紧密合作项目计划,并试图在2020年前启动第一个火星探测器。
Because the Mars probe can encounter a time window in 26 months, experts are closely working on the project plan and try to launch the first Mars probe before 2020.
由于火星探测器在26个月内会遇到一个时间窗口,所以专家们正紧密合作项目计划,并试图在2020年前启动第一个火星探测器。
Because the Mars probe can encounter a time window in 26 years, experts are closely working on the project plan and try to launch the first Mars probe in 2020.
由于火星探测器在26年中可能遇到一个时间窗口,专家们正紧密合作项目计划,并试图在2020年推出第一个火星探测器。
According to Xu Dazhe, although China's aircraft has entered a deep space, it is still essential to finish the task of Mars exploration. The detection of Mars means that China has stepped into the deep space exploration era in a true sense.
徐大和说,虽然中国的飞机已经进入了一个很深的太空,但是完成火星探测任务还是很必要的,对火星的探测意味着中国已经进入了一个真正意义上的探索太空的时代。
According to Xu Dazhe, although China's aircraft has entered a deep space, it is still crucial to finish the task of Mars exploration. The detection of Mars means that China has stepped into the deep space exploration era in a true sense.

According to Xu Dazhe, although China's aircraft has entered a deep space, it is still important to finish the task of Mars exploration. The detection of Mars means that China has stepped into the deep space exploration era in a true sense.

" Every two or three years, there is a chance that Mars is closest to Earth. And at this point, it is most energy efficient to launch the vehicle. "
每隔两三年,火星就有可能与地球距离最近,而此时,运载火箭的发射最为节能。
" Every two or three years, there is a chance that Mars is closest to Earth. And at this point, it is most energy efficient to launch the craft. "
每隔两三年,火星就有可能与地球最接近,而此时,发射该航天器是最为节能的。”

" Every two or three years, there is a chance that Mars is closest to Earth. And at this point, it is most energy efficient to launch the rocket. "
“每隔两三年,火星就有可能与地球最接近,而此时,发射火箭是最具能量效率的。”
" Every two or three years, there is a chance that Mars is closest to Earth. And at this point, it is most energy efficient to launch the ship. "
每隔两三年,火星就有可能与地球最接近,而此时,发射这艘船是最具节能的。
" Every two or three years, there is a chance that Mars is closest to Earth. And at this point, it is most energy efficient to launch the probe. "
每隔两三年,火星就有可能与地球最接近,而此时,发射探测器是最具能量效率的。
" Taking into account the mass of Mars detectors, it will be the job of China's Long March 5 carrier rocket to complete the launch mission. "
考虑到火星探测器的质量,中国长征五号运载火箭将完成发射任务。
" Taking into consideration the mass of Mars detectors, it will be the job of China's Long March 5 carrier rocket to complete the launch mission. "
考虑到火星探测器的质量,完成发射任务将是中国长征五号运载火箭的任务。
" Taking into consider the mass of Mars detectors, it will be the job of China's Long March 5 carrier rocket to complete the launch mission. "
“考虑到火星探测器的质量,完成发射任务将是中国长征五号运载火箭的任务。”
" Taking into concern the mass of Mars detectors, it will be the job of China's Long March 5 carrier rocket to complete the launch mission. "
“考虑到火星探测器的数量,完成发射任务将是中国长征五号运载火箭的任务。”
" Taking into considerations the mass of Mars detectors, it will be the job of China's Long March 5 carrier rocket to complete the launch mission. "
考虑到火星探测器的质量,完成发射任务是中国长征五号运载火箭的任务。
" Taking into account the mass of Mars detectors, it will be the job of China's Long March 5 carrier rocket to complete the launching mission. "
考虑到火星探测器的质量,中国长征五号运载火箭将完成发射任务。
China's Mars exploration mission aims to achieve surrounding, landing and patrolling at one time, which has never occurred in foreign countries. There was one time of surrounding and landing before in foreign countries, but the landing failed.
中国的火星探测任务旨在实现环绕、降落和巡逻的目标,这在外国从未发生过,以前曾有一次环绕和降落在外国,但落地失败了。
China's Mars exploration mission aims to achieve surrounding, landing and patrol at one time, which has never occurred in foreign countries. There was one time of surrounding and landing before in foreign countries, but the landing failed.
中国的火星探测任务旨在实现环绕、降落和巡逻的目标,这在外国从未发生过,以前曾有一次环绕和降落在外国,但落地失败了。
China's Mars exploration mission aims to achieve surrounding, landing and mining at one time, which has never occurred in foreign countries. There was one time of surrounding and landing before in foreign countries, but the landing failed.
中国的火星探测任务旨在同时实现环绕、着陆和采矿,这在外国从未发生过,以前曾有一次环绕和降落在外国,但这次着陆失败了。
China's Mars exploration mission aims to achieve surrounding, landing and training at one time, which has never occurred in foreign countries. There was one time of surrounding and landing before in foreign countries, but the landing failed.
中国的火星探测任务旨在同时实现环绕、着陆和训练,这在外国从未发生过,以前曾有一次环绕和降落在外国,但落地失败了。
China's Mars exploration mission aims to achieve surrounding, landing and monitoring at one time, which has never occurred in foreign countries. There was one time of surrounding and landing before in foreign countries, but the landing failed.
中国的火星探测任务旨在同时实现环绕、着陆和监控,这在外国从未发生过,以前曾有一次环绕和降落在外国,但这次着陆失败了。
China's Mars exploration mission aims to achieve surrounding, landing and mapping at one time, which has never occurred in foreign countries. There was one time of surrounding and landing before in foreign countries, but the landing failed.
中国的火星探测任务旨在同时完成环绕、着陆和测绘任务,这在外国从未发生过,以前曾有一次环绕和降落在外国,但落地失败了。
Mars exploration involves a lot of technical areas. In particular, although the rover is a space detector, it has a distinctive feature compared with the general space detector.
火星探测涉及许多技术领域,特别是,虽然探测器是一种空间探测器,但它与一般的空间探测器相比具有显著的特征。
Mars exploration involves a lot of technical areas. In particular, although the rover is a space detector, it has a distinctive feature compared with the general space detection.

Mars exploration involves a lot of technical areas. In particular, although the rover is a space detector, it has a distinctive feature compared with the general space sensor.

Mars exploration involves a lot of technical areas. In particular, although the rover is a space detector, it has a distinctive features compared with the general space detector.

Mars exploration involves a lot of technical areas. In particular, although the rover is a space detector, it has a distinctive capability compared with the general space detector.

Mars exploration involves a lot of technical areas. In particular, although the rover is a space detector, it has a distinctive design compared with the general space detector.

换句话说,火星探测器应当能够确定行驶路线,并具备发现障碍的能力。

In other words, the Mars probe should be capable of determining the driving path and equipped with the ability to find obstacles.
换句话说,火星探测器应当能够确定行驶路线,并具备发现障碍的能力。
In other words, the Mars probe should be capable of determining the driving course and equipped with the ability to find obstacles.
换句话说,火星探测器应该能够确定驾驶路线,并具备发现障碍的能力。
In other words, the Mars probe should be capable of determining the driving trajectory and equipped with the ability to find obstacles.
换句话说,火星探测器应当能够确定驱动轨迹,并具备发现障碍的能力。
In other words, the Mars probe should be capable of determining the driving orbit and equipped with the ability to find obstacles.
换句话说,火星探测器应当能够确定驱动轨道,并具备发现障碍的能力。
According to Pang Zhihao, a researcher of the fifth institute of China's Aerospace Science and Technology Group, the reason for human being to favor Mars exploration is because Mars detection has significant scientific and technical meanings and it even matters to the future of human beings.
中国航空航天科技集团第五研究所的研究员彭志浩认为,人类之所以偏爱火星探测,是因为火星探测具有重要的科技意义,甚至对人类的未来都很重要。
According to Pang Zhihao, a researcher of the fifth institute of China's Aerospace Science and Technology Group, the reason for human being to favour Mars exploration is because Mars detection has significant scientific and technical meanings and it even matters to the future of human beings.
