According to Pang Zhihao, a researcher of the fifth institute of China's Aerospace Science and Technology Group, the reason for human being to favor Mars exploration is because Mars detection has crucial scientific and technical meanings and it even matters to the future of human beings.
中国航空航天科技集团第五研究所的研究员彭志浩认为,人类之所以偏爱火星探测,是因为火星探测具有重要的科技意义,甚至对人类的未来都很重要。
According to Pang Zhihao, a researcher of the fifth institute of China's Aerospace Science and Technology Group, the reason for human being to favor Mars exploration is because Mars detection has key scientific and technical meanings and it even matters to the future of human beings.
中国航空航天科技集团第五研究所的研究员彭志浩认为,人类之所以偏爱火星探测,是因为火星探测具有关键的科技意义,甚至对人类的未来都很重要。
Currently, the Mars has become the planet with the highest degree of human research. The history of human beings to use space detectors for Mars exploration almost goes across the entire history of human space exploration.
目前,火星已经成为人类研究程度最高的行星,人类利用太空探测器探测火星的历史几乎贯穿人类太空探索的整个历史。
Currently, the Mars has become the planet with the greatest degree of human research. The history of human beings to use space detectors for Mars exploration almost goes across the entire history of human space exploration.
目前,火星已经成为人类研究程度最高的行星,人类利用太空探测器探测火星的历史几乎贯穿人类太空探索的整个历史。
Currently, the Mars has become the planet with the highest degree of human research. The history of human beings to use space detectors for Mars exploring almost goes across the entire history of human space exploration.
目前,火星已成为人类研究程度最高的行星,人类利用空间探测器探测火星的历史几乎贯穿人类太空探索的整个历史。
Currently, the Mars has become the planet with the highest degree of human research. The history of human beings to use space detectors for Mars exploration almost goes across the whole history of human space exploration.
目前,火星已经成为人类研究程度最高的行星,人类利用太空探测器探测火星的历史几乎贯穿人类太空探索的整个历史。
Therefore, the human beings hope that one day on the Mars to establish a base of residence, and ultimately to Mars immigration, it turned into a second home of mankind.
因此,人类希望有一天在火星上建立一个居住基地,最终进入火星移民,它会变成人类的第二个家园。
Therefore, the human beings hope that one day on the Mars to establish a base of residence, and ultimately to Mars immigration, it turned as a second home of mankind.
因此,人类希望有一天,在火星上建立一个居住基地,并最终向火星移民,它将变成人类的第二个家园。
A large number of signs also show that the Mars is likely to be the same as the current Earth, only after billions of years of evolution into the atmosphere thin, low temperature, water depletion and so on.
大量迹象还表明,火星很可能与现在的地球相同,除非经过数十亿年的演化而进入薄薄、低温、水枯竭等大气层。
A large number of signs also show that the Mars is likely to be the same as the current Earth, only after billions of years of evolution into the atmosphere thin, high temperature, water depletion and so on.
大量迹象还表明,火星很可能与现在的地球相同,除非经过数十亿年的演化而进入薄薄、高温、水耗等等的大气层。
A large number of signs also show that the Mars is likely to be the same as the current Earth, only after billions of years of evolution into the atmosphere thin, cold temperature, water depletion and so on.
大量迹象还表明,火星很可能与现在的地球相同,仅在经过数十亿年的大气变薄、寒冷的温度、水枯竭等之后。
A large number of signs also show that the Mars is likely to be the same as the current Earth, only after billions of years of evolution into the atmosphere thin, lower temperature, water depletion and so on.
大量迹象还表明,火星很可能与现在的地球相同,仅在经过数十亿年的大气演化后,火星才变得薄薄、低温、水分枯竭等等。
A large number of signs also show that the Mars is likely to be the same as the current Earth, only after billions of years of evolution into the atmosphere thin, higher temperature, water depletion and so on.
大量迹象还表明,火星很可能与现在的地球相同,仅在经过数十亿年的大气变薄、温度升高、水枯竭等之后。
A large number of signs also show that the Mars is likely to be the same as the present Earth, only after billions of years of evolution into the atmosphere thin, low temperature, water depletion and so on.
大量迹象还表明,火星很可能与现在的地球相同,仅在经过数十亿年的大气演化后,火星才变得薄薄、低温、水分枯竭等等。
Therefore, the detection or manned landing on the Mars for research can help propose a pre-arranged planning to prevent the earth from becoming the second Mars which is difficult for human beings to inhabit.
因此,为研究目的在火星上探测或载人着陆可有助于提出预先安排的计划,以防止地球成为人类难以居住的第二颗火星。
Therefore, the detection or manned landing on the Mars for research can help enable a pre-arranged planning to prevent the earth from becoming the second Mars which is difficult for human beings to inhabit.
因此,为研究目的在火星上探测或载人着陆可有助于预先安排计划,防止地球成为人类难以居住的第二颗火星。
Therefore, the detection or manned landing on the Mars for research can help constitute a pre-arranged planning to prevent the earth from becoming the second Mars which is difficult for human beings to inhabit.
因此,为研究目的在火星上探测或载人着陆可以构成预先安排的计划,以防止地球成为人类难以居住的第二颗火星。
Therefore, the detection or manned landing on the Mars for research can help involve a pre-arranged planning to prevent the earth from becoming the second Mars which is difficult for human beings to inhabit.
因此,用于研究的火星探测或载人着陆可能涉及预先安排的计划,以防止地球成为人类难以居住的第二颗火星。
Therefore, the detection or manned landing on the Mars for research can help suggest a pre-arranged planning to prevent the earth from becoming the second Mars which is difficult for human beings to inhabit.
因此,为研究目的在火星上探测或载人着陆可能有助于提出预先安排的计划,以防止地球成为人类难以居住的第二颗火星。
Therefore, the detection or manned landing on the Mars for research can help in a pre-arranged planning to prevent the earth from becoming the second Mars which is difficult for human beings to inhabit.
因此,为研究目的在火星上探测或载人着陆可能有助于预先安排的计划,以防止地球成为人类难以居住的第二颗火星。
As of June 2016, the world conducted a total of 114 lunar explorations, including 43 Mars detection missions.
截至2016年6月,全世界共进行了114次月球探测,包括43次火星探测任务。

截至2016年6月,全世界共进行了114次月球探测,包括39次火星探测任务。
However, ever since the 1990s, a total of 18 human explorations have been carried out and only 14 lunar detections have been conducted.
然而,自1990年代以来,共进行了18次人类探测,只进行了14次月球探测。

However, ever since the 1990s, a total of 18 human explorations have been carried out and only 14 lunar detections have been reported.
然而,自1990年代以来,共进行了18次人类探测,只报告了14次月球探测。
However, ever since the 1990s, a total of 18 human explorations have been carried out and only 13 lunar detections have been conducted.
然而,自1990年代以来,共进行了18次人类探测,只进行了13次月球探测。
There are currently five Mars orbiters and two Mars rovers at work, but only one lunar orbiter and one lunar lander are at work.
目前有5个火星轨道飞行器和2个火星探测器在工作,但只有1个月球轨道飞行器和1个月球登陆器在工作。

World space powers have developed a detection plan with the Mars system as target. So we can see the current Mars detection is hotter than that of moon detection.
世界空间强国已经制定了一个以火星系统作为目标的探测计划,因此我们可以看到当前的火星探测比月球探测更热。

" Mangalian " is used to study the surface, the atmosphere and mineral characteristics of the Mars and explore whether there are signs of methane and life on the Mars.
“曼加利安号”用来研究火星的表面、大气层和矿物特性,并研究火星是否有甲烷和生命的迹象。

The atmospheric pressure of the Mars is very low, only 1 % of the Earth's surface atmospheric pressure, with high uncertainty.
火星的大气压力非常低,只占地球表面大气压力的1%,具有很高的不确定性。

科学家还没有对火星的地壳变化和风暴特征等因素有透彻的了解。
A dust storm similar to the Earth's dust is often formed in the Mars in the summer, which will lead to a sharp decline in solar energy. So a " sleep " mode must be designed for the Mars rover and let it wait patiently until the disappearance of dust storms.
夏季火星上经常形成类似于地球尘埃的沙尘暴,导致太阳能急剧下降,因此必须为火星漫游者设计一种“睡眠”模式,让它耐心地等待,直到尘暴消失。

此外,由于火星的重力仅为地球的38%,而且比月球表面的重力还要高,所以探测器需要更高的能量。
" The core and the most difficult part of the Mars exploration mission are the aerodynamic shape and parachute deceleration process after the probe enters Martian atmosphere. There is just one chance to ensure success. "
火星探险任务的核心和最困难的部分是探测器进入火星大气层后的气动形状和降落伞减速过程,只有一次机会可以保证成功。
" The core and the most difficult part of the Mars exploration mission are the aerodynamic shape and parachute deceleration process after the probe enters Martian atmosphere. There is just one chance to assure success. "
火星探测任务的核心和最困难的部分是探测器进入火星大气层后的气动形状和降落伞减速过程,只有一次机会可以保证成功。
" The core and the most difficult part of the Mars exploration mission are the aerodynamic shape and parachute deceleration process after the probe enters Martian atmosphere. There is just one chance to guarantee success. "
火星探险任务的核心和最困难的部分是探测器进入火星大气层后的气动形状和降落伞减速过程,只有一次机会保证成功。
" The core and the most difficult part of the Mars exploration mission are the aerodynamic shape and parachute deceleration process after the probe enters Martian atmosphere. There is just one chance to achieve success. "
火星探测任务的核心和最困难的部分是探测器进入火星大气层后的气动形状和降落伞减速过程,只有一次成功的机会。
" The core and the most difficult part of the Mars exploration mission are the aerodynamic shape and parachute deceleration process after the probe enters Martian atmosphere. There is just one chance to determine success. "
火星探险任务的核心和最困难的部分是探测器进入火星大气层后的气动力形状和降落伞减速过程,只有一次机会来确定成功与否。
" The core and the most difficult parts of the Mars exploration mission are the aerodynamic shape and parachute deceleration process after the probe enters Martian atmosphere. There is just one chance to ensure success. "
火星探险任务的核心和最困难的部分是探测器进入火星大气层后的气动形状和降落伞减速过程,只有一次机会可以保证成功。
According to Sun Ze, it must rely on the detector to complete the entire process because the distance between the Earth and the Mars is quite large.
根据太阳 Ze,它必须依靠探测器来完成整个过程,因为地球和火星之间的距离相当大。
According to Sun Ze, it must rely on the sensor to complete the entire process because the distance between the Earth and the Mars is quite large.
根据太阳 Ze,它必须依靠传感器来完成整个过程,因为地球和火星之间的距离相当大。
According to Sun Ze, it must rely on the telescope to complete the entire process because the distance between the Earth and the Mars is quite large.
根据太阳 Ze,它必须依靠望远镜来完成整个过程,因为地球和火星之间的距离相当大。
According to Sun Ze, it must rely on the probe to complete the entire process because the distance between the Earth and the Mars is quite large.
根据太阳 Ze的说法,它必须依靠探测器来完成整个过程,因为地球和火星之间的距离相当大。
According to Sun Ze, it must rely on the laser to complete the entire process because the distance between the Earth and the Mars is quite large.
根据太阳 Ze,它必须依靠激光来完成整个过程,因为地球和火星之间的距离相当大。
According to Sun Ze, it must rely on the radar to complete the entire process because the distance between the Earth and the Mars is quite large.
据太阳 Ze 说, 它 必须 依靠 雷达 来 完成 整个 过程, 因为 地球 和 火星 之间 的 距离 很大 。
Because there is not so much propellant to offset the high speed, the slowdown should rely on the atmosphere of the Mars while landing the Mars. However, it is quite difficult to simulate the atmosphere of the Mars on earth.
因为没有太多的推进剂来抵消高速,所以减速应该依靠火星的大气层来着陆火星,然而,要模拟地球上的火星的大气层是相当困难的。
Because there is not so much propellant to absorb the high speed, the slowdown should rely on the atmosphere of the Mars while landing the Mars. However, it is quite difficult to simulate the atmosphere of the Mars on earth.
由于没有太多的推进剂来吸收高速,减速应该依靠火星的大气层来着陆火星,然而,要模拟地球上的火星的大气层是相当困难的。
Because there is not so much propellant to sustain the high speed, the slowdown should rely on the atmosphere of the Mars while landing the Mars. However, it is quite difficult to simulate the atmosphere of the Mars on earth.
因为没有那么多的推进剂能维持高速,所以减速应该依靠火星上的大气层来着陆火星,但是模拟地球上的火星的大气层却相当困难。
Pang Zhihao said, in general, the way to detect the Mars is similar to the way to detect the moon. The entire process is also " surrounding, landing, patrolling and returning " to achieve the goal of manned landing on the Mars.
庞志豪说,一般而言,探测火星的方式与探测月球的方式相似,整个过程也是“环绕、着陆、巡逻和返回”,以达到在火星上载人着陆的目标。
Pang Zhihao said, in general, the way to detect the Mars is similar to the way to detect the Moon. The entire process is also " surrounding, landing, patrolling and returning " to achieve the goal of manned landing on the Mars.

Pang Zhihao said, in general, the way to detect the Mars is similar like the way to detect the moon. The entire process is also " surrounding, landing, patrolling and returning " to achieve the goal of manned landing on the Mars.
庞志豪说,一般地说,探测火星的方式和探测月球的方式相似,整个过程也是“环绕、着陆、巡逻和返回”,以达到载人登陆火星的目标。
Because the distance between the Mars and the earth is larger than that between the Moon and Earth, it needs to overcome a series of more complex technical difficulties before the Mars detection.
由于火星与地球之间的距离大于月球与地球之间的距离,因此在火星探测之前需要克服一系列更为复杂的技术困难。

Zhan Qixian said that, as long as there are party assets today, no one will give you social donations. So if the party were all confiscated away, then Kuomintang can just ask for social support and sponsorship, " You will have chance to go when there are no assets. "

Zhan Qixian also stressed that even if the Ill-gotten Party Assets Handling Regulations goes into effect and the Kuomintang party assets are not fully confiscated, the rest will continue to be confiscated as promised, the party asset will go null and the party will start from scratch.
詹齐相还强调,即使《党的所得资产处理条例》生效,国民党的资产也未被完全没收,其余资产将继续按照承诺没收,该党资产将变为无效,当事方将自始至终。
Zhan Qixian also stressed that even if the Ill-gotten Party Assets Handling Regulations goes into effect and the Kuomintang party assets are not fully confiscated, the rest will continue to be seized as promised, the party asset will go null and the party will start from scratch.
詹齐相还强调,即使《党的自生资产处理条例》生效,国民党的资产也未被完全没收,其余资产将继续按照承诺扣押,该党的资产将无效,该党将自始至终。

Original article : Suit launched by " corridor doctor " Lan Yuefeng against CCTV host Wang Zhi'an for reputation infringement fails in instance judgment
Lan Yeefeng“走廊医生”对央视主持人王志安提出的侵犯名誉诉讼,在审判中均不成立
The legal evening news : Because the CCTV host Wang Zhi'an published his remarks against the " corridor doctor " event on microblogging, Lan Yuefeng brought Wang Zhi'an and Beijing Micro Dream Chuangke Network Technology Co., Ltd. to the court.
法定晚间新闻:由于央视主持人王智安发表了对微博“走廊医生”活动的讲话,兰岳峰将王智安和北京微型梦庄科网络科技有限公司带入法庭。
The legal evening news : Because the CCTV host Wang Zhi'an published his remarks against the " corridor physician " event on microblogging, Lan Yuefeng brought Wang Zhi'an and Beijing Micro Dream Chuangke Network Technology Co., Ltd. to the court.
法定晚间新闻:由于央视主持人王智安发表了他针对微博“走廊医师”事件的讲话,兰岳峰将王智安和北京微梦创科网络科技有限公司带入法庭。

法定晚间新闻:由于央视主持人王智安发表了对微博“走廊医生”活动的讲话,兰岳峰将王智安和北京数据梦创科网络科技有限公司带入法庭。
Yesterday afternoon, Haidian court sentenced the case and the verdict said that Wang Zhi'an and Micro Dream Company did not constitute the infringement and dismissed the Lan Yuefeng for all the claims.
昨日下午,海淀法院对案件作出判决,裁定王志安和微梦公司不构成侵权,并驳回兰岳峰的所有索赔。
Yesterday afternoon, Haidian court sentenced the case and the verdict said that Wang Zhi'an and Micro Sun Company did not constitute the infringement and dismissed the Lan Yuefeng for all the claims.

Yesterday afternoon, Haidian court sentenced the case and the verdict said that Wang Zhi'an and Micro Dream Company did neither constitute the infringement and dismissed the Lan Yuefeng for all the claims.
昨日下午,海淀法庭宣判了该案件,判决称王志安和微梦公司既未构成侵权,也未因所有索赔要求而驳回兰岳峰。
Yesterday afternoon, Haidian court sentenced the case and the verdict said that Wang Zhi'an and Micro Dream Company did nothing constitute the infringement and dismissed the Lan Yuefeng for all the claims.
昨日下午,海淀法庭宣判了该案件,判决称王志安和微梦公司没有构成侵权,并驳回了兰岳峰的所有索赔要求。

According to foreign media reports, Zhang Huizhen, the 27-year-old Korean archery female player won the gold medal in the women's archery individual tournament. This is the second scoring of Olympic gold medal following the team competition. This made she become a double winner.
据外国媒体报道,27岁的韩射箭女运动员张惠珍在女子射箭个人锦标赛中夺得了金牌,这是在比赛之后获得的第二枚奥运金牌,这使她成为了双赢者。

Zhang Huizhen is considered as a late bloomer. She regrets about not winning the last session of the London Olympic Games tickets before, but now she proudly stands on the top of the Rio Olympic podium.
张惠珍被认为是一个晚开球者,她后悔没有赢得上届伦敦奥运会的门票,但是现在她自豪地站在了里约热内卢奥运讲台上。
Zhang Huizhen is regarded as a late bloomer. She regrets about not winning the last session of the London Olympic Games tickets before, but now she proudly stands on the top of the Rio Olympic podium.
张惠珍被视为晚开球手,她后悔没能赢得上届伦敦奥运会的门票,但是现在她自豪地站在了里约奥运讲台的顶端。
Zhang Huizhen is viewed as a late bloomer. She regrets about not winning the last session of the London Olympic Games tickets before, but now she proudly stands on the top of the Rio Olympic podium.
张惠珍被视为晚开球手,她后悔没能赢得上届伦敦奥运会的门票,但是现在她自豪地站在了里约热内卢奥运讲台上。
Zhang Huizhen won the gold medal in Lisa Wenglu, a total score of 6-2 in the women's archery finals at the Samba Boulevard in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
张惠珍在里约热内卢桑巴大道女子射箭决赛中夺得了丽莎温格鲁(Lisa Wenglu)的金牌,总分为6-2。
Zhang Huizhen won the gold medal in Yu Wenglu, a total score of 6-2 in the women's archery finals at the Samba Boulevard in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
张惠珍在于温格鲁夺得金牌,在巴西里约热内卢桑巴大道女子射箭决赛中总分为6-2。
Zhang Huizhen won the gold medal in Jiang Wenglu, a total score of 6-2 in the women's archery finals at the Samba Boulevard in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
张辉镇在江温鹿获得金牌,巴西里约热内卢桑巴大道女子射箭决赛总分为6-2。
Zhang Huizhen won the gold medal in Xu Wenglu, a total score of 6-2 in the women's archery finals at the Samba Boulevard in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
张惠珍在徐文鲁获得金牌,在巴西里约热内卢桑巴大道女子射箭决赛中总分为6-2。
Zhang Huizhen won the gold medal in Liu Wenglu, a total score of 6-2 in the women's archery finals at the Samba Boulevard in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
张惠珍在刘文禄获得金牌,巴西里约热内卢桑巴大道女子射箭决赛总分为6-2。
Zhang Huizhen won the gold medal in Zheng Wenglu, a total score of 6-2 in the women's archery finals at the Samba Boulevard in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
张惠珍在郑文禄获得金牌,在巴西里约热内卢桑巴大道女子射箭决赛中总分为6-2。
She did archery for the first time in the fourth grade of primary school. She won the first individual tournament gold medal when she was 27 in 2014. So she is a late bloomer.
她在小学四年级第一次射箭,2014年她27岁时赢得了第一块个人锦标赛金牌,所以她是个晚开球手。

Zhang Huizhen was ranked the fourth at the London Olympic Games qualification trials. Unfortunately, she lost the Olympic admission and can just watch her colleague and good friend Qi Pubei score two gold medals.

Yesterday, Huaxia Bank and Shanghai Pudong Development Bank issued a semi-annual report of the year 2016. In the second quarter, China Securities Finance Corporation Limited ( CSFC ) will once again buy their shares.
昨天,华夏银行和上海浦东发展银行发布了2016年的半年期报告,第二季度,中国证券金融有限公司将再次收购其股票。

昨天,华夏银行和上海浦东发展银行公布了2016年的半年期报告。第二季度,中国证券金融有限公司(CSFC)将再次收购其股票。
Yesterday, Huaxia Bank and Shanghai Pudong Development Bank released a semi-annual report of the year 2016. In the second quarter, China Securities Finance Corporation Limited ( CSFC ) will once again buy their shares.
昨天,华夏银行和上海浦东发展银行发布了2016年的半年期报告。第二季度,中国证券金融有限公司(CSFC)将再次收购其股票。
According to the estimates of China Merchants Securities, deducted from the shares, CSFC will hold another 38 million shares of Pudong Development Bank in the second quarter and raise its shares to almost 600 million shares, which account for 2. 77 % of the bank shares.
根据从股票中扣除的招商证券(China Merchant Securities)的估计,中投第二季度将再持有浦东发展银行(Pudong Development Bank)的3800万股股份,并将该股上市至近6亿股,占该行股票的2.77%。

During the competition period of the Australia and Japanese team, the environmental conditions of the water polo pond gradually worsened, but the official stressed that they would manage to return the water quality of the two pools to their original colors on the 11th day of the month.
在澳大利亚队和日本队的比赛期间,水球池的环境条件逐渐恶化,但该官员强调,他们将设法在每月第11天恢复这两个池子的水质。

我们了解到了导致水变色和水质碱性的一系列原因。

我们了解到了导致水变色和水质碱性的多种原因。
" We learned about a network of causes that could cause discoloration of water and result in the alkalinity of water quality. "
我们了解了导致水变色和水质碱性的起因网络。
" We learned about a variety of causes that could cause discoloration of water and result in the alkalinity of water quality. "
我们了解到了导致水变色和水质碱性的多种原因。
" We learned about a series of causes that could cause discoloration of water and result in the alkalinity of water source. "
我们了解到一系列可能导致水变色和导致水源碱性的成因。
The water sports center conducted a series of tests on water quality, and hundreds of divers and swimmers used the swimming pool to determine whether the water quality meets criteria. "
水上运动中心进行了一系列水质测试,数百名潜水员和游泳运动员利用泳池来确定水质是否符合标准。
The water sports center conducted a series of tests on water quality, and hundreds of divers and swimmers utilized the swimming pool to determine whether the water quality meets criteria. "

" We had hoped that the pool would return to normal color in the morning, but the speed of recovery was affected by the rain. "

Urumqi normalizes the operating order of travel tourism market and regulates that travel agencies must sign contracts with tourists
乌鲁木齐使旅游市场的经营秩序正常化,并规定旅行社必须与游客签订合同
Urumqi normalizes the operating order of travel tourism market and regulates that travel agencies must sign contracts with visitors
乌鲁木齐使旅游市场的经营秩序正常化,并规定旅行社必须与游客签订合同

Urumqi normalizes the operating order of travel tourism market and regulates that travel agencies must sign contracts with tourism
乌鲁木齐使旅游市场的经营秩序正常化,并规定旅行社必须与旅游业签订合同
Urumqi normalizes the operating order of travel tourism market and regulates that travel agencies must sign contracts with tours
乌鲁木齐使旅游市场的经营秩序正常化,并规定旅行社必须与旅游团签订合同
Currently, Xinjiang has entered peak tourist season. In order to regulate the management order of tourism FIT market, yesterday Urumqi City Tourism Law Enforcement Detachment worked with the law enforcement detachment of Urumqi Transportation Authority to investigate and deal with the non-normative travel vehicles existent in the tourism FIT market, and the low contract signing between the travel agency and tourists.
目前,新疆已进入旅游旺季,为了规范旅游FIT市场的管理秩序,乌鲁木齐市旅游执法分遣队昨日与乌鲁木齐运输局执法分遣队合作,调查并处理旅游FIT市场存在的非规范旅行车辆,以及旅行社与旅游者之间签定的合同少的问题。
Currently, Xinjiang has entered peak tourist season. In order to regulate the management order of tourism FIT market, yesterday Urumqi City Tourism Law Enforcement Detachment worked with the law enforcement detachment of Urumqi Transportation Authority to investigate and deal with the non-normative travel vehicle existent in the tourism FIT market, and the low contract signing between the travel agency and tourists.
目前,新疆已进入旅游旺季,为了规范旅游FIT市场的管理秩序,乌鲁木齐市旅游执法分遣队昨日与乌鲁木齐运输局执法分遣队合作,调查并处理旅游FIT市场存在的非规范旅游车辆,以及旅行社与旅游者之间签定的合同少的问题。

" Hello, I am from the Urumqi City Tourism Bureau. Did you pass with the travel agency ? "
“ 你好, 我是乌鲁木齐市旅游局的. 你经过旅行社 吗? ”
" Hi, I am from the Urumqi City Tourism Bureau. Did you sign with the travel agency ? "
“ 你好, 我是乌鲁木齐市旅游局的. 你和旅行社签了字 吗? ”
" Yes, I am from the Urumqi City Tourism Bureau. Did you sign with the travel agency ? "
“ 是的, 我是乌鲁木齐市旅游局的. 你和旅行社签了字 吗? ”
Yu Bin, the working staff of law enforcement detachment of Urumqi Transportation Authority explained, " The foreign tourist bus and bus line worked on tourist transport project in Urumqi market, but they did not have qualification. "
乌鲁木齐运输局执法分遣队的工作人员于斌解释说,“外国旅游巴士和巴士线路在乌鲁木齐市场从事旅游交通工程,但他们没有资格。”

" A fine of 30, 000 to 100, 000 yuan will be imposed for operation beyond scope. The driver who did not have a qualification certificate will pay RMB 2, 000 for fine. "
经营范围外的,处三万元以上十万元以下的罚款,无资质证书的,由司机处以二千元以下的罚款。

经营范围外的,处三万元以上十万元以下的罚款,无资质卡的,由司机处以二千元以下的罚款。

After integrating the inspection twice, Ma Qi, the deputy head of Urumqi City Tourism Law Enforcement Detachment said that, " Safety first, norm second. No small matters for the travel vehicles. And people will be injured and killed in groups in case of any questions. "
乌鲁木齐市旅游执法分遣队副队长马齐两次整合检查后表示,“安全第一,规范第二,对旅行车辆而言,没有什么小事。如果发生任何问题,都会有人受伤或被集体杀害。”

" The management and we have made continuous inspection on the market to normalize the car use behavior of tourist agency to ensure the safety of tourists. "
管理层和我们不断对市场进行检查,以使旅游代理商的汽车使用行为规范化,确保游客的安全。

管理层和我们不断对市场进行检查,以使旅游代理商的汽车消费行为正常化,确保旅游者的安全。

On the morning of August 12, the State Council Information Office held a press conference on the operation of the national economy in July 2016.
8月12日上午,国务院新闻办公室举行国民经济运行新闻发布会。
On the morning of August 12, the State Council Information Office held a press conference on the operation of the national economy in July 2015.
8月12日上午,国务院新闻办公室于2015年7月召开了国民经济运行新闻发布会。
Sheng Yunyun, spokesman of National Bureau of Statistics and head of National Economic Statistics Division said that, in July, the part index number of national economy slowed relatively but still operated in the reasonable range.
国家统计局发言人、国家经济统计司司长沈云云表示,7月份国民经济的部分指数相对放缓,但仍在合理范围内运行。
Sheng Yunyun, spokesman of National Bureau of Statistics and head of National Economic Statistics Division said that, in June, the part index number of national economy slowed relatively but still operated in the reasonable range.

国家统计局发言人、国家经济统计司司长沈云云说,7月份,国民经济的部分指数相对放缓,但仍处于正常水平。
Sheng Yunyun, spokesman of National Bureau of Statistics and head of National Economic Statistics Division said that, in July, the part index number of national economy slowed relatively but still operated in the stable range.
国家统计局发言人、国家经济统计司司长沈云云表示,7月份国民经济的部分指数相对放缓,但仍处于稳定运行范围之内。
According to the data of National Bureau of Statistics, the fixed asset investment growth, total imports and other data in July have come down.
根据国家统计局的数据,7月份固定资产投资增长、进口总额和其他数据已经下降。

He explained that " the shape of the fluctuations " refers to the fall after rise of some economic indicators growth rate in July.
他解释说,“波动的形状”是指7月份一些经济指标增长率上升后出现的下降。

At present, at least 28 provinces in the country have clearly defined the standard of the allowance, but the standards issued by provinces and municipalities are not the same, and people in Chongqing receive the allowance based on the count of high-temperature working days.
目前,全国至少有28个省明确规定了补贴标准,但省市发放的标准不同,重庆人民根据高温工作日数领取补贴。
At present, at least 28 provinces in the country have clearly defined the standard of the allowance, but the standard issued by provinces and municipalities are not the same, and people in Chongqing receive the allowance based on the count of high-temperature working days.
目前,全国至少有28个省明确规定了补贴标准,但省市发放的标准不同,重庆人民根据高温工作日数领取补贴。
At present, at least 28 provinces in the country have clearly defined the standard of the allowance, but the standards issued by provinces and municipalities are not the same, and people in Chongqing receive the allowance based on the count of high-temperatures working days.
目前,全国至少有28个省明确规定了补贴标准,但省市发放的标准不同,重庆人民根据高温工作日数领取补贴。
In case of temperature between 35 and 37 [UNK], people can receive allowance of no less than 10 yuan per day. In case of temperature above [UNK], people are released with the allowance of not less than 15 yuan.
温度在35°C至37°C之间时,每人每天可享受不低于10元的零用钱。温度高于[UNK]时,每人可享受不低于15元的零用钱。
In case of temperature between 35 and 37 [UNK], people can receive allowance of no less than 10 yuan per day. In case of temperature below [UNK], people are released with the allowance of not less than 15 yuan.
温度在35°C至37°C之间时,每人每天可享受不低于10元的零用钱。温度低于[UNK]时,每人可享受不低于15元的零用钱。
In case of temperature above [UNK], staff working in high temperature can receive up to 20 yuan per day of allowance ( but for laborers who enjoy the high temperature job allowance ).
如果温度高于[香港],高温工作者每天可获得最高20元的补贴(但享受高温工作补贴的劳动者除外)。

In case of temperature above [UNK], staff working in high temperature can receive up to 200 yuan per day of allowance ( but for laborers who enjoy the high temperature job allowance ).

In accordance with this standard, people in Kaizhou which has the highest number of high temperature can receive 330 yuan. And people in Chengkou with the least days of high temperature can receive 80 yuan. And the maximum temperature of Youyang did not meet the high temperature standards, so there is no high temperature allowance.
按照这一标准,高温最高的国家的开州人民可以获得330元人民币,高温最低的成口人民可以获得80元人民币,而优阳最高气温不符合高温标准,因此没有高温允许值。

In the past, many companies adopt cool drinks as high temperature allowance. The city safety supervision bureau deemed that this behavior does not meet the current regulation.
过去,很多公司都采用冷饮作为高温允许。城市安全监督局认为,这种做法不符合现行规定。

过去,很多公司都采用冷饮作为高温允许。城市安全监督局认为,这种做法不符合现行标准。
In the past, some companies adopt cool drinks as high temperature allowance. The city safety supervision bureau deemed that this behavior does not meet the current regulation.
过去,有些公司采用冷饮作为高温允许。城市安全监督局认为,这种做法不符合现行规定。
In the past, Many companies adopt cool drinks as high temperature allowance. The city safety supervision bureau deemed that this behavior does not meet the current regulation.
过去,很多公司都采用冷饮作为高温允许。城市安全监督局认为,这种做法不符合现行规定。
Employer shall not deduct or reduce the wages of workers in case of terminating work and reducing working hours in high temperature weather.
在高温天气中,雇主不得扣减或减少工人工资,以免终止工作和缩短工作时间。
Employer shall not deduct or decrease the wages of workers in case of terminating work and reducing working hours in high temperature weather.
在高温天气中,雇主不得扣减或减少工人工资,以免终止工作和缩短工作时间。
Employer shall not deduct or increase the wages of workers in case of terminating work and reducing working hours in high temperature weather.
在高温天气中,雇主不得扣除或增加工人的工资,以免终止工作和缩短工作时间。
Employer shall not deduct or reduced the wages of workers in case of terminating work and reducing working hours in high temperature weather.
在高温天气中,雇主不得扣减或减少工人工资,以免终止工作和缩短工作时间。
Employer shall not deduct or reducing the wages of workers in case of terminating work and reducing working hours in high temperature weather.
在高温天气中,雇主不得扣除或减少工人的工资,以免终止工作和缩短工作时间。
Employer shall not deduct or reduce the wages of workers in case of terminating work and reducing working hour in high temperature weather.
在高温天气中,雇主不得因停止工作和减少工作时间而扣减或减少工人的工资。
The city's Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that if employees did not receive high temperature allowance while working under high temperature, they may fight for the legitimate rights and interests via the labor dispute mediation organization or dial 12333 for complaint.
北京市人力资源和社会保障局表示,如果员工在高温工作期间没有享受高温补贴,可以通过劳动争议调解机构为合法权益而斗争,或者致电12333投诉。
The city's Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that if employees did not receive high temperature allowance while working under high temperature, they may fight for the legitimate rights and interests through the labor dispute mediation organization or dial 12333 for complaint.
北京市人力资源和社会保障局表示,如果员工在高温工作期间没有享受高温补贴,可以通过劳动争议调解机构为合法权益而斗争,或者致电12333投诉。
The city's Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that if employees did not receive high temperature allowance while working under high temperature, they may fight for the legitimate rights and interests via the labor dispute mediation organization or dial 14333 for complaint.
北京市人力资源和社会保障局表示,如果员工在高温环境下工作时没有享受高温补贴,可以通过劳动争议调解机构为合法权益而斗争,或者致电14333投诉。
The city's Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that if employees did not receive high temperature allowance while working under high temperature, they may fight for the legitimate rights and interests via the labor dispute mediation organization or dial 7333 for complaint.

The city's Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that if employees did not receive high temperature allowance while working under high temperature, they may fight for the legitimate rights and interests via the labor dispute mediation organization or dial 12133 for complaint.

If the employing unit refuses to pay the high temperature allowance, the laborer may lodge a complaint with the competent department of human resources social security at the county level or above.
用人单位拒绝支付高温补贴的,可以向县级以上人力资源社会保障主管部门提出申诉。

At the same time, because the high temperature allowance is part of the wage and not welfare, such allowance shall be included in the total wages, with tax deducted.
同时,由于高温津贴是工资的一部分,而不是福利,所以这种津贴应列入工资总额,并扣除税款。
At the same time, because the high temperature allowance is part of the wage and not welfare, such allowance shall be included in the total wage, with tax deducted.
同时,由于高温津贴是工资的一部分,而不是福利,所以这种津贴应列入工资总额,并扣除税款。
At the same time, because the high temperature allowance is part of the wage and not welfare, such allowance shall be included in the total wages, with taxes deducted.
同时,由于高温津贴是工资的一部分,而不是福利,所以这种津贴应列入工资总额,并扣除税款。
At the same time, because the high temperature allowance is part of the wage and not welfare, such allowance shall be counted in the total wages, with tax deducted.
同时,由于高温津贴是工资的一部分,不是福利,所以这种津贴应计入工资总额,并扣除税款。
So the high temperature allowance is not within the minimum wage, it must be issued in cash and not substituted by physical objects such as drinks.
因此,高温津贴不低于最低工资标准,必须用现金发放,不得用饮料等实物取而代之。
So the high temperature allowance is not within the minimum wage, it must be issued in cash and not replaced by physical objects such as drinks.

乌鲁木齐新铁路站正式投入运行后,将成为建设国家综合交通城市、推进丝绸之路经济区建设和新区建设的重要平台。

" The situation of Gracia is very special, and its remaining part of the beak is less than 1 centimeter, so there are many difficulties in installing the new beak. "
“格拉西亚的情况非常特殊,它剩下的部分喙不到1厘米,所以安装新喙有很多困难。”
" The situation of Gracia is very special, and its remaining part of the beak is less than 1 centimeter, so there are many difficulties in installing the replacement beak. "
“格拉西亚的情况非常特殊,它剩下的部分喙不到1厘米,所以安装更换喙有很多困难。”
" The situation of Gracia is very special, and its remaining part of the toak is less than 1 centimeter, so there are many difficulties in installing the new beak. "
“格拉西亚的情况非常特殊,它的余下部分瓶盖不到1厘米,所以安装新瓶盖有很多困难。”
" The situation of Gracia is very special, and its remaining part of the thatak is less than 1 centimeter, so there are many difficulties in installing the new beak. "
“格拉西亚的情况非常特殊,它剩下的部分在1厘米以下,所以安装新喙有很多困难。”
" The situation of Gracia is very special, and its remaining part of the aak is less than 1 centimeter, so there are many difficulties in installing the new beak. "
“格拉西亚的情况非常特殊,它的余下部分的阿克不到1厘米,所以安装新喙有很多困难。”
" The situation of Gracia is very special, and its remaining part of the withak is less than 1 centimeter, so there are many difficulties in installing the new beak. "
“格拉西亚的情况非常特殊,它剩下的部分小于1厘米,所以安装新喙有很多困难。”
" We first scanned Gracia and then designed and produced an extended prosthesis slightly longer than the rest of its beak and fixed on its beak with glue. "
我们先扫描了格拉西亚,然后设计并生产了一个延伸假体,比其喙的其余部分稍长一点,并用胶固在喙上。
" We first scanned Gracia and then designed and produced an extended prosthesis slightly longer than the rest of its beak and fixed on its toak with glue. "
我们先扫描了格拉西亚,然后设计并生产了一个延伸的假体,比其喙的其余部分稍长一点,并用胶水固定在喙上。

Before installing the prosthesis, the staff cleared the broken beak of Gracia every day to prevent infection.
在安装假体之前,工作人员每天清扫格拉西亚断裂的嘴,以防止感染。

在安装假体之前,工作人员每天清理Gracia的破瓶,以防止感染。

Before obtaining the import license for crude oil, " teapot refinery " generally refines oil from the heavy oil, which has high sulfur content and is imported from Russia.

The petroleum products are poor in quality due to high sulfur content and become one of the causes of environmental pollution.
石油产品由于硫含量高,质量较差,已成为造成环境污染的原因之一。

The petroleum products are high in quality due to high sulfur content and become one of the causes of environmental pollution.
石油产品由于硫含量高而质量高,已成为造成环境污染的原因之一。
The petroleum products are rich in quality due to high sulfur content and become one of the causes of environmental pollution.
石油产品由于硫含量高而质量丰富,已成为造成环境污染的原因之一。
The petroleum products are crude in quality due to high sulfur content and become one of the causes of environmental pollution.
石油产品由于含硫量高而质量不菲,已成为造成环境污染的原因之一。
The petroleum products are poor in quality due to the sulfur content and become one of the causes of environmental pollution.
石油产品由于含硫量而质量较差,已成为造成环境污染的原因之一。
After obtaining crude oil import license, " teapot refinery " can import Oman crude oil and Russian crude oil, which have low sulfur content and improved petroleum products.
“茶壶炼油厂”在获得原油进口许可证后,可以进口低含硫量和改进石油产品的阿曼原油和俄罗斯原油。
After obtaining crude oil import license, " teapot refinery " can import Oman crude oil and Russian crude oil, which have high sulfur content and improved petroleum products.

After obtaining crude oil import license, " teapot refinery " can import Oman crude oil and Russian crude oil, which have lower sulfur content and improved petroleum products.
在获得原油进口许可证后,茶壶炼油厂可以进口阿曼原油和俄罗斯原油,这些原油硫含量较低,石油产品也有所改善。
After obtaining crude oil import license, " teapot refinery " can import Oman crude oil and Russian crude oil, which have less sulfur content and improved petroleum products.
在获得原油进口许可后,茶壶炼油厂可以进口阿曼原油和俄罗斯原油,这些原油的硫含量较低,石油产品也有所改善。
After obtaining crude oil import license, " teapot refinery " can import Oman crude oil and Russian crude oil, which have low sulfur content and superior petroleum products.
“茶壶炼油厂”在获得原油进口许可证后,可以进口低硫、高石油产品的阿曼原油和俄罗斯原油。

According to JX Energy, " After the end of 2015, China began to export high-quality light oil to Australia. " Such light oil products are competitive with Japanese products on the Asian market.
据JX能源公司介绍,2015年底以后,中国开始向澳大利亚出口优质轻质油,这类轻质油产品与亚洲市场的日本产品具有竞争力。
According to JX Energy, " After the end of 2015, China began to export high-quality light oil to Queensland. " Such light oil products are competitive with Japanese products on the Asian market.
据JX能源公司介绍,2015年底以后,中国开始向昆士兰出口优质轻质油,这类轻质油产品与亚洲市场的日本产品具有竞争力。
According to JX Energy, " After the end of 2015, China began to export high-quality light oil to Australia. " Such light oil products are competitive alongside Japanese products on the Asian market.
据JX能源公司介绍,2015年底,中国开始向澳大利亚出口优质轻质油,这类轻质油产品与亚洲市场的日本产品具有竞争力。
According to JX Energy, " From the end of 2015, China began to export high-quality light oil to Australia. " Such light oil products are competitive with Japanese products on the Asian market.

According to JX Energy, " At the end of 2015, China began to export high-quality light oil to Australia. " Such light oil products are competitive with Japanese products on the Asian market.

Although the " Japanese high quality oil " falls into a crisis, the Japanese oil companies just adopted the strategy of " exporting to profitable areas while being concerned about the market ".
尽管“日本高品质石油”陷入危机,日本石油公司刚刚采取了“出口至有利可图的地区,同时关注市场”的战略。
Although the " Japanese high quality oil " falls into a crisis, the Japanese oil companies just adopted the strategy of " exporting to profitable regions while being concerned about the market ".

Although the " Japanese high quality oil " falls into a crisis, the Japanese oil companies just adopted the strategy of " exporting to profitable countries while being concerned about the market ".

Although the " Japanese high quality oil " falls into a crisis, the Japanese oil companies just adopted the strategy of " exporting to profitable area while being concerned about the market ".

Although the " Japanese high quality oil " falls into a crisis, the Japanese oil companies just adopted the strategy of " exporting to profitable markets while being concerned about the market ".

Although the " Japanese high quality oil " falls into a crisis, the Japanese oil companies just adopted the strategy of " exporting to lucrative areas while being concerned about the market ".
尽管“日本高品质石油”陷入危机,日本石油公司刚刚采取了“向利润丰厚地区出口的同时关注市场”的战略。
As China's exports of petroleum products have a huge impact on the Asian market, teapot refinery got more attentions.

" Liqun sunshine student action " is a well-known Chinese charity brand. Yangzi Evening News Liqun sunshine student action has been initiated in Jiangsu since 2003. More than 4, 000 students have been supported.
“酒井阳光学生行动”是中国知名的慈善品牌,自2003年起,羊子晚间新闻“酒井阳光学生行动”在江苏启动,已有4000多名学生获得了支持。

The scope of the fund covers college entrance freshmen, excluding tuition-free majors. Students qualified for the fund should have excellent study performance and family poverty.
基金范围涵盖高校新生入学,但不包括免缴学费的专业。符合基金条件的学生应具有优秀的学习成绩及家庭贫困。

According to the statistics bureau, the population growth of New Zealand had previously exceeded 2 % in 1974 and during the 1950s-1960s ( " baby boom " ).
据国家统计局统计,新西兰的人口增长率在1974年和1950年代-1960年代("婴儿潮")曾超过2%。

As of June this year, New Zealand's net inflow of immigrants within 12 months was 69, 100, making it the main driver of New Zealand's population growth in recent years.
截至今年6月,新西兰在12个月内移民净流入量为69 100人,使其成为新西兰近年来人口增长的主要驱动力。

此外,在可比期间,新西兰人口增加了28 200人。
From the population structure point of view, a large influx of immigrants means that the ratio of " working age population " aged 15 to 39 years old gradually expanded.
从人口结构的角度来看,大量移民涌入意味着年龄在15岁至39岁之间的"工作年龄人口"的比例逐渐扩大。

截至2016年6月,新西兰劳动适龄人口增加了3.6%,达到1.58亿人。

Sunblock is generally marked with SPF and PA on the package. SPF refers to Sun Protection Function and is targeted at UVB. The common SPF index includes 15, 30, 50, etc.
Sundlock通常在包件上标有SPF和PA。SPF是指太阳保护功能,以UVB为对象。一般SPF指数包括15、30、50等。
Sunblock is generally marked with SPF and PA on the package. SPF refers to Sun Protection Function and is targeted at UVB. The popular SPF index includes 15, 30, 50, etc.
Sundlock通常在包件上标有SPF和PA。SPF是指太阳保护功能,以UVB为对象。通用SPF指数包括15、30、50等。
Sunblock is generally marked with SPF or PA on the package. SPF refers to Sun Protection Function and is targeted at UVB. The common SPF index includes 15, 30, 50, etc.
Sundlock通常在包件上标有SPF或PA。SPF是指太阳保护功能,目标是紫外线。一般SPF指数包括15、30、50等。
The product marked with PA is for UVA, so that sunblock will play a more effective role. Usually, the intensity of PA is represented with +. An extra + indicates extension of effective protection time.
标有PA的产品是UVA的,因此防晒霜的作用会更加有效。通常PA的强度用+表示。额外的+表示有效保护时间的延长。
The product marked with PA is for UVA, so that sunblock will play a more protective role. Usually, the intensity of PA is represented with +. An extra + indicates extension of effective protection time.
标有PA的产品是UVA的,因此防晒霜的作用会更大。通常PA的强度用+表示。额外的+表示有效保护时间的延长。
The product marked with PA is for UVA, so that sunblock will play a more active role. Usually, the intensity of PA is represented with +. An extra + indicates extension of effective protection time.
标有PA的产品是UVA的,因此防晒霜的作用会更积极。通常PA的强度用+表示。额外的+表示有效保护时间的延长。
The product marked with PA is for UVA, so that sunblock will play a more UV role. Usually, the intensity of PA is represented with +. An extra + indicates extension of effective protection time.
使用PA标记的产品是UVA,这样防晒霜的作用就更大了。通常PA的强度用+表示。一个额外的+表示有效保护时间的延长。

Water-based sunblock with a strong penetration is often applied to oily skin. Sunscreen spray is also a good choice.
渗透性强的水性防晒霜常适用于油性皮肤,防晒剂也是很好的选择。

Water-based sunblock with a high penetration is often applied to oily skin. Sunscreen spray is also a good choice.

Water-based sunblock with a hard penetration is often applied to oily skin. Sunscreen spray is also a good choice.
含水的防晒霜通常会刺穿油性皮肤,防晒剂也是很好的选择。
Water-based sunblock with a tight penetration is often applied to oily skin. Sunscreen spray is also a good choice.
渗透性较强的水性防晒霜常适用于油性皮肤,防晒剂也是很好的选择。
Water-based sunblock with a sharp penetration is often applied to oily skin. Sunscreen spray is also a good choice.
渗透性强的水性防晒霜常用于油性皮肤,防晒剂也是很好的选择。
Creamy sunscreen is often applied to dry skin. The classification of neutral skin generally has no strict rules. Any kind of skin care products are burden to the sensitive skin. So it is recommended to choose pure physical sunscreen products.
干燥的皮肤经常使用防晒霜。中立的皮肤的分类通常没有严格的规则。任何种类的护肤品都会对敏感的皮肤造成负担。因此建议选择纯天然的防晒产品。

Remember to apply sunblock half an hour in advance, because sunscreen products take time to completely penetrate into the skin.
记住提前半小时涂上防晒霜,因为防晒霜产品需要时间才能完全穿透皮肤。

Remember to apply sunblock half an hour in advance, because sunscreen products last time to completely penetrate into the skin.
记得在半小时前涂上防晒霜,因为防晒霜产品上次完全渗透到皮肤上。

记住在半小时前涂上防晒霜,因为防晒霜产品需要时间才能完全穿透皮肤。
Remember to apply sunblock half an hour in advance, and sunscreen products take time to completely penetrate into the skin.
记得提前半个小时涂上防晒霜,防晒产品要花点时间才能完全穿透皮肤。
Because you are exposed to sun longer during the military training, you have to apply the sunscreen products once every two hours to lengthen the effect. So keep doing it.
由于你在军事训练中长时间暴露在太阳下,你必须每两个小时涂一次防晒产品来延长效果,所以继续这样做。
Because you are exposed to sun more during the military training, you have to apply the sunscreen products once every two hours to lengthen the effect. So keep doing it.
由于你在军事训练中暴露在太阳下的时间更多,你必须每两个小时涂一次防晒产品来延长效果,所以继续这样做。
Because you are exposed to sun long during the military training, you have to apply the sunscreen products once every two hours to lengthen the effect. So keep doing it.
由于你在军事训练中长时间暴露在阳光下,所以你必须每两个小时涂一次防晒产品来延长效果,所以继续做下去。

Because you are exposed to sun hours during the military training, you have to apply the sunscreen products once every two hours to lengthen the effect. So keep doing it.

As the skin has just been stimulated by the sun's sake, do not immediately use whitening products after returning from military training.
由于皮肤刚受到太阳的刺激,所以不要在经过训练回来后立即使用美白产品。

据报道,连续七年在卢迪举行湖南博览会,是湖南卢迪制造业的坚实基础,湖南卢迪有着悠久的工业发展历史。

During some nights, the ionized layer is full of free electrons, which means that the radio signal can go further.
在某些夜晚,离子化层中充满了自由电子,这意味着无线电信号可以向前推进。
During some evenings, the ionized layer is full of free electrons, which means that the radio signal can go further.
在有些晚上,电离层中充满了自由电子,这意味着无线电信号可以向前推进。

在几小时内,离子层中充斥着自由电子,这意味着无线电信号可以向前推进。
During some nights, the ionized layer is full of free electron, which means that the radio signal can go further.

According to the report of Popular Science, an American monthly website, on August 11, the US Air Force was interested in copying this effect.
根据美国月度网站《大众科学》(Population Science)的报道,8月11日,美国空军有意复制这一效果。

According to the report of Popular Science, an American monthly website, on August 11, the US air Force was interested in copying this effect.
根据美国月度网站《大众科学》(Population Science)的报道,8月11日,美国空军有意复制这一效果。
Although the stable ionizing layer with a large number of free electrons may help people listen to the radio at the edge of a university radio station, but this may not be the interest of the US Air Force.
尽管拥有大量自由电子的稳定的电离层可以帮助人们收听大学广播电台边缘的无线电,但这或许不是美国空军的兴趣所在。
Although the stable ionizing layer with a large number of free electrons may help people listen to the radio at the edge of a university radio station, but this may not be the interest of the US air Force.

尽管拥有大量自由电子的稳定的电离层可以帮助人们收听大学广播电台边缘的无线电,但这或许不是美国空军的兴趣所在。
Although the stable ionizing layer with a large number of free electrons may help people listen to the radio at the corner of a university radio station, but this may not be the interest of the US Air Force.
尽管拥有大量自由电子的稳定的电离层可以帮助人们收听大学广播电台角落的收音机,但这或许不是美国空军的兴趣所在。
Although the stable ionizing layer with a large number of free electrons may help people listen to the radio at the wall of a university radio station, but this may not be the interest of the US Air Force.
尽管拥有大量自由电子的稳定的电离层可以帮助人们收听大学广播电台墙上的无线电,但这或许不是美国空军的兴趣所在。
Although the stable ionizing layer with a large number of free electrons may help people listen to the radio at the end of a university radio station, but this may not be the interest of the US Air Force.
尽管拥有大量自由电子的稳定的电离层可以帮助人们收听大学广播电台的收音机,但这或许不是美国空军的兴趣所在。
Ionization layer full of electrons indicated the radio used by the military has a larger range of broadcasts. In addition, it may prevent the global positioning system ( GPS ) signal from the solar storm.
充斥电子的离子化层表明,军方使用的无线电广播范围更大,此外,还可能防止全球定位系统 ( GPS ) 的信号从太阳风暴中消失。
Ionization layer filled of electrons indicated the radio used by the military has a larger range of broadcasts. In addition, it may prevent the global positioning system ( GPS ) signal from the solar storm.
充填电子的离子化层表明,军方使用的无线电广播范围更大,此外,还可能防止全球定位系统 ( GPS ) 受到太阳风暴的干扰。
Ionization layer free of electrons indicated the radio used by the military has a larger range of broadcasts. In addition, it may prevent the global positioning system ( GPS ) signal from the solar storm.
离子化层无电子显示军用无线电广播的范围更大,此外,还可能防止全球定位系统 ( GPS ) 受到太阳风暴的干扰.
Ionization layer dense of electrons indicated the radio used by the military has a larger range of broadcasts. In addition, it may prevent the global positioning system ( GPS ) signal from the solar storm.
电离层密集的电子表明,军方使用的无线电广播范围较大,此外,还可能防止全球定位系统 ( GPS ) 受到太阳风暴的干扰。
Ionization layer composed of electrons indicated the radio used by the military has a larger range of broadcasts. In addition, it may prevent the global positioning system ( GPS ) signal from the solar storm.
由电子组成的离子化层表明,军方使用的无线电广播范围较大,此外,还可能防止全球定位系统 ( GPS ) 受到太阳风暴的干扰。
Ionization layer rich of electrons indicated the radio used by the military has a larger range of broadcasts. In addition, it may prevent the global positioning system ( GPS ) signal from the solar storm.
离子化层丰富的电子表明,军方使用的无线电广播范围更大,此外,还可能防止全球定位系统 ( GPS ) 受到太阳风暴的干扰。

工业数据显示,2015年煤炭总产量接近60亿吨,全国煤炭生产能力过剩达到18亿吨。

The old Wanfu River channel flows through Jinxiang, Yu Tai and then into the Nanyang Lake into the Beijing-Hangzhou Grand Canal main channel, with a total length of 32. 5 km.
万福河古河水流经金香、玉泰,然后流入南阳湖,进入北京杭州大运河主航道,总航程为32.5公里。
According to the navigation needs, the old Wanfu River channel takes the mode of conservation and transformation. Dredging was conducted on the local depth and curve cut-off on the local sharp bend. Then the navigation conditions can be improved.
根据航行需要,万福河老河道采用养护和变换方式,在局部深度进行疏浚,在局部弯曲处进行弯曲,从而改善航行条件。

In accordance with the " loan construction and charging for repaying loan " principle, Jining City Anping Canal Logistics Service Center will collect channel tolls according to the charge standard approved by Shandong Provincial Price Bureau.

Zhushuihe Channel Upgrade Renovation Project is the first project adopting the mode of " government + market " for the infrastructure construction of river and ports within Shandong province. The government accounts for the major part of investment while social fund supplements the funding gap.

“现在三轮车大部分是在夜间非法运行的,我们希望有关当局也能够加大努力进行翻修。”

Recently, the 10th China International Folk Art Festival, hosted by the China Federation of Literary and Art Circles and the Qinghai Provincial Government, kicked off in Xining, Qinghai province.
不久前,由中国文艺界联合会和青海省政府主办的第10届中国国际民间艺术节在青海省西宁开幕。
Recently, the 10th China International Folk Art Festival, sponsored by the China Federation of Literary and Art Circles and the Qinghai Provincial Government, kicked off in Xining, Qinghai province.
不久前,由中国文艺界联合会和青海省政府主办的第10届中国国际民间艺术节在青海省西宁开幕。
Recently, the 10th China International Folk Art Festival, hosted by the China Federation of Literary and Art Circles and the Qinghai Provincial Government, kicked off in Xining, Qinghai Province.
不久前,由中国文艺界联合会和青海省政府主办的第十届中国国际民间艺术节在青海省西宁开幕。
Some 300 artists from the art troupe of 13 countries and regions from five continents gathered together and brought a wonderful performance with quite international and national folk characteristics for audiences.

On the 11th day of the month, the Tajikistan " Avesta " news agency, quoting the news of the central bank, said that the inflation rate of Tajikistan in the first 7 months of this year was 3. 7 %.
本月第11天,塔吉克斯坦“阿韦斯塔”新闻社援引中央银行的消息说,今年头7个月塔吉克斯坦的通胀率为3.
On the 11th day of the month, the Tajikistan " Avesta " news agency, quoting the news of the central bank, said that the inflation rate of Tajikistan in the first 7 quarters of this year was 3. 7 %.
本月11日,塔吉克斯坦“阿韦斯塔”通讯社援引中央银行的消息称,今年前7个季度塔吉克斯坦的通胀率为3.
According to the report, the goal of the Tajikistan government is to control the annual inflation rate in 2016 as 7. 5 % while that in 2015 was 5. 1 %.
报告称,塔吉克斯坦政府的目标是将2016年的年通胀率控制在7. 5%,而2015年为5.
According to the report, the goal of the Tajikistan government is to control the annual inflation rate in 2016 as 7. 5 % while that in 2015 is 5. 1 %.
报告称,塔吉克斯坦政府的目标是将2016年的年通胀率控制在7. 5%,而2015年为5.
According to the report, the goal of the Tajikistan government is to control the annual inflation rate in 2015 as 7. 5 % while that in 2015 was 5. 1 %.
报告称,塔吉克斯坦政府的目标是将2015年的年通胀率控制在7. 5%,而2015年的年通胀率为5.
In addition, the report also pointed out that in the case of economic development and inflation of Tajikistan in 2016, there are certain differences between the government and some major international financial institutions in the aspect of prediction.
此外,报告还指出,就塔吉克斯坦2016年的经济发展和通货膨胀而言,政府和一些主要国际金融机构在预测方面存在着某些差异。
In addition, the report also pointed out that in the case of economic development and inflation of Tajikistan in 2016, there are certain differences between the government and some major international financial institutes in the aspect of prediction.

In addition, the report also pointed out that in the case of economic development and inflation of Tajikistan in 2016, there are certain differences between the government and some major international financial agencies in the aspect of prediction.
此外,报告还指出,就塔吉克斯坦2016年的经济发展和通货膨胀而言,政府和一些主要国际金融机构在预测方面存在着某些差异。
In addition, the report also pointed out that in the case of economic development and inflation of Tajikistan in 2016, there are certain differences between the government and some major international financial organisations in the aspect of prediction.
此外,报告还指出,在2016年塔吉克斯坦的经济发展和通货膨胀方面,政府与一些主要国际金融机构在预测方面存在着某些差异。
In addition, the report also pointed out that in the case of economic development and inflation of Tajikistan in 2016, there are certain differences between the government and some major international financial instruments in the aspect of prediction.
此外,报告还指出,在2016年塔吉克斯坦的经济发展和通货膨胀方面,政府和一些主要国际金融工具在预测方面存在着某些差异。
In addition, the report also noted out that in the case of economic development and inflation of Tajikistan in 2016, there are certain differences between the government and some major international financial institutions in the aspect of prediction.
此外,报告还指出,就塔吉克斯坦2016年的经济发展和通货膨胀而言,政府和一些主要国际金融机构在预测方面存在着某些差异。
According to the forecast of Ministry of Trade and Economic Development, the country's economic growth will reach 7 %, while the country's inflation is basically above this level.
根据贸易和经济发展部的预测,我国的经济增长将达到7%,而该国的通胀率将基本高于这一水平。
According to the forecast of Ministry of Trade and Economic Development, the country's economic growth will reach 7 %, while the country's inflation is basically over this level.
根据贸易和经济发展部的预测,我国的经济增长将达到7%,而该国的通胀率将基本高于这一水平。
According to the forecast of Ministry of Trade and Economic Development, the country's economic growth will reach 7 %, while the country's inflation is basically below this level.
根据贸易和经济发展部的预测,我国的经济增长将达到7%,而该国的通胀率将基本低于这一水平。
According to the forecast of Ministry of Trade and Economic Development, the country's economic growth will reach 7 %, while the nation's inflation is basically above this level.
根据贸易和经济发展部的预测,我国的经济增长将达到7%,而我国的通胀率将基本高于这一水平。
According to the forecast of Ministry of Trade and Economic Development, the country's economic growth will reach 7 %, while the country's inflation is basically above that level.
根据贸易和经济发展部的预测,我国的经济增长将达到7%,而该国的通胀率将基本高于这一水平。
According to the forecast of Ministry of Trade and Economic Development, the country's economic growth will reach 7 %, while the country's inflation is basically above these level.
根据贸易和经济发展部的预测,我国的经济增长将达到7%,而该国的通胀率将基本高于上述水平。
On the other hand, Asian Development Bank, the World Bank and the International Monetary Fund have given different forecasts for the economic development and inflation of Tajikistan in 2016.
另一方面,亚洲开发银行、世界银行和国际货币基金组织对塔吉克斯坦2016年的经济发展和通货膨胀情况作了不同的预测。
On the other hand, Asia Development Bank, the World Bank and the International Monetary Fund have given different forecasts for the economic development and inflation of Tajikistan in 2016.
另一方面,亚洲开发银行、世界银行和国际货币基金组织对塔吉克斯坦2016年的经济发展和通胀情况作了不同的预测。
On the other hand, Asian Development Bank, the World Bank and the International Monetary Fund have given different forecasts for the economic development and inflation of Tajikistan in 2015.
另一方面,亚洲开发银行、世界银行和国际货币基金组织对塔吉克斯坦2015年的经济发展和通货膨胀作了不同的预测。
For both of these indicators, the ADB gives forecast of 4. 2 % and 7 %, while that of the World Bank were 4. 8 % and 7. 5 %, and that of the International Monetary Fund was 3. 4 % and 8. 2 %.
对于这两个指标,亚洲开发银行预测分别为4.2%和7%,世界银行预测分别为4.8%和7.5%,国际货币基金组织预测分别为3.4%和8.2%。
For these of these indicators, the ADB gives forecast of 4. 2 % and 7 %, while that of the World Bank were 4. 8 % and 7. 5 %, and that of the International Monetary Fund was 3. 4 % and 8. 2 %.
对于这些指标,亚洲开发银行预测分别为4.2%和7%,世界银行预测分别为4.8%和7.5%,国际货币基金组织预测分别为3.4%和8.2%。
For the of these indicators, the ADB gives forecast of 4. 2 % and 7 %, while that of the World Bank were 4. 8 % and 7. 5 %, and that of the International Monetary Fund was 3. 4 % and 8. 2 %.
对于这些指标,亚洲开发银行预测分别为4.2%和7%,世界银行预测分别为4.8%和7.5%,国际货币基金组织预测分别为3.4%和8.2%。
For all of these indicators, the ADB gives forecast of 4. 2 % and 7 %, while that of the World Bank were 4. 8 % and 7. 5 %, and that of the International Monetary Fund was 3. 4 % and 8. 2 %.
就这些指标而言,亚洲开发银行预测分别为4.2%和7%,世界银行预测分别为4.8%和7.5%,国际货币基金组织预测分别为3.4%和8.2%。
For other of these indicators, the ADB gives forecast of 4. 2 % and 7 %, while that of the World Bank were 4. 8 % and 7. 5 %, and that of the International Monetary Fund was 3. 4 % and 8. 2 %.
对于这些指标中的其他指标,亚洲开发银行预测分别为4.2%和7%,世界银行预测分别为4.8%和7.5%,国际货币基金组织预测分别为3.4%和8.2%。
For those of these indicators, the ADB gives forecast of 4. 2 % and 7 %, while that of the World Bank were 4. 8 % and 7. 5 %, and that of the International Monetary Fund was 3. 4 % and 8. 2 %.

It is reported that, despite the international economic downturn, the devaluation of the Russian ruble and overseas remittance reduction and a series of other adverse external factors, 6 % growth was still achieved in the economy development of Tajikistan in 2015.
据报道,尽管国际经济衰退、俄罗斯卢布贬值、海外汇款减少以及一系列其他不利外部因素,2015年塔吉克斯坦的经济发展仍实现了6%的增长。

月13日,云南省第一届青年运动会开幕,显示了青年的活力
The opening ceremony of the first Youth Games of Yunnan Province on the 13th day of the month show youth vitality
月13日,云南省第一届青年运动会开幕,展现了青春活力
The first Youth Games in Yunnan Province will be held from August 13 to August 22 in De Hong Zhou Mang City.
首届青年运动会将于8月13日至22日在德洪州芒市举行。
The first Youth Games in Yunnan Province will be held from August 13 to August 21 in De Hong Zhou Mang City.
首届青年运动会将于8月13日至21日在德洪州芒市举行。
The first Youth Games in Yunnan Province will be held from August 14 to August 22 in De Hong Zhou Mang City.
首届青年运动会将于8月14日至22日在德洪州芒市举行。
The first Youth Games in Yunnan Province will be held from August 13 to August 22 in De Hong Zhou Meng City.
云南省首届青年奥运会将于8月13日至22日在德洪州蒙市举行。
On August 12, in De Hong Zhou Mang City, the organizing committee held a press conference to introduce the organization and the opening ceremony.
8月12日,组织委员会在德洪州芒市举行新闻发布会,介绍组织情况和开幕式。
On August 12, in De Hong Zhou Meng City, the organizing committee held a press conference to introduce the organization and the opening ceremony.
8月12日,组织委员会在德洪州蒙市举行新闻发布会,介绍组织情况和开幕式。
On August 12, in De Hong Zhou Mang City, the organizing committee held a press conference to announce the organization and the opening ceremony.
8月12日,在德洪州芒市,组织委员会召开新闻发布会,宣布组织和开幕式。
On August 12, in De Hong Zhou Mang City, the organizing committee held a press conference to explain the organization and the opening ceremony.
8月12日,组织委员会在德洪州芒市举行新闻发布会,对组织情况和开幕式进行说明。
On August 12, in De Hong Zhou Mang City, the organizing committee held a press conference to launch the organization and the opening ceremony.
8月12日,组织委员会在德洪州芒市举行新闻发布会,启动组织和开幕式。
On August 12, in De Hong Zhou Mang City, the organizing committee held a press conference to promote the organization and the opening ceremony.
8月12日,组织委员会在德洪州芒市举行新闻发布会,宣传组织工作和开幕式。
The First Youth Games of Yunnan Province will be hosted by the Yunnan Provincial Sports Bureau and undertaken by Mang City People's Government. The opening ceremony will be held in the morning of the 13th day of the month.
云南省第一届青年运动会由云南省体育局主办,由芒市人民政府承办,开幕式于本月13日上午举行。
The First Youth Games of Yunnan Province will be hosted by the Yunnan Provincial Sports Department and undertaken by Mang City People's Government. The opening ceremony will be held in the morning of the 13th day of the month.
云南省第一届青年运动会由云南省体育局主办,由芒市人民政府承办,开幕式于本月13日上午举行。
There are 11 items in the games, including track and field, soccer, basketball, tennis, volleyball, weightlifting, cycling, wrestling, gymnastics, martial arts and so on, involving 180 small items.
田径、足球、篮球、网球、排球、举重、自行车、摔跤、体操、武术等11个项目,涉及180件小项目。
There are 12 items in the games, including track and field, soccer, basketball, tennis, volleyball, weightlifting, cycling, wrestling, gymnastics, martial arts and so on, involving 180 small items.
奥运会共有12个项目,涉及180个小型项目,包括田径、足球、篮球、网球、排球、举重、自行车、摔跤、体操、武术等。
There are 14 items in the games, including track and field, soccer, basketball, tennis, volleyball, weightlifting, cycling, wrestling, gymnastics, martial arts and so on, involving 180 small items.
田径、足球、篮球、网球、排球、举重、自行车、摔跤、体操、武术等项目共14件,涉及180件小型项目。
There are 18 items in the games, including track and field, soccer, basketball, tennis, volleyball, weightlifting, cycling, wrestling, gymnastics, martial arts and so on, involving 180 small items.
比赛共有18个项目,包括田径、足球、篮球、网球、排球、举重、自行车、摔跤、体操、武术等,涉及180个小项目。
There are 16 items in the games, including track and field, soccer, basketball, tennis, volleyball, weightlifting, cycling, wrestling, gymnastics, martial arts and so on, involving 180 small items.
比赛共有16个项目,包括田径、足球、篮球、网球、排球、举重、自行车、摔跤、体操、武术等,涉及180个小项目。
There are 13 items in the games, including track and field, soccer, basketball, tennis, volleyball, weightlifting, cycling, wrestling, gymnastics, martial arts and so on, involving 180 small items.
比赛共有13个项目,涉及180个小型项目,包括田径、足球、篮球、网球、排球、举重、自行车、摔跤、体操、武术等。
According to Chang Yin, the deputy director of the First Youth Games Organizing Committee and the deputy director of the Provincial Sports Bureau, by following the principle of " government-led, market operation, frugal race ", all preparation work has been in place.
首届青年运动会组织委员会副主任、省体育局副主任张茵表示,按照“政府主导、市场运作、节俭竞赛”的原则,各项准备工作已就绪。
According to Chang Yin, the deputy director of the First Youth Games Organizing Committee and the deputy director of the Provincial Sports Bureau, by following the principle of " government-led, market operation, frugal races ", all preparation work has been in place.
首届青年运动会组织委员会副主任、省体育局副主任张茵表示,按照“政府主导、市场化、节俭竞赛”的原则,各项准备工作已就绪。
According to Chang Yin, the deputy director of the First Youth Games Organizing Committee and the deputy director of the Provincial Sports Bureau, by following the principle of " government-led, market operation, frugal event ", all preparation work has been in place.
首届青年运动会组织委员会副主任、省体育局副主任张茵表示,按照“政府主导、市场运作、节俭活动”的原则,各项准备工作已就绪。
According to Chang Yin, the deputy director of the First Youth Games Organizing Committee and the deputy director of the Provincial Sports Bureau, by following the principle of " government-led, market operation, frugal team ", all preparation work has been in place.
首届青年运动会组织委员会副主任兼省体育局副主任张茵表示,按照“政府主导、市场运作、节俭团队”的原则,所有准备工作已就绪。
According to Chang Yin, the deputy director of the First Youth Games Organizing Committee and the deputy director of the Provincial Sports Bureau, by following the principle of " government-led, market operation, frugal competition ", all preparation work has been in place.
首届青年运动会组织委员会副主任、省体育局副主任张茵表示,按照“政府主导、市场运作、节俭竞争”的原则,各项准备工作已就绪。
According to Chang Yin, the deputy director of the First Youth Games Organizing Committee and the deputy director of the Provincial Sports Bureau, by following the principle of " government-led, market operation, frugal sport ", all preparation work has been in place.
首届青年运动会组织委员会副主任、省体育局副主任张茵表示,按照“政府主导、市场化、节俭运动”的原则,各项准备工作已就绪。
The renovation work of Dehong old weightlifting hall and martial arts museum, Mang City Yixiao Wrestling arena, Silver Tower Scenic Area mountain bike track has been completed.
满州义秀摔跤场、银塔风景区山地自行车跑道等德宏旧举重厅和武术博物馆的翻新工程已经完成。

From September 1, people aged 60 years old to 64 years old can take bus by half-price ticket.
从9月1日开始,60岁至64岁的人们可以乘半价车。
From September 1, people age 60 years old to 64 years old can take bus by half-price ticket.
从9月1日开始,60岁至64岁的人们可以乘半价车。
In the morning of September 11, at Jining City Bus Company IC Card Sales Center, several elderly people are queuing to apply for a card. The 62-year-old Yao obtained his half-price card for the elderly.
九月十一日上午,在济宁市巴士公司IC卡销售中心,数名长者排队申请一张卡片,62岁的姚明为长者拿到了半价的卡片。
In the morning of September 11, at Jining City Bus Company IC Card Sales Center, several elderly people are queuing to apply for a card. The 61-year-old Yao obtained his half-price card for the elderly.
九月十一日上午,在济宁市巴士公司IC卡销售中心,数名长者排队申请一张卡片,61岁的姚明为长者拿到了半价的卡片。
In the morning of September 11, at Jining City Bus Company IC Card Sales Center, several elderly people are queuing to apply for a card. The 64-year-old Yao obtained his half-price card for the elderly.

In the morning of September 11, at Jining City Bus Company IC Card Sales Center, several elderly people are queuing to apply for a card. The 63-year-old Yao obtained his half-price card for the elderly.

In the morning of September 11, at Jining City Bus Company IC Card Sales Center, several elderly people are queuing to apply for a card. The 71-year-old Yao obtained his half-price card for the elderly.
九月十一日上午,在济宁市巴士公司IC卡销售中心,数名长者排队申请一张卡片,71岁的姚获得他给长者的半价卡片。
In the morning of September 11, at Jining City Bus Company IC Card Sales Center, several elderly people are queuing to apply for a card. The 72-year-old Yao obtained his half-price card for the elderly.
九月十一日上午,在济宁市巴士公司IC卡销售中心,数名长者排队申请一张卡片。72岁的姚明为长者拿到了半价卡片。
Prior to this, Jining Municipal Committee for Aging People, the Municipal Finance Bureau, and the Municipal Department of Transportation worked together to issue " A Notice for 60-64 years old people to take bus by half-price ticket ". The preferential policy will be implemented formally since this September 1.
在此之前,济宁市老百姓委员会、市财政局、市交通局共同发布了《60-64岁老人半价乘公共汽车的通知》,自今年9月1日起正式实行优惠政策。
Prior to this, Jining Municipal Committee for Aging People, the Municipal Finance Bureau, and the Municipal Department of Transportation worked together to issue " A Notice for 60-64 years old people to take bus by half-price ticket ". The preferential policy will be implemented formally since this August 1.

Prior to this, Jining Municipal Committee for Aging People, the Municipal Finance Bureau, and the Municipal Department of Transportation worked together to issue " A Notice for 60-64 years old people to take bus by half-price ticket ". The preferential policy will be implemented formally since this October 1.

" Eligible old people may apply to IC sales center with his second generation ID card. Elderly people in this age bracket and with foreign accounts can also enjoy the preferential policy. "
符合条件的老年人可以持第二代身份证向IC销售中心申请,这一年龄段的老年人和有外国账户的老年人也可以享受优惠政策。

Currently, old card is divided into two kinds, one for the elderly free card and the other one for the elderly half-price card.
目前,旧卡分为两种,一种是老年人免费卡,另一种是老年人半价卡。

目前,旧卡分为两种,一种是老年人免费卡,另一种是老年人半价卡。
Currently, old card is divided into two kinds, one for the elderly free card and the other one for the elderly half-rate card.
目前,旧卡分为两种,一种是老年人免费卡,另一种是老年人半价卡。
" To save time for the elderly, the system is upgraded. The elderly free card is reduced from auditing twice per year to once per year. Elderly people with card do not need to commute twice. "
「为长者节省时间,系统已改善。长者免费卡由每年审计两次减至每年一次。长者如持卡,无须往返两班。」
" To save time for the elderly, the system is upgraded. The elderly free card is changed from auditing twice per year to once per year. Elderly people with card do not need to commute twice. "
「为长者节省时间,系统已改善。长者免费卡由每年审计两次改为每年一次。长者如持卡,无须往返两班。」
According to the official microblogging news of the China Securities Regulatory Commission ( CSRC ), the securities market supervision department is cooperating closely with the Shenzhen Stock Exchange and the Hong Kong Stock Exchange.
根据中国证券监督管理委员会 ( 证监会 ) 官方的微博消息, 证券市场监管部门正与深圳证交所和香港证交所密切合作.
of to the official microblogging news of the China Securities Regulatory Commission ( CSRC ), the securities market supervision department is cooperating closely with the Shenzhen Stock Exchange and the Hong Kong Stock Exchange.

the to the official microblogging news of the China Securities Regulatory Commission ( CSRC ), the securities market supervision department is cooperating closely with the Shenzhen Stock Exchange and the Hong Kong Stock Exchange.

and to the official microblogging news of the China Securities Regulatory Commission ( CSRC ), the securities market supervision department is cooperating closely with the Shenzhen Stock Exchange and the Hong Kong Stock Exchange.
根据中国证监会(证监会)官方的微博消息,证券市场监察部门正与深圳证交所和香港证交所密切合作。
to to the official microblogging news of the China Securities Regulatory Commission ( CSRC ), the securities market supervision department is cooperating closely with the Shenzhen Stock Exchange and the Hong Kong Stock Exchange.
至于中国证监会(证监会)的官方微博消息,证券市场监察部门正与深圳证交所及香港证交所紧密合作。
At the same time, the Commission set up a " Shenzhen-Hong Kong stock market transactions interconnection mechanism " special working group, and actively promote the preparatory work. The work will be open this year after the full preparation of the related regulatory rules and technical equipment.
同时,廉政公署成立「深港股市交易互连机制」专责小组,积极推动筹建工作。筹建工作将於有关规例及技术设备全面制订后于今年展开。

The work will be open this year after the full preparation of the related regulatory rules and technical equipment.

People who sent a certain amount of mass fraud messages may be punished for crime of swindling even if they did not succeed in fraud.
发送过一定数量的大规模欺诈信息的人即使没有成功欺诈,也可能因欺诈罪而受到处罚。
People who sent a certain number of mass fraud messages may be punished for crime of swindling even if they did not succeed in fraud.
发送了一定数量的大规模欺诈信息的人即使没有成功,也可能因欺诈罪受到惩罚。
People who sent a certain quantity of mass fraud messages may be punished for crime of swindling even if they did not succeed in fraud.

People who sent a certain amount of mass fraud messages will be punished for crime of swindling even if they did not succeed in fraud.
发送过一定数量的大规模欺诈信息的人即使没有成功,也会因欺诈罪受到处罚。
People who sent a certain amount of mass fraud message may be punished for crime of swindling even if they did not succeed in fraud.
发送过一定数量的大规模欺诈信息的人,即使没有成功欺诈,也可能因欺诈罪而受到处罚。
The court trial of Nanyang Wolong District People's Court of Henan province found that the defendant Li Huiwang sent fraud information through the pseudo-base station equipment in Tongbai county and Nanyang district between September 30, 2009 and October 4, 2009.
河南省南阳沃龙区人民法院判决,被告李惠王于2009年9月30日至2009年10月4日期间通过同白县和南阳区的假基地站设备发送欺诈信息。
The court trial of Nanyang Wolong District People's Court of Henan province found that the defendant Li Huiwang sent fraud information through the pseudo-base station equipment in Dongbai county and Nanyang district between September 30, 2009 and October 4, 2009.
河南省南阳沃龙区人民法院判决,被告李惠王于2009年9月30日至2009年10月4日期间通过东拜县和南阳区的假基地站设备发送欺诈信息。
The court trial of Nanyang Wolong District People's Court of Henan province found that the defendant Li Huiwang sent fraud information through the pseudo-base station equipment in Nanbai county and Nanyang district between September 30, 2009 and October 4, 2009.
河南省南阳沃龙区人民法院判决,被告李惠王于2009年9月30日至2009年10月4日期间通过南白县和南阳区的假基地站设备发送欺诈信息。
The court trial of Nanyang Wolong District People's Court of Henan province found that the defendants Li Huiwang sent fraud information through the pseudo-base station equipment in Tongbai county and Nanyang district between September 30, 2009 and October 4, 2009.
河南省南阳沃龙区人民法院的庭审裁定,被告李惠王于2009年9月30日至2009年10月4日期间,通过同白县和南阳区的假基地站设备发送欺诈信息。
The court trial of Nanyang Wolong District People's Court of Henan province found that the prosecutor Li Huiwang sent fraud information through the pseudo-base station equipment in Tongbai county and Nanyang district between September 30, 2009 and October 4, 2009.
河南省南阳沃龙区人民法院的审判认定,2009年9月30日至2009年10月4日期间,检察官李惠王通过同白县和南阳区的假基地站设备发送了欺诈信息。
In the same year, at 10 a. m. on October 5, 2009, the defendant once again came to a hotel room of Nanyang City Wolong District, where they sent fraud messages via a fake base station. He was arrested by the police.
同年10月5日上午10时,被告再次来到南阳市沃龙区的一间酒店房间,通过一个假基地站发送欺诈信息,并被警方逮捕。
In the same year, at 10 a. m. on October 5, 2009, the defendant once again came into a hotel room of Nanyang City Wolong District, where they sent fraud messages via a fake base station. He was arrested by the police.
同年10月5日上午10时,被告再次进入南阳市沃龙区一间酒店房间,通过一个假基地站发送欺诈信息,并被警方逮捕。
In the same year, at 10 a. m. on October 5, 2009, the defendant once again came in a hotel room of Nanyang City Wolong District, where they sent fraud messages via a fake base station. He was arrested by the police.

In the same year, at 10 a. m. on October 5, 2009, the defendants once again came to a hotel room of Nanyang City Wolong District, where they sent fraud messages via a fake base station. He was arrested by the police.
同年,2009年10月5日上午10时,被告再次来到南阳市沃龙区一家酒店房间,通过一个假基地站发送欺诈信息,被警方逮捕。
After the assessment, the pseudo-base station equipment sent 62, 228 text messages on October 4, 2015. This resulted in 8 seconds to 10 minutes of interruption of 62, 228 mobile phone users.
在评估之后,假基地站设备于2015年10月4日发送了62,228条短信,导致62,228个移动电话用户中断8秒至10分钟。
After the assessment, the pseudo-base station equipment sent 62, 228 text messages on October 4, 2015. This resulted in 8 seconds to 10 minutes of interruption of 61, 228 mobile phone users.

After the assessment, the pseudo-base station equipment sent 62, 228 text messages on October 4, 2015. This resulted in 8 seconds to 10 minutes of interruption of 62, 227 mobile phone users.
在评估之后,假基地站设备于2015年10月4日发送了62,228条短信,导致62,227个移动电话用户中断8秒至10分钟。
After the assessment, the pseudo-base station equipment sent 62, 228 text messages on October 4, 2015. This resulted in 8 seconds to 10 minutes of interruption of 62, 229 mobile phone users.
在评估之后,假基地站设备于2015年10月4日发送了62,228条短信,导致62,229个移动电话用户中断8秒至10分钟。
After legal proceedings, the court held that the defendant Li Huiwang used pseudo-base station to send a total of 62, 228 fraud messages to a specific number of people. His behavior already constituted a crime of fraud.
法律程序终结后,法庭裁定被告李辉宏利用假基地站共向特定数目人士发送62,228条诈骗讯息。他的行为已构成诈骗罪。
After legal proceedings, the court held that the defendant Li Huiwang used pseudo-base station to send a total of 63, 228 fraud messages to a specific number of people. His behavior already constituted a crime of fraud.
法律程序终结后,法庭裁定被告李辉宏利用伪基地站共向特定数目人士发送63,228条诈骗讯息。他的行为已构成诈骗罪。
After legal proceedings, the court held that the defendant Li Huiwang used pseudo-base station to send a total of 61, 228 fraud messages to a specific number of people. His behavior already constituted a crime of fraud.
法律程序终结后,法庭裁定被告李辉宏利用伪基地站,共向特定数目人士发送了61,228条诈骗讯息。他的行为已构成诈骗罪。
After legal proceedings, the court held that the defendant Li Huiwang used pseudo-base station to send a total of 6, 228 fraud messages to a specific number of people. His behavior already constituted a crime of fraud.
法律程序终结后,法庭裁定被告李辉宏利用伪基地站共向特定数目人士发送6,228条诈骗讯息。他的行为已构成诈骗罪。
After legal proceedings, the court held that the defendant Li Hui Jing used pseudo-base station to send a total of 62, 228 fraud messages to a specific number of people. His behavior already constituted a crime of fraud.
法律程序终结后,法庭裁定被告李辉京利用假基地站共向特定数目人士发送62,228条诈骗讯息。他的行为已构成诈骗罪。
After legal proceedings, the court held that the defendant Li Hui Yang used pseudo-base station to send a total of 62, 228 fraud messages to a specific number of people. His behavior already constituted a crime of fraud.
法律程序后,法庭裁定被告李辉扬利用假基地站共向特定数目人士发送62,228条诈骗讯息。他的行为已构成诈骗罪。
As the defendant was attempted criminal, not resulting in terrible consequences and having good attitude toward admission of guilt while being caught, it is advisable to take the opinion of giving a lesser punishment.
由于被告是未遂犯,没有造成严重后果,在被抓捕时对认罪有良好态度,似宜采取给予较轻惩罚的意见。
As the defendant was attempted criminal, not resulting in terrible consequences and having good attitude toward declaration of guilt while being caught, it is advisable to take the opinion of giving a lesser punishment.
由于被告是未遂犯,没有造成严重后果,在被抓捕时对宣布有罪持良好态度,似宜采取给予较轻惩罚的意见。
As the defendant was attempted criminal, not resulting in terrible consequences and having good attitude toward confession of guilt while being caught, it is advisable to take the opinion of giving a lesser punishment.
由于被告是未遂犯,没有造成严重后果,在被抓捕时对认罪有良好态度,因此似宜采取给予较轻惩罚的意见。
As the defendant was attempted criminal, not resulting in terrible consequences and having good attitude toward surrender of guilt while being caught, it is advisable to take the opinion of giving a lesser punishment.
由于被告是未遂犯,没有造成严重后果,在被抓捕时对自首持良好态度,似宜采取较轻处罚的意见。
As the defendant was attempted criminal, not resulting in terrible consequences and having good attitude toward showing of guilt while being caught, it is advisable to take the opinion of giving a lesser punishment.
由于被告是未遂犯,没有造成严重后果,在被抓捕时对犯罪表现态度良好,因此,似宜采取较轻处罚的意见。
As the defendant was attempted criminal, not resulting in terrible consequences and having good attitude toward admissions of guilt while being caught, it is advisable to take the opinion of giving a lesser punishment.
由于被告是未遂犯,没有造成严重后果,在被抓捕时对认罪有良好态度,似宜采取给予较轻惩罚的意见。
Consider the comprehensive crime nature and the attitude toward admission of guilt of the defendant, he was sentenced to 4 years and 6 months of imprisonment, and fined 10, 000 yuan.
以被告人的全面犯罪性质和认罪态度为例,判处他4年零6个月的监禁,并处1万元以下罚款。
Consider the comprehensive crime nature and the attitude toward declaration of guilt of the defendant, he was sentenced to 4 years and 6 months of imprisonment, and fined 10, 000 yuan.
以被告人的全面犯罪性质和对宣告有罪的态度为例,判处他4年零6个月的监禁,并处1万元以下罚款。
Consider the comprehensive crime nature and the attitude toward confession of guilt of the defendant, he was sentenced to 4 years and 6 months of imprisonment, and fined 10, 000 yuan.
以被告人的全面犯罪性质和对供认犯罪的态度为例,判处他4年零6个月的监禁,并处1万元以下罚款。
Consider the comprehensive crime nature and the attitude toward admitting of guilt of the defendant, he was sentenced to 4 years and 6 months of imprisonment, and fined 10, 000 yuan.
以被告人的全面犯罪性质和认罪态度为例,判处他4年零6个月的有期徒刑,并处1万元以下罚款。
Consider the comprehensive crime nature and the attitude toward surrender of guilt of the defendant, he was sentenced to 4 years and 6 months of imprisonment, and fined 10, 000 yuan.
以被告人的全面犯罪性质和自首态度为例,判处他4年零6个月的监禁,并处1万元以下罚款。
Consider the comprehensive crime nature and the attitude toward acceptance of guilt of the defendant, he was sentenced to 4 years and 6 months of imprisonment, and fined 10, 000 yuan.
以被告人的全面犯罪性质和服罪态度为例,判处他4年零6个月的有期徒刑,并处一万元以下罚款。
Siberian tigers are currently classified as endangered ( EN ) by the World Conservation Union ( IUCN ) Red List of Endangered Species.
西伯利亚虎目前被世界保护联盟 ( 自然保护联盟 ) 列为濒危物种的濒危物种.
Siberian tigers are currently listed as endangered ( EN ) by the World Conservation Union ( IUCN ) Red List of Endangered Species.
世界保护联盟 ( 自然保护联盟 ) 《濒危物种红名单 》 目前将西伯利亚虎列为濒危物种.
Siberian tigers are currently evaluated as endangered ( EN ) by the World Conservation Union ( IUCN ) Red List of Endangered Species.
世界保护联盟 ( 自然保护联盟 ) 《濒危物种红名单》目前评价西伯利亚虎为濒危物种.

Siberian tigers are total classified as endangered ( EN ) by the World Conservation Union ( IUCN ) Red List of Endangered Species.
西伯利亚虎被世界保护联盟 ( 自然保护联盟 ) 列为濒危物种的濒危物种.
According to the Jilin Provincial Forestry Department, the data jointly monitored by the United States and Russia and other countries in 1998 showed that Jilin Province only had 4 to 6 manchurian tigers and 3 to 5 Northeast leopards.
据吉林省林业局称,1998年美国、俄罗斯和其他国家联合监测的数据显示,吉林省只有4至6只东北虎和3至5只东北豹。
According to the Jilin Provincial Forestry Department, the data jointly monitored by the United States and Russia and other countries in 1998 found that Jilin Province only had 4 to 6 manchurian tigers and 3 to 5 Northeast leopards.
据吉林省林业局称,1998年美国、俄罗斯和其他国家联合监测的数据发现,吉林省只有4至6只东北虎和3至5只东北豹。
According to the Jilin Provincial Forestry Department, the data jointly monitored by the United States and Russia and other countries in 1999 showed that Jilin Province only had 4 to 6 manchurian tigers and 3 to 5 Northeast leopards.

According to the Jilin Provincial Forestry Department, the data jointly monitored by the United States and Russia and other countries in 2002 showed that Jilin Province only had 4 to 6 manchurian tigers and 3 to 5 Northeast leopards.
据吉林省林业局称,2002年美国、俄罗斯和其他国家联合监测的数据显示,吉林省只有4至6只东北虎和3至5只东北豹。
According to the Jilin Provincial Forestry Department, the data jointly monitored by the United States and Russia and other countries in 2006 showed that Jilin Province only had 4 to 6 manchurian tigers and 3 to 5 Northeast leopards.

According to Yu Changchun, the Director of Jilin Provincial Department of Forestry Protection, Jilin province has gradually enhanced its conservation on wild animals in recent years. The number of populations of manchurian tigers and Northeastern leopards is growing significantly
吉林省林业保护局局长于昌春表示,近年来吉林省林业保护局局长逐步加强对野生动物的保护,东北地区东北虎类种群数量正明显增加

According to Yu Changchun, the Director of Jilin Provincial Department of Forestry Conservation, Jilin province has gradually enhanced its conservation on wild animals in recent years. The number of populations of manchurian tigers and Northeastern leopards is growing significantly
