The latest monitoring data in 2015 showed that 27 wild manchurian tigers and 42 Northeastern leopards were monitored within Jilin province territory.
2015年的最新监测数据显示,吉林省境内监测了27只野生满洲虎和42只东北豹。
The latest monitoring data in 2015 showed that 27 wild manchurian tigers and 44 Northeastern leopards were monitored within Jilin province territory.

The cooperation between China and Russia is significant for the population restoration and reproduction of manchurian tigers and Northeastern leopards, which are flagship species for the wild animal protection in the Sino-Russia boundary area ,.
中俄两国的合作对东北虎种群的恢复和繁殖具有重要意义,东北虎是中俄边境地区保护野生动物的龙头物种。
The cooperation between China and Russia is noteworthy for the population restoration and reproduction of manchurian tigers and Northeastern leopards, which are flagship species for the wild animal protection in the Sino-Russia boundary area ,.

At the 2016 China Hunchun Tiger and Leopard Protection International Forum which was terminated on September 11th, the forestry department and animal protection organization of China and Russia reached several consensuses for the second time.
在9月11日结束的2016年中国湖春虎豹保护国际论坛上,中国和俄罗斯林业部门和动物保护组织第二次达成共识。

At the 2016 China Hunchun Tiger and Leopard Protection International Forum which was terminated on September 11th, the forestry departments and animal protection organization of China and Russia reached several consensuses for the second time.
在9月11日结束的2016年中国湖春虎豹保护国际论坛上,中国和俄罗斯林业部门和动物保护组织第二次达成共识。
According to the Jilin Provincial Forestry Department, the cooperation on enhancing the protection of tigers and leopards of China and Russia is not only quite pressing task for the protection of manchurian tigers and Northeastern leopards, but also a priority to maintain the population health of tigers and leopards of Russia.
据吉林省林业局介绍,加强中俄虎豹保护的合作,不仅是保护东北东北虎虎的迫切任务,也是维护俄罗斯虎豹人口健康的优先事项。
of to the Jilin Provincial Forestry Department, the cooperation on enhancing the protection of tigers and leopards of China and Russia is not only quite pressing task for the protection of manchurian tigers and Northeastern leopards, but also a priority to maintain the population health of tigers and leopards of Russia.
与吉林省林业局合作,加强中俄虎豹保护工作,不仅是保护东北东北虎虎的迫切任务,也是维护俄罗斯虎豹人口健康的优先事项。

Sun Fujian is a Party cadre, but he lost his ideal and belief by violently breaking the discipline of the Party after the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China. In addition, he is not astringent and breaks the rules. Such deed is vile and grave indeed.
孙福建是党的干部,但是在中国共产党第十八届全国代表大会后,他粗暴地违背党的纪律,失去了理想和信念,此外,他不动声色,违反规则,这种行为既卑鄙又严重。

Sun Fujian is a Party cadre, but he lost his ideal and belief by violently broke the discipline of the Party after the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China. In addition, he is not astringent and breaks the rules. Such deed is vile and grave indeed.

Sun Fujian is a Party cadre, but he lost his ideal and belief by violently break the discipline of the Party after the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China. In addition, he is not astringent and breaks the rules. Such deed is vile and grave indeed.

Greenland sharks are also known as small head sleeping sharks, widely distributed in Greenland and the North Atlantic waters around Iceland. It has the length of 4 to 5 meters in their adult age.
格陵兰鲨也被称为小头睡性鲨鱼,广泛分布在格陵兰和冰岛周围的北大西洋水域,成年时长4至5米。

A new study led by Julius Nelson of the University of Copenhagen, Denmark, turned to the use of Greenland shark's ocular lens for radioactive carbon dating.
由丹麦哥本哈根大学的朱利叶斯·纳尔逊领导的一项新的研究转向了格陵兰鲨眼镜在放射性碳约会中的应用。

In addition, the female Greenland shark is said to be sexually matured at about 4 meters in length. That is, it can only reach adulthood at least until the age of 156.
此外,格陵兰的雌性鲨鱼据说在4米长的时间内性发育成熟,也就是说,它只能达到成人年龄,至少要到156岁。
The researchers thus wrote in the paper that the Greenland shark was known as the vertebrate with the longest life span on the Earth, surpassing the age of the previous longevity champion black right whale ( 211 years ).
因此,研究者在论文中写道,格陵兰鲨被称作地球上寿命最长的脊椎动物,它超越了前一位长寿冠军黑右鲸的年龄 ( 211 岁 ) 。
The researchers thus wrote in the paper that the Greenland shark was known as the vertebrate with the longest life span on the Earth, surpassing the age of the previous longevity champion black right whale ( 212 years ).
因此,研究者们在论文中写道,格陵兰鲨被公认为地球上寿命最长的脊椎动物,超过了前一位长寿冠军黑右鲸的年龄 ( 212 岁 ) 。
The researchers thus wrote in the paper that the Greenland shark was known as the vertebrate with the longest life span on the Earth, surpassing the age of the previous longevity champion black right whale ( 214 years ).
因此,研究者在论文中写道,格陵兰鲨被称作地球上寿命最长的脊椎动物,它超越了前一位长寿冠军黑右鲸(214岁)的年龄。
The researchers thus wrote in the paper that the Greenland shark was known as the vertebrate with the longest life span on the Earth, surpassing the age of the previous longevity champion black right whale ( 213 years ).

The researchers thus wrote in the paper that the Greenland shark was known as the vertebrate with the longest life span on the Earth, surpassing the age of the previous longevity champion black right whale ( 215 years ).
因此,研究者在论文中写道,格陵兰鲨被称作地球上寿命最长的脊椎动物,它超越了前一位长寿冠军黑右鲸(215 岁 ) 的年龄。
The researchers thus wrote in the paper that the Greenland shark was known as the vertebrate with the longest life span on the Earth, surpassing the age of the previous longevity champion black right whale ( 221 years ).
因此,研究者们在论文中写道,格陵兰鲨被公认为地球上寿命最长的脊椎动物,超过了前一位长寿冠军黑右鲸(221岁)的年龄。
Over the past year, the exchange reform results are significant, with RMB exchange rate remaining basically stable, but also laying foundation for promoting the internationalization of the RMB.
过去一年来,汇率改革取得了显著成效,人民币汇率基本保持稳定,也为促进人民币的国际化奠定了基础。

过去一年来,汇率改革取得了显著成效,人民币汇率基本保持稳定,也为促进人民币的国际化奠定了基础。
Over the past year, the exchange reform results are significant, with RMB exchange rate remaining basically stable, but also laying foundation for promoting the Internationalization of the RMB.
过去一年来,汇率改革取得了显著成效,人民币汇率基本保持稳定,也为推动人民币国际化奠定了基础。
From the point of market performance, over the past year, the two-way floating characteristics of RMB exchange rate is outstanding. The elasticity of exchange is expected to be strengthened and the exchange rate is expected to be generally stable.
从市场表现来看,人民币汇率的双向浮动特征在过去一年中尚显突出,汇率弹性有望增强,汇率总体稳定。
From the point of market performance, over the past year, the two-way floating characteristics of RMB exchange rate is outstanding. The elasticity of exchange is expected to be strengthened and the exchange rate is expected to be relatively stable.
从市场表现来看,人民币汇率的双向浮动特征在过去一年中尚显突出,汇率弹性有望增强,汇率有望相对稳定。
From the point of market performance, over the past year, the two-way floating characteristics of RMB exchange rate is outstanding. The elasticity of exchange is expected to be heightened and the exchange rate is expected to be generally stable.
从市场表现来看,人民币汇率的双向浮动特征在过去一年中尚显突出,汇率弹性有望提高,汇率总体稳定。
Ever since the exchange reform, the fluctuation of RMB against the US dollar often appears, with ups and downs during the process.
自汇率改革以来,人民币兑美元汇率的波动就经常出现,在波动过程中,人民币的汇率会起起伏波动。
Ever since the Exchange reform, the fluctuation of RMB against the US dollar often appears, with ups and downs during the process.

Ever since the exchange reform, the fluctuation of RMB against the US dollar often shows, with ups and downs during the process.

Ever since the exchange reform, the fluctuation of RMB against the US dollar often exists, with ups and downs during the process.
自汇率改革以来,人民币兑美元汇率的波动就一直存在,在汇率改革过程中,人民币币兑美元汇率的波动时有起有伏。
Ever since the exchange reform, the fluctuation of RMB against the US dollar often appeared, with ups and downs during the process.
自汇率改革以来,人民币兑美元汇率的波动就经常出现,在汇率变动过程中,人民币汇率会起起伏波动。
Last year, the last remittance measure before " 8. 11 " exchange reform was carried out in 2005. The appreciation of yuan against dollar was significant during the last 10 years.
去年,2005年进行了“8.11”外汇改革前的最后一次汇款措施,人民币兑美元汇率在过去十年中大幅升值。
Last year, the last remittance measure before " 8. 11 " exchange reform was carried out in 2005. The increase of yuan against dollar was significant during the last 10 years.
去年,2005年进行了“8.11”外汇改革前的最后一次汇款措施,人民币兑美元汇率在近10年中大幅度上扬。
Last year, the last remittance measure before " 8. 11 " exchange reform was carried out in 2005. The exchange of yuan against dollar was significant during the last 10 years.
去年,2005年进行了“8.11”外汇改革前的最后一次汇款措施,人民币兑美元汇率在近10年中占有重要地位。
Last year, the last remittance measure before " 8. 11 " exchange reform was carried out in 2005. The inflation of yuan against dollar was significant during the last 10 years.
去年,2005年进行了“8.11”外汇改革前的最后一次汇款措施,过去10年人民币兑美元汇率的通胀率相当高。
Since the implementation of the new exchange reform, the previous appreciation state of RMB was changed. The central parity rate of RMB exchange rate in one year was about 8 %.
新的汇率改革实施以来,人民币的上扬状态发生了变化,人民币一年的汇率中心对等率为8%左右。
Since the implementation of the new exchange reform, the old appreciation state of RMB was changed. The central parity rate of RMB exchange rate in one year was about 8 %.
新的汇率改革实施以来,人民币的旧升值状态发生了变化,人民币一年的汇率中心对等率为8%左右。
Since the implementation of the new exchange reform, the traditional appreciation state of RMB was changed. The central parity rate of RMB exchange rate in one year was about 8 %.
新的汇率改革实施以来,人民币的传统升值状态发生了变化,人民币一年的汇率中心对等率为8%左右。
Since the implementation of the new exchange reform, the former appreciation state of RMB was changed. The central parity rate of RMB exchange rate in one year was about 8 %.
新的汇率改革实施以来,人民币的过去升值状态发生了变化,人民币一年的汇率中心对等率为8%左右。
Since the implementation of the new exchange reform, the normal appreciation state of RMB was changed. The central parity rate of RMB exchange rate in one year was about 8 %.
新的汇率改革实施以来,人民币的正常升值状态发生了变化,人民币一年的汇率中心对等率为8%左右。

This October 1, the International Monetary Fund will officially accept the yuan, which will become SDR weight currency.
今年10月1日,国际货币基金组织(IMF)将正式接受人民币, 人民币将变成SDR权值货币.
This October 1, the International Monetary Fund will officially accept the yuan, which will become SDR Weight currency.
今年10月1日,国际货币基金组织将正式接受人民币,人民币将成为SDR的加权货币。
This October 1, the International Monetary Fund will officially accept the yuan, which will become SDR value currency.
今年10月1日,国际货币基金组织(IMF)将正式接受人民币, 人民币将成为SDR的货币价值.
This October 1, the International Monetary Fund will officially accept the yuan, which will become SDR rate currency.
今年10月1日,国际货币基金组织将正式接受人民币, 人民币将变成SDR利率货币.
This October 1, the International Monetary Fund will officially accept the yuan, which will become SDR unit currency.
今年10月1日,国际货币基金组织将正式接受人民币, 人民币将变成SDR的单位货币.
This October 1, the International Monetary Fund will officially accept the yuan, which will become SDR currency currency.
今年10月1日,国际货币基金组织(IMF)将正式接受人民币, 人民币将成为SDR货币.
This week, China's General Administration of Customs released statistics show that the first 7 months of this year, China's import and export value of 13. 21 trillion yuan, down 3 % over the same period last year.
本周,中国海关总署发布的统计表明,今年头7个月中国进出口值为13.21万亿元,较去年同期下降3%。
This week, China's General Administration of Customs released statistics show that the first 7 quarters of this year, China's import and export value of 13. 21 trillion yuan, down 3 % over the same period last year.
本周,中国海关总署发布的统计表明,今年前7季度中国进出口额为13.21万亿元,较去年同期下降3%。
This week, China's General Administration of Customs released statistics show that the first 7 months of this year, China's import and export value of 13. 21 trillion yuan, down 3 % over the same period previous year.
本周,中国海关总署发布统计,今年首7个月中国进出口值为13.21万亿元,较上年同期下降3%。
In July, China's total import and export value fell by only 0. 9 % year on year. In particular, China's export value had a year-on-year rise of 2. 9 %.
今年7月,中国进出口总值同比仅下降0.9%,特别是出口总值同比增长2.9%。
in July, China's total import and export value fell by only 0. 9 % year on year. In particular, China's export value had a year-on-year rise of 2. 9 %.
今年7月,中国进出口总值同比仅下降0.9%,特别是出口总值同比增长2.9%。

Relevant experts believed that despite the signs of stabilization in July, we should not have high expectations.
有关专家认为,尽管7月份出现了稳定的迹象,但我们不应抱有过高的期望。

Although the total value of imports and exports fell year on year, the export data enjoyed growth. This is the fifth consecutive month for export to achieve growth since March this year.
虽然进出口总额逐年下降,但出口数据却有增长,这是自今年3月以来出口实现增长连续第五个月。
Although the total value of imports and exports fell year on year, the export data enjoyed growth. This is the fourth consecutive month for export to achieve growth since March this year.

Shanghai police captured more than 3, 400 thieves and combated 157 " robbery fraud " gangs in 4 months
上海警方在4个月内抓获了3400多只盗贼,打击了157个“抢劫诈骗”团伙
Shanghai police captured more than 3, 400 thieves and combated 209 " robbery fraud " gangs in 4 months
上海警方在4个月内抓获了3400多只盗贼,打击了209个“抢劫诈骗”团伙

上海警方在4个月内抓获了3400多只盗贼,打击了27个“抢劫诈骗”团伙
Shanghai police captured more than 3, 400 thieves and combated nine " robbery fraud " gangs in 4 months
上海警方在4个月内抓获了3400多只盗贼,并打击了9个“抢劫诈骗”团伙
While detecting the case at the same time, the police also pressed for payments and recovered stolen goods totaling more than 33 million yuan.
警方在侦查案件的同时,还催缴了款项,追回被盗财物3300多万元。
While detecting the case at the same time, the police also pressed for payments and recovered stolen goods totaling more than 21 million yuan.

While detecting the case at the same time, the police also pressed for payments and recovered stolen goods totaling more than 23 million yuan.

While detecting the case at the same time, the police also pressed for payments and recovered stolen goods totaling more than 27 million yuan.
警方在侦查案件的同时,还催缴了2700多万元,追回了被盗财物。
According to the theft gang members, they came to Shanghai in the way of chartering unlicensed taxi. Then they came down the taxi and gathered and took taxi several hours later. Finally, they left Shanghai together.
据窃贼团伙成员说,他们来到上海是为了包租没有许可证的出租车,然后下了出租车,数小时后聚集并乘坐了出租车,最后他们一起离开了上海。
According to the theft gang members, they came to Shanghai in the way of chartering unlicensed taxi. Then they came down the taxi and gathered and took taxi some hours later. Finally, they left Shanghai together.
据盗窃团伙成员说,他们来到上海是为了包租未经许可的出租车,然后下了出租车,几小时后聚集并乘坐出租车,最后他们一起离开了上海。
According to the theft gang members, they came to Shanghai in the way of chartering unlicensed taxi. Then they came down the taxi and gathered and took taxi seven hours later. Finally, they left Shanghai together.
据窃贼团伙成员说,他们来到上海是为了包租没有许可证的出租车,然后下了出租车,七小时后聚集并乘坐出租车,最后他们一起离开了上海。
According to the theft gang members, they came to Shanghai in the way of chartering unlicensed taxi. Then they came down the taxi and gathered and took taxi six hours later. Finally, they left Shanghai together.
据窃贼团伙成员说,他们来到上海是为了包租没有许可证的出租车,然后下了出租车,6小时后聚集并乘坐了出租车,最后他们一起离开了上海。
According to the theft gang members, they came to Shanghai in the way of chartering unlicensed taxi. Then they came down the taxi and gathered and took taxi three hours later. Finally, they left Shanghai together.
据窃贼团伙成员说,他们来到上海是为了包租没有许可证的出租车,然后下了出租车,三小时后聚集并乘坐了出租车,最后他们一起离开了上海。
According to the theft gang members, they came to Shanghai in the way of chartering unlicensed taxi. Then they came down the taxi and gathered and took taxi ten hours later. Finally, they left Shanghai together.
据窃贼团伙成员说,他们来到上海是为了包租没有许可证的出租车,然后下了出租车,10小时后聚集并乘坐了出租车,最后他们一起离开了上海。

在犯法期间,犯罪嫌疑人爬上外墙,打破窗户围栏,从上到下扫地盗窃。

Recently, the suspect involved was transferred by Xuhui Public Security Bureau to Xuhui District Procuratorate for prosecution.
最近,徐汇公安局将涉案嫌疑人移交徐汇区检察院起诉。

Police reminded the general public to lock the doors and windows before going out. In addition, citizens are recommended to choose the relatively hard steel material for anti-theft window.

In late August, Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe will go to Kenya to attend the 6th African Development Conference, according to the Evening News Peak of Voice of China.
日本首相安倍晋三(Shinzo Abe)将于8月底前往肯尼亚出席第六届非洲发展会议。
In mid August, Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe will go to Kenya to attend the 6th African Development Conference, according to the Evening News Peak of Voice of China.
日本首相安倍晋三将于8月中旬前往肯尼亚出席第六届非洲发展会议。
In early August, Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe will go to Kenya to attend the 6th African Development Conference, according to the Evening News Peak of Voice of China.
日本首相安倍晋三将于8月初前往肯尼亚出席第六届非洲发展会议。
In Late August, Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe will go to Kenya to attend the 6th African Development Conference, according to the Evening News Peak of Voice of China.
日本首相安倍晋三将于8月下旬前往肯尼亚出席第六届非洲发展会议,据《中国之音晚间新闻高峰》报道。
In August August, Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe will go to Kenya to attend the 6th African Development Conference, according to the Evening News Peak of Voice of China.
日本首相安倍晋三将于8月前往肯尼亚出席第六届非洲发展会议。
In July August, Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe will go to Kenya to attend the 6th African Development Conference, according to the Evening News Peak of Voice of China.
日本首相安倍晋三将于今年8月前往肯尼亚出席第六届非洲发展会议。
The African Development Conference was dominated by Japan, and the previous five meetings were held in Tokyo, Japan or Yokohama, so this meeting will be the first move to Africa.
非洲 发展 会议 的 主要 成员 是 日本, 前 五 次 会议 在 东京 、 日本 或 横滨 举行, 因此, 这次 会议 将 是 向 非洲 迈出 的 第一步 。
The African Development Conference was dominated by Japan, and the previous five meetings were held in Tokyo, Japan or Yokohama, so this meeting will be the first move outside Africa.
非洲 发展 会议 的 主要 成员 是 日本, 前 五 次 会议 在 东京 、 日本 或 横滨 举行, 因此, 这次 会议 将 是 首次 离开 非洲 的 行动 。
The African Development Conference was dominated by Japan, and the previous five meetings were held in Tokyo, Japan or Yokohama, so this meeting is be the first move to Africa.
非洲 发展 会议 以 日本 为主, 前 五 次 会议 在 东京 、 日本 或 横滨 举行, 因此, 这次 会议 是 向 非洲 迈出 的 第一步 。
The African Development Conference was dominated by Japan, and the previous five meetings were held in Tokyo, Japan or Tokyo, so this meeting will be the first move to Africa.
非洲 发展 会议 的 主要 成员 是 日本, 前 五 次 会议 在 东京 、 日本 或 东京 举行, 因此, 这次 会议 将 是 向 非洲 迈出 的 第一步 。
Japanese Foreign Ministry officials said the meeting held in Africa will help to attract attentions of African and European countries to Japan.
日本外务省官员说,在非洲举行的会议将有助于吸引非洲和欧洲国家对日本的关注。

”根据日本联合新闻社报道,根据安倍晋三的访问,日本自由民主党将派议会团体前往有关国家。
In line with the trip of Shinzo Abe, confirmed to Kyodo news agency, the Japanese Liberal Democrats will send parliamentary groups to the countries concerned.
根据安倍晋三(Shinzo Abe)对京都通讯社的证实,日本自由民主党(Japan Liber Democrats)将向有关国家派遣议会团体。
In line with the trip of Shinzo Abe, announced to Kyodo news agency, the Japanese Liberal Democrats will send parliamentary groups to the countries concerned.
根据安倍晋三(Shinzo Abe)对京都通讯社宣布的访问,日本自由民主党(Japan Liber Democrats)将向有关国家派遣议会团体。
In line with the trip of Shinzo Abe, said to Kyodo news agency, the Japanese Liberal Democrats will send parliamentary groups to the countries concerned.
根据安倍晋三(Shinzo Abe)对京都通讯社的采访,日本自由民主党(Japan Liber Democrats)将向有关国家派遣议会团体。
Japan's " application to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council " began in the early 90s of the last century while the African-sponsored African Development Conference also began in 1993. This is not a coincidence.
日本 “ 成为 联合国 安全理事会 常任理事国 的 申请 ” 始于 上个 世纪 90 年代 初, 而 由 非洲 赞助 的 非洲 发展 会议 也 于 1993年 开始, 这 不是 一 个 巧合 。
Japan's " application to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council " began in the early 90s of the last century while the African-hosted African Development Conference also began in 1993. This is not a coincidence.
日本 “ 成为 联合国 安全理事会 常任理事国 的 申请 ” 始于 上个 世纪 90 年代 初, 而 由 非洲 主持 的 非洲 发展 会议 也 于 1993年 开始, 这 不是 一 个 巧合 。
Japan's " application to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council " began in the early 90s of the last century while the African-led African Development Conference also began in 1993. This is not a coincidence.
日本 “ 成为 联合国 安全理事会 常任理事国 的 申请 ” 始于 上个 世纪 90 年代 初, 而 由 非洲 领导 的 非洲 发展 会议 也 于 1993年 开始, 这 不是 一 个 巧合 。

Japan's " application to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council " began in the early 90s of the last century while the African-sponsored African Development Conference also commenced in 1993. This is not a coincidence.

Africa has 53 seats in the United Nations and is therefore an important ticket bunker of the United Nation. How can Japan give up Africa if it wanted to join the United Nations Security Council ?
非洲在联合国有53个席位,因此是一个重要的票房,日本如何才能放弃非洲,如果它想加入联合国安理会?

Abe has announced here that in order to stabilize the stability of sub-Saharan African countries, it will provide 100 billion yen ( about RMB 6. 1 billion ) in five years.
安倍在这里宣布,为了稳定撒哈拉以南非洲国家的稳定,五年内将提供1000亿日元(约合61亿日元)。

安倍在这里宣布,为了稳定撒哈拉以南非洲国家的稳定,五年内将发放1000亿日元(约合61亿日元)。
Abe has announced here that in order to stabilize the stability of sub-Saharan African countries, it will give 100 billion yen ( about RMB 6. 1 billion ) in five years.
安倍在这里宣布,为了稳定撒哈拉以南非洲国家的稳定,五年内将提供1000亿日元(约合61亿日元)。
Observers generally believe that there are two purposes behind Japan's generosity toward Africa : first, to increase Japan's presence in Africa ; second, to win the support of African countries on the application to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.
观察人士普遍认为,日本慷慨支持非洲有两个目的:第一,增加日本在非洲的存在;第二,在申请成为联合国安理会常任理事国方面赢得非洲国家的支持。
Observers generally think that there are two purposes behind Japan's generosity toward Africa : first, to increase Japan's presence in Africa ; second, to win the support of African countries on the application to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.
观察人士普遍认为,日本慷慨支持非洲有两个目的:第一,增加日本在非洲的存在;第二,在申请成为联合国安理会常任理事国方面赢得非洲国家的支持。
Observers generally consider that there are two purposes behind Japan's generosity toward Africa : first, to increase Japan's presence in Africa ; second, to win the support of African countries on the application to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.
观察人士普遍认为,日本慷慨支持非洲有两个目的:第一,增加日本在非洲的存在;第二,在申请成为联合国安理会常任理事国方面赢得非洲国家的支持。
Observers generally believe that there are two purposes behind Japan's generosity toward Africa : first, to increase Japan's presence in Africa ; second, to gain the support of African countries on the application to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.
观察人士普遍认为,日本慷慨支持非洲有两个目的:第一,增加日本在非洲的存在;第二,在申请成为联合国安理会常任理事国方面获得非洲国家的支持。
Observers generally believe that there are two purposes behind Japan's generosity toward Africa : first, to increase Japan's presence in Africa ; second, to get the support of African countries on the application to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.
观察人士普遍认为,日本慷慨支持非洲有两个目的:第一,增加日本在非洲的存在;第二,在申请成为联合国安理会常任理事国时获得非洲国家的支持。
Observers generally believe that there are two purposes behind Japan's generosity toward Africa : first, to increase Japan's presence in Africa ; second, to obtain the support of African countries on the application to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.
观察人士普遍认为,日本慷慨支持非洲有两个目的:第一,增加日本在非洲的存在;第二,在申请成为联合国安理会常任理事国方面获得非洲国家的支持。
" In terms of politics, Africa is relatively lagging behind, but there are many African countries. So Japan has always regarded it as the so-called'big ticket field ,'" said Yang Bojiang, an expert for Japanese issues.
在政治方面,非洲相对落后,但有很多非洲国家,因此日本一直把它看作是所谓的“大票场”,日本问题专家杨波江(音译)说。
" In regards of politics, Africa is relatively lagging behind, but there are many African countries. So Japan has always regarded it as the so-called'big ticket field ,'" said Yang Bojiang, an expert for Japanese issues.
“在政治方面,非洲相对落后,但有很多非洲国家,因此日本一直把它看作是所谓的“大票场”,日本问题专家杨波江(音译)说。
" In terms of politics, Africa is relatively lagging behind, but there are many African countries. So Japan has always viewed it as the so-called'big ticket field ,'" said Yang Bojiang, an expert for Japanese issues.
在政治方面,非洲相对落后,但有很多非洲国家,因此日本一直把它看作是所谓的“大票场”,日本问题专家杨波江(音译)说。
" In terms of politics, Africa is relatively lagging behind, but there are many African countries. So Japan has always considered it as the so-called'big ticket field ,'" said Yang Bojiang, an expert for Japanese issues.
“在政治方面,非洲相对落后,但有很多非洲国家,因此日本一直将其视为所谓的“大票场”,日本问题专家杨波江(音译)说。
" In terms of politics, Africa is relatively lagging behind, but there are many African countries. So Japan has always perceived it as the so-called'big ticket field ,'" said Yang Bojiang, an expert for Japanese issues.
在政治方面,非洲相对落后,但有很多非洲国家,因此日本一直把它看作是所谓的“大票场”,日本问题专家杨波江(音译)说。
" In terms of politics, Africa is relatively lagging behind, but there are many African countries. So Japan has always seen it as the so-called'big ticket field ,'" said Yang Bojiang, an expert for Japanese issues.
在政治方面,非洲相对落后,但有很多非洲国家,因此日本一直把它看作是所谓的“大票场”,日本问题专家杨波江(音译)说。
Japan will not give up in the future and its work on Africa will not be terminated but gradually strengthened.
日本 今后 不会 放弃, 其 关于 非洲 的 工作 将 不会 结束, 而 将 逐渐 加强 。
Japan will not give up in the future and its work on Africa will not be terminated but gradually strengthen.
日本 今后 不会 放弃, 其 关于 非洲 的 工作 将 不会 结束, 而 将 逐渐 加强 。
Japan will not give up in the future and its work in Africa will not be terminated but gradually strengthened.
日本 今后 不会 放弃, 它 在 非洲 的 工作 不会 结束, 而 会 逐渐 加强 。
Japan will not give up in the will and its work on Africa will not be terminated but gradually strengthened.
日本不会放弃这一意愿,日本有关非洲的工作不会终止,而是会逐步加强。
Economically, Japan enjoys a strong production capacity, but its domestic market is relatively limited. In particular, the domestic demand is relatively weak in the context of aging population.
日本在经济上具有很强的生产能力,但其国内市场相对有限,特别是人口老龄化情况下,国内需求相对疲软。
Economically, Japan enjoys a strong production capacity, but its domestic market is relatively limited. In particular, the home demand is relatively weak in the context of aging population.
日本在经济上具有很强的生产能力,但其国内市场相对有限,特别是在人口老龄化的背景下,国内需求相对疲软。
Economically, Japan enjoys a strong production capacity, but its domestic market is relatively limited. In particular, the household demand is relatively weak in the context of aging population.
在经济上,日本的生产能力很强,但其国内市场相对有限,特别是在人口老龄化的背景下,家庭需求相对疲软。
However, from Junichiro Koizumi, who was Japan's prime minister 10 years ago, to the present Abe, Japan has repeatedly launched the " sprint " scheme. However, all schemes were abandoned eventually.
然而,从10年前日本首相小泉纯一郎(Junichiro Koizumi)到现在的安倍,日本一再推出“短跑”计划,但最终放弃了所有计划。
However, from Junichiro Koizumi, who was Japan's prime minister 10 years ago, to the present Abe, Japan has continuously launched the " sprint " scheme. However, all schemes were abandoned eventually.
然而,从10年前日本首相小泉纯一郎(Junichiro Koizumi)到现在的安倍(Abe),日本一直在不断推出“短跑”计划,但最终放弃了所有计划。
However, from Junichiro Koizumi, who was Japan's prime minister 10 years ago, to the present Abe, Japan has consistently launched the " sprint " scheme. However, all schemes were abandoned eventually.
然而,从10年前日本首相小泉纯一郎(Junichiro Koizumi)到现在的安倍(Abe),日本一直推行“短跑”计划,但最终放弃了所有计划。
However, from Junichiro Koizumi, who was Japan's prime minister 10 years ago, to the present Abe, Japan has repeatedly deployed the " sprint " scheme. However, all schemes were abandoned eventually.
然而,从10年前日本首相小泉纯一郎(Junichiro Koizumi)到现在的安倍,日本一再部署“短跑”计划,但最终放弃了所有计划。
However, from Junichiro Koizumi, who was Japan's prime minister 10 years ago, to the present Abe, Japan has repeatedly attempted the " sprint " scheme. However, all schemes were abandoned eventually.
然而,从10年前日本首相小泉纯一郎(Junichiro Koizumi)到现在的安倍,日本一再尝试“短跑”计划,但最终放弃了所有计划。
However, from Junichiro Koizumi, who was Japan's prime minister 10 years ago, to the present Abe, Japan has repeatedly tried the " sprint " scheme. However, all schemes were abandoned eventually.
然而,从10年前日本首相小泉纯一郎(Junichiro Koizumi)到现在的安倍,日本一再尝试“短跑”计划,但最终放弃了所有计划。
Yang Bojiang believed that the intension of Japan to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council is be clear at a glance. However, the road is bound to be full of obstacles.
杨波江认为,日本成为联合国安理会常任理事国的内涵是显而易见的,但是,道路上肯定会充满障碍。
Yang Bo Jiang believed that the intension of Japan to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council is be clear at a glance. However, the road is bound to be full of obstacles.
杨伯江认为,日本成为联合国安理会常任理事国的内涵是显而易见的,但是,道路上肯定会充满障碍。
Yang Bo Ying believed that the intension of Japan to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council is be clear at a glance. However, the road is bound to be full of obstacles.
杨伯英认为,日本成为联合国安理会常任理事国的内涵是显而易见的,然而,道路上肯定会充满障碍。
Yang Bo Feng believed that the intension of Japan to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council is be clear at a glance. However, the road is bound to be full of obstacles.
杨伯风认为,日本成为联合国安理会常任理事国的内涵是显而易见的,然而,道路上肯定会充满障碍。
Yang Bo Yin believed that the intension of Japan to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council is be clear at a glance. However, the road is bound to be full of obstacles.
杨伯银认为,日本成为联合国安理会常任理事国的内涵是显而易见的,然而,道路上肯定会充满障碍。
Yang Bojiang believed that the intension of Japan to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council is be clear at a glance. However, the way is bound to be full of obstacles.
杨波江认为,日本成为联合国安理会常任理事国的内涵是显而易见的,然而,道路却充满了障碍。
To achieve its own goals, Japan should firstly do a good job with the surrounding countries. And Japan needs to have a correct attitude no matter in geopolitical competition or in the national dispute or understanding of a historical problem.
为了实现自己的目标,日本首先应该和周边国家一起做好自己的工作,而无论在地缘政治竞争中,在民族纠纷中,或在对历史问题的理解中,日本都需要采取正确的态度。
To achieve its own goals, Japan should firstly do a good job with the surrounding countries. And Japan has to have a correct attitude no matter in geopolitical competition or in the national dispute or understanding of a historical problem.
为了实现自己的目标,日本首先应该与周边国家合作,不管在地缘政治竞争中,在民族纠纷中,或在对历史问题的理解中,日本都必须保持正确的态度。
To achieve its own goals, Japan should firstly do a good job with the surrounding countries. And Japan must to have a correct attitude no matter in geopolitical competition or in the national dispute or understanding of a historical problem.
为了实现自己的目标,日本应该首先与周边国家合作,并且无论在地缘政治竞争中、在民族纠纷中、在历史问题上,日本都必须保持正确的态度。
To achieve its own goals, Japan should firstly do a good job with the surrounding countries. And Japan should to have a correct attitude no matter in geopolitical competition or in the national dispute or understanding of a historical problem.
为了实现自己的目标,日本应该首先与周边国家合作,在地缘政治竞争、国家争端或对历史问题的理解中,都要保持正确的态度。
To achieve its own goals, Japan should firstly do a good job with the surrounding countries. And Japan is to have a correct attitude no matter in geopolitical competition or in the national dispute or understanding of a historical problem.
为了实现自己的目标,日本应该首先与周边国家合作,在地缘政治竞争、国家争端或历史问题的理解中,都要保持正确的态度。
To achieve its own goals, Japan should firstly do a good job with the surrounding states. And Japan needs to have a correct attitude no matter in geopolitical competition or in the national dispute or understanding of a historical problem.
为了实现自己的目标,日本首先应该与周边国家合作,而无论在地缘政治竞争中,在民族纠纷中,或在对历史问题的理解中,日本都需要有一个正确的态度。

Fan Deshang is a Ph. D. in Peking University and a deputy director and secretary general of the Global Governance Research Center of Peking University. He was the former director of Cornell University in Beijing.
范德尚是北京大学的博士,北京大学全球治理研究中心副主任兼秘书长,曾任北京康奈尔大学的主任。

范德尚是北京大学的博士,北京大学全球治理研究中心副主任兼主任,曾任北京康奈尔大学的主任。
Fan Deshang is a Ph. D. in Peking University and a deputy director and chair general of the Global Governance Research Center of Peking University. He was the former director of Cornell University in Beijing.
范德尚是北京大学的博士,北京大学全球治理研究中心副主任兼主任,曾任北京康奈尔大学的主任。
The current research focuses on the profound changes in global politics, economy, science and technology, culture and religion, and the opportunities and challenges that these changes bring to national governance, leadership, and global governance.
目前的研究侧重于全球政治、经济、科学和技术、文化和宗教的深刻变化,以及这些变化给国家治理、领导和全球治理带来的机遇和挑战。
The current research centers on the profound changes in global politics, economy, science and technology, culture and religion, and the opportunities and challenges that these changes bring to national governance, leadership, and global governance.

The current research is on the profound changes in global politics, economy, science and technology, culture and religion, and the opportunities and challenges that these changes bring to national governance, leadership, and global governance.

The current research includes on the profound changes in global politics, economy, science and technology, culture and religion, and the opportunities and challenges that these changes bring to national governance, leadership, and global governance.

The current research covers on the profound changes in global politics, economy, science and technology, culture and religion, and the opportunities and challenges that these changes bring to national governance, leadership, and global governance.

Organized by the Federation of Hong Kong Chiu Chow Community Organizations, " 2016 Bon Culture Festival " was held in Victoria Park between the 12th day and the 14th day of the month. It's the largest grand club in Hong Kong.
由香港潮州社区组织联合会主办的「2016年清新文化节」于本月十二日至十四日在维多利亚公园举行,是香港最大的大俱乐部。
Organized by the Federation of Hong Kong Chiu Chow Community Organizations, " 2016 Bon Culture Festival " was held in Victoria Park between the 12th day and the 14th day of the month. It's the largest Grand club in Hong Kong.
由香港潮州社区组织联合会主办的「2016年清新文化节」于本月十二日至十四日在维多利亚公园举行,是香港最大的大俱乐部。
Organized by the Federation of Hong Kong Chiu Chow Community Organizations, " 2016 Bon Culture Festival " was held in Victoria Park between the 12th day and the 14th day of the month. It's the largest formal club in Hong Kong.
由香港潮州社区组织联合会主办的「2016年清新文化节」于本月十二日至十四日在维多利亚公园举行,是香港最大的正式俱乐部。
Organized by the Federation of Hong Kong Chiu Chow Community Organizations, " 2016 Bon Culture Festival " was held in Victoria Park between the 12th day and the 14th day of the month. It's the largest social club in Hong Kong.

Bon culture history is introduced in the form of comic books. In addition, Bon theme 3D self-timer area, traditional snack area and traditional craft flow classroom are set up at the scene, attracting many friends and overseas travelers for visit.
以漫画书的形式介绍了博文文化史,并在现场设置了博文主题3D自定时区、传统快餐区和传统工艺流程教室,吸引了众多朋友和海外旅游者前来参观。

" We do not want to make the Bon Culture Festival very horrifying, which may spook people, especially the children, " said Hu Yansong, the chief responsible person of the event.
“我们不想让邦文化节变得非常恐怖,这可能会吓到人们,特别是孩子,”胡彦颂说,他是这个节日的主要负责人。
" We do not want to make the Bon Culture Festival extremely horrifying, which may spook people, especially the children, " said Hu Yansong, the chief responsible person of the event.
“我们不希望让博文化节变得极端恐怖,这可能会吓到人们,特别是孩子,”胡彦颂说,他是这个活动的主要负责人。
" We do not want to make the Bon Culture Festival too horrifying, which may spook people, especially the children, " said Hu Yansong, the chief responsible person of the event.
“我们不希望让博文节太恐怖,这可能会吓到人们,特别是孩子,”胡彦颂说,他是这个活动的主要负责人。
" We hope that through the youthful activities and layout of the scene, so that young people know that the culture behind the Bon Festival is to express the filial piety and thanksgiving. "
我们希望通过青春的活动和场景布局,让年轻人知道,博文节背后的文化就是表达孝道和感恩。
" We hope that through the youthful activities and layout of the scene, so that young people know that the culture behind the Mon Festival is to express the filial piety and thanksgiving. "
我们希望通过青年的活动和场景布局,让年轻人知道蒙节背后的文化是表达孝道和感恩。
" We hope that through the youthful activities and layout of the scene, so that young people know that the culture behind the May Festival is to express the filial piety and thanksgiving. "
我们希望通过青年的活动和场景布局,让年轻人知道五月节背后的文化是表达孝道和感恩。
" We hope that through the youthful activities and layout of the scene, so that young people know that the culture behind the Grand Festival is to express the filial piety and thanksgiving. "
我们希望通过青年的活动和场景布局,让年轻人知道大庆文化背后是表达孝道和感恩。

我们希望通过青年的活动和场景布局,让年轻人懂得一个节的文化是表达孝道和感恩。

It is understood that the Federation of Hong Kong Chiu Chow Community Organizations is listed as " national intangible cultural heritage list " in 2011.
据悉,2011年,香港千州社区组织联合会被列为“全国非物质文化遗产名录”。
It is accepted that the Federation of Hong Kong Chiu Chow Community Organizations is listed as " national intangible cultural heritage list " in 2011.
据悉,香港仇州社区组织联合会于2011年被列为“全国非物质文化遗产名录”。

据了解,2011年,香港仇州社区组织联合会被列为“全国非物质文化遗产名录”。
It is believed that the Federation of Hong Kong Chiu Chow Community Organizations is listed as " national intangible cultural heritage list " in 2011.
据悉,2011年,香港仇州社区组织联合会被列为“全国非物质文化遗产名录”。
It is estimated that the Federation of Hong Kong Chiu Chow Community Organizations is listed as " national intangible cultural heritage list " in 2011.
据估计,香港仇州社区组织联合会在2011年被列为“国家非物质文化遗产清单”。
On the evening of the 11th day of the month, China National Peking Opera Theater took its famous TV play " White Snake " and traveled thousands of miles to Mexico City. They presented the local people with an authentic Peking Opera feast in the Mexican National Palace.
本月十一日晚上,中国国家京剧剧团收看了著名的电视剧《白蛇》,前往墨西哥城数千英里,在墨西哥国家宫内为当地人民举行了真正的京剧宴会。
On the evening of the 11th day of the month, China National Peking Opera Theater took its famous TV play " White Snake " and traveled thousands of miles to Mexico City. They presented the local people with an authentic Peking Opera feast in the Mexico National Palace.
本月十一日晚上,中国国家京剧剧场收看了著名的电视剧《白蛇》,飞向墨西哥城数千英里,在墨西哥国家宫内为当地人民举行了真正的京剧宴会。
On the evening of the 11th day of the month, China National Peking Opera Theater took its famous TV play " White Snake " and traveled thousands of miles to México City. They presented the local people with an authentic Peking Opera feast in the Mexican National Palace.
本月十一日晚上,中国国家京剧剧场收看著名的电视剧《白蛇》,前往墨西哥市数千英里,在墨西哥国家宫内为当地人民举行真正的京剧宴会。
On the evening of the 11th day of the month, China National Peking Opera Theater took its famous TV play " White Snake " and traveled thousands of miles to Mexican City. They presented the local people with an authentic Peking Opera feast in the Mexican National Palace.
本月十一日晚上,中国国家京剧剧场收看了著名的电视剧《白蛇》,飞向墨西哥城数千英里,在墨西哥国家宫内为当地人民举行了真正的京剧宴会。
As the key performance project of " Sino-Latin American Cultural Exchange Year ", from August 9 to 23, China National Peking Opera Theater performed seven opera in the Mexican capital Mexico City and Córdoba, Juarez and other five cities.
作为8月9日至23日“中拉美文化交流年”的主要演出项目,中国京剧剧院在墨西哥首都墨西哥城、科尔多瓦、华雷斯等五大城市演出了七部歌剧。
As the key performance project of " Sino-Latin American Cultural Exchange Year ", from August 9 to 23, China National Peking Opera Theater performed six opera in the Mexican capital Mexico City and Córdoba, Juarez and other five cities.
作为8月9日至23日“中拉美文化交流年”的主要演出项目,中国京剧剧院在墨西哥首都墨西哥城、科尔多瓦、华雷斯等五大城市演出了六部歌剧。
As the key performance project of " Sino-Latin American Cultural Exchange Year ", from August 9 to 23, China National Peking Opera Theater performed nine opera in the Mexican capital Mexico City and Córdoba, Juarez and other five cities.
作为8月9日至23日“中拉美文化交流年”的主要演出项目,中国京剧剧院在墨西哥首都墨西哥城、科尔多瓦、华雷斯等5个城市演出了9部歌剧。
As the key performance project of " Sino-Latin American Cultural Exchange Year ", from August 9 to 23, China National Peking Opera Theater performed eight opera in the Mexican capital Mexico City and Córdoba, Juarez and other five cities.
作为8月9日至23日“中拉美文化交流年”的主要演出项目,中国京剧剧院在墨西哥首都墨西哥城、科尔多瓦、华雷斯等5个城市演出了8部歌剧。
As the key performance project of " Sino-Latin American Cultural Exchange Year ", from August 9 to 23, China National Peking Opera Theater performed five opera in the Mexican capital Mexico City and Córdoba, Juarez and other five cities.
作为8月9日至23日“中拉美文化交流年”的主要演出项目,中国京剧剧院在墨西哥首都墨西哥城、科尔多瓦、华雷斯等5个城市演出了5个歌剧。
As the key performance project of " Sino-Latin American Cultural Exchange Year ", from August 9 to 23, China National Peking Opera Theater performed four opera in the Mexican capital Mexico City and Córdoba, Juarez and other five cities.
作为8月9日至23日“中拉美文化交流年”的主要演出项目,中国京剧剧院在墨西哥首都墨西哥城、科尔多瓦、华雷斯等五大城市演出了四部歌剧。
The audience sometimes smiled and sometimes applauded for the changing and concluding of the " White Snake " episode and the actor's singing.
观众有时会微笑,有时会因《白蛇》的改编和结束以及演员的歌声而鼓掌。
The audience sometimes smiled and sometimes applauded for the changing and concluding of the " White Viper " episode and the actor's singing.
观众们有时会微笑,有时会因“白蛇”片的变化和结束以及演员的歌声而鼓掌。

墨西哥观众的热情给年轻的白人女演员留下了深刻的印象。
The enthusiasm of Mexican audience left a deep impression on the young actress of play white.
墨西哥观众的热情给年轻演员的扮演留下了深刻的印象.
" It never occurred to me that the Mexican audience were so enthusiastic. I had some worries about whether they could understand the story, but it was beyond my expectation to see them catch the story and the laughter today.
我从未想到墨西哥观众如此热心,我担心他们能否理解这个故事,但是今天看到他们领悟这个故事和笑声实在超出我的预料。

Qiu Xiaoqi, the Chinese ambassador to Mexico, said that the various cultural exchange activities of this year's " Sino-Latin American Cultural Exchange Year " promoted the two peoples to deepen mutual understanding and enhance their friendship.
中国驻墨西哥大使邱晓琪表示,今年“中拉美文化交流年”的多种文化交流活动,促进了两国人民加深相互理解,增进友谊。

Qiu Xiaoqi, the Chinese ambassador to Mexico, said that the respective cultural exchange activities of this year's " Sino-Latin American Cultural Exchange Year " promoted the two peoples to deepen mutual understanding and enhance their friendship.
中国驻墨西哥大使邱晓琪表示,今年“中拉美文化交流年”的文化交流活动,促进了两国人民加深相互理解,增进友谊。
Next year is the 45th anniversary for the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and Mexico. By then there will be more cultural exchange activities held in China and Mexico.
明年是中墨建交45周年,届时两国将开展更多的文化交流活动。
Next year is the 45th anniversary for the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and Mexico. By then there will be more cultural exchange activities held between China and Mexico.
明年是中墨建交45周年,届时两国将开展更多的文化交流活动。

刘思贵来到三亚进行“双修复双城”研究,要求提高城市建设管理水平

In the morning of 12th day of the month, Liu Cigui presided over a symposium, listened to the report of the progress of the pilot project of " Double Restoration and Dual City " and the suggestions and comments of the relevant departments.
周一上午12时,刘志贵主持了研讨会,听取了“双复和双城”试点工作进展情况报告,并听取了有关部门的建议和评论。

In the morning of 12th day of the month, Liu Cigui presided over a symposium, discussed to the report of the progress of the pilot project of " Double Restoration and Dual City " and the suggestions and comments of the relevant departments.
周一上午12时,刘志贵主持座谈会,就“双复和双城”试点的进展情况和有关部门的建议及意见进行讨论。
Liu Cigui provided fully affirmation for the stage results and good experiences and practice.
刘志贵充分肯定了舞台演出的结果和良好的经验与实践。
Liu Cigui provided fully affirmation for the stage result and good experiences and practice.
刘志贵充分肯定了舞台结果和良好的实践经验.
Liu Cigui stressed that Sanya should firmly grasp the historical development opportunities and take the pilot work of " Double Restoration and Dual City " as key content to give full play to the leading role of demonstration during the economic and social development in order to firmly grasp historical development opportunities.
刘志贵强调,三亚要牢牢把握历史发展机遇,以“双回双城”试点工作为关键内容,充分发挥示范在经济和社会发展中的主导作用,牢牢把握历史发展机遇。

In the 14 years of her sports career, Deng Yaping won a total of 18 world championships, becoming the first Chinese to win four Olympic gold medals in China's Olympic history.
在她14年的体育生涯中,邓亚平总共赢得了18个世界冠军,成为在中国奥运史上赢得4枚金牌的第一个中国人。
In the 14 years of her sport career, Deng Yaping won a total of 18 world championships, becoming the first Chinese to win four Olympic gold medals in China's Olympic history.

In the 14 years of her sporting career, Deng Yaping won a total of 18 world championships, becoming the first Chinese to win four Olympic gold medals in China's Olympic history.

In the 14 years of her athletics career, Deng Yaping won a total of 18 world championships, becoming the first Chinese to win four Olympic gold medals in China's Olympic history.
在她14年的田径生涯中,邓亚平总共赢得了18个世界冠军,成为在中国奥运史上赢得4枚金牌的第一个中国人。
In the 14 years of her sports competition, Deng Yaping won a total of 18 world championships, becoming the first Chinese to win four Olympic gold medals in China's Olympic history.
在她14年的体育比赛中,邓亚平总共赢得了18个世界冠军,成为在中国奥运史上赢得4枚奥运金牌的首个中国人。
In the 14 years of her sports championships, Deng Yaping won a total of 18 world championships, becoming the first Chinese to win four Olympic gold medals in China's Olympic history.

She ranked first in the table tennis for 8 years to maintain the world's first and is a female athlete to rank as the " the world's first " for the longest time in the history of table tennis.
她连续8年在乒乓球比赛中位居榜首,保持了世界第一位,也是在乒乓球比赛史上最长时间里名列“世界第一位”的女性运动员。

许多NBA球员表现出了他们的力量, 但是只要有进步, 就会下降.
Whether it is because of the increase in age or limited playing time, some players will have regressive performance each season.
无论是由于年龄的延长或者比赛时间的限制,一些球员每个赛季都会有递减的成绩。
Whether it is because of the increase in age or limited playing time, some players will have regressive performance each year.
不管是年龄增加还是比赛时间有限,一些球员的成绩每年都会下降。
Whether it is because of the increase in age or limited playing time, some players will have regressive performances each season.

Whether it is because of the increased in age or limited playing time, some players will have regressive performance each season.
不管是年龄增加还是有限的比赛时间,一些球员每个赛季都会有递减的成绩。
Of course, some " retreat " may only be data shrink, but the strength of these players may not have been reduced.
当然,一些“撤退”可能只是数据萎缩,但是这些玩家的力量可能并没有被降低。

At 19 : 45 today, in one match of the 22nd round of Chinese Football Association Super League, Chongqing Lifan Football Club challenged Beijing Guoan Talent Football Club in the visiting field.
在今天的19:45,在22轮中国足球协会超级联赛中,重庆丽凡足球俱乐部挑战了北京国安足球俱乐部的客场。
At the 29th minute, Wang Dong led to scoring one ball. At the 39th minute, with assistance by Fernando, the new support Kardec won the first score of the Chinese Football Association Super League. At the 81st minute, Guoan regained a score.
第29分钟,王东夺得一球,第39分钟,在费尔南多的帮助下,卡德科赢得了中国足球协会超级联赛第1分,第81分钟,郭安夺得一分。
At the 29th minute, Wang Dong led to scoring one ball. At the 39th minute, with assistance by Fernando, the new support Kardec won the first score of the Chinese Football Association Super League. At the 77st minute, Guoan regained a score.

英国在斐济大师们看到七人榄球队拿起金牌后,于是选择了七人榄球队的银牌

英国人在主班看到七人榄球队拿起金牌后,便决定以七人榄球队的成绩夺得银牌

英国在斐济大师们看到七人榄球队拿起铜牌后,于是选择了七人榄球队的银牌
Britain settle for silver in rugby sixs after Fiji masterclass sees them take gold
英国在斐济大师们看到六人榄球队拿起金牌后,便决定以六人榄球队夺得银牌
Great Britain's impressive run in the Rugby 7s was brought to a crashing halt at the final hurdle by Fiji in the final on Thursday night when they were comprehensively beaten 43-7 at the Deodoro Stadium here in Rio.
周四晚上,斐济队在7号橄榄球赛决赛中击败了英国令人印象深刻的决赛,在里约热内卢的德奥多罗体育场,他们被全面击败43比7。

Great Britain's impressive run in the Rugby 7s was brought to a crashing halt at the final hurdle by Fiji in the final on Thursday night when they were comprehensively beaten 45-7 at the Deodoro Stadium here in Rio.
周四晚上,斐济队在7号橄榄球赛决赛决赛时,在力拓的德奥多罗体育场被全面击败,英国队在7号橄榄球赛中的表现令人印象深刻。
Fiji gave a masterclass in handling, off-loading, side-stepping, support play, running lines and brute strength to win gold-their first Olympic medal of any colour.
斐济 给 了 一 个 处理 、 卸载 、 侧身 踩踏 、 支持 、 跑步 和 野蛮 力量 的 大师 班, 以 赢得 他们 的 第一块 任何 颜色 的 奥运会 奖牌 。
the gave a masterclass in handling, off-loading, side-stepping, support play, running lines and brute strength to win gold-their first Olympic medal of any colour.
为了赢得金牌--他们的第一块任何颜色的奥运奖牌--在操控、卸载、侧身、支持、排球、跑步和强力方面,都给了大师级。
in gave a masterclass in handling, off-loading, side-stepping, support play, running lines and brute strength to win gold-their first Olympic medal of any colour.

Learn more about the history of downtown's Central Library as the Society of Architectural Historians / Southern California Chapter hosts a salon with Arnold Schwartzman and Stephen Gee, authors of the new book " Los Angeles Central Library : A History of its Art and Architecture ".
了解更多关于市中心图书馆的历史作为建筑史学家协会南加州分会与阿诺德·施瓦茨曼和史蒂芬·吉主持沙龙的新书《洛杉矶中央图书馆:艺术与建筑史》的作者。

Learn more about the history of downtown's Central Library as the Society of Architectural Historians / Southern California Chapter hosts a salon with Arnold Schwartzman and Daniel Gee, authors of the new book " Los Angeles Central Library : A History of its Art and Architecture ".
了解更多关于市中心图书馆的历史作为建筑史学家协会南加州分会与阿诺德·施瓦茨曼和丹尼尔·吉主持沙龙的新书《洛杉矶中央图书馆:艺术和建筑史》的作者。
Gee and Schwartzman are scheduled to discuss and share images of the 1926 Bertram Goodhue design as well as the 1993 restoration and addition by Hardy Holzman Pfeiffer Associates.

Inflation in Bulgaria was 1 % on a monthly basis in July, national statistics show.
国家统计数据显示,保加利亚7月份的月通胀率为1%.

The consumer price index in July 2016 compared to June 2016 was 101. 0 %, i. e. the monthly inflation was 1. 0 %.
与2016年6月相比,2016年7月的消费物价指数为101.0%,即月通胀率为1.0%。
The consumer price index in June 2016 compared to June 2016 was 101. 0 %, i. e. the monthly inflation was 1. 0 %.
与2016年6月相比,2016年6月的消费物价指数为101.0%,即月通胀率为1.0%。

Officials from the United States Central Command altered intelligence reports to portray a more optimistic picture of the war against the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria than events on the ground warranted, a congressional panel said in a report issued Thursday.
美国中央司令部官员在周四发布的一份报告中称,美国中央司令部官员修改了情报报告,以显示在伊拉克和叙利亚对伊斯兰国发动战争的情况比当地发生的事件更为乐观。
Officials from the United States Central Command modified intelligence reports to portray a more optimistic picture of the war against the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria than events on the ground warranted, a congressional panel said in a report issued Thursday.

Officials from the United States Central Command shifted intelligence reports to portray a more optimistic picture of the war against the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria than events on the ground warranted, a congressional panel said in a report issued Thursday.

Officials from the United States Central Command altered intelligence reports to portray a more optimistic picture of the fight against the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria than events on the ground warranted, a congressional panel said in a report issued Thursday.
美国中央司令部官员在周四发布的一份报告中称,美国中央司令部官员修改了情报报告,以显示在伊拉克和叙利亚打击伊斯兰国的情况比当地发生的事件更为乐观。
The interim report, from a task force established by the Republican chairmen of the House Armed Services Committee, Intelligence Committee and Defense Appropriations Subcommittee, found " widespread dissatisfaction " among Central Command intelligence analysts, who said superiors were doctoring their assessments of American efforts to defeat the Islamic State.
这份由众议院军事事务委员会、情报委员会和国防拨款小组委员会共和党主席组成的特别工作组的中期报告发现,中央司令部情报分析师“普遍不满”,他们表示,上级正在修改他们对美国击败伊斯兰国的努力的评估。
The interim report, from a task group established by the Republican chairmen of the House Armed Services Committee, Intelligence Committee and Defense Appropriations Subcommittee, found " widespread dissatisfaction " among Central Command intelligence analysts, who said superiors were doctoring their assessments of American efforts to defeat the Islamic State.
由众议院军务委员会、情报委员会和国防拨款小组委员会共和党主席组成的一个工作组的中期报告发现,中央指挥部情报分析师“普遍不满”,他们表示,上级正在修改他们对美国击败伊斯兰国的努力的评估。
The interim report, from a task team established by the Republican chairmen of the House Armed Services Committee, Intelligence Committee and Defense Appropriations Subcommittee, found " widespread dissatisfaction " among Central Command intelligence analysts, who said superiors were doctoring their assessments of American efforts to defeat the Islamic State.

The interim report, from a task commission established by the Republican chairmen of the House Armed Services Committee, Intelligence Committee and Defense Appropriations Subcommittee, found " widespread dissatisfaction " among Central Command intelligence analysts, who said superiors were doctoring their assessments of American efforts to defeat the Islamic State.
由众议院武装服务委员会、情报委员会和国防拨款小组委员会共和党主席组成的一个特别委员会的中期报告发现,中央指挥部情报分析师“普遍不满”,他们表示,上级正在修改他们对美国击败伊斯兰国的努力的评估。
The interim report, from a task panel established by the Republican chairmen of the House Armed Services Committee, Intelligence Committee and Defense Appropriations Subcommittee, found " widespread dissatisfaction " among Central Command intelligence analysts, who said superiors were doctoring their assessments of American efforts to defeat the Islamic State.
这份由众议院武装服务委员会、情报委员会和国防拨款小组委员会共和党主席组成的工作组的中期报告发现,中央司令部情报分析师“普遍不满”,他们表示,上级正在修改他们对美国击败伊斯兰国的努力的评估。
Central Command, known as Centcom, is the military headquarters in Tampa, Fla., that oversees American military operations across the Middle East and Central Asia.
中央指挥部(Centcom)是位于佛罗里达州坦帕的军事总部,负责监管美国在中东和中亚的军事行动。
Central Command, known as Centcom, is the military headquarters in Tampa, Fla., that coordinates American military operations across the Middle East and Central Asia.
中央司令部(Centcom)是位于佛罗里达州坦帕的军事总部,负责协调美国在中东和中亚的军事行动。
Central Command, known as Centcom, is the military headquarters in Tampa, Fla., that directs American military operations across the Middle East and Central Asia.
中央司令部(Centcom)是位于佛罗里达州坦帕的军事总部,负责指挥美国在中东和中亚的军事行动。
Central Command, known as Centcom, is the military headquarters in Tampa, Fla., that manages American military operations across the Middle East and Central Asia.
中央指挥部(Centcom)是位于佛罗里达州坦帕的军事总部,负责管理美国在中东和中亚的军事行动。
Central Command, known as Centcom, is the military headquarters in Tampa, Fla., that commands American military operations across the Middle East and Central Asia.
中央司令部(Centcom)是位于佛罗里达州坦帕的军事总部,负责指挥美国在中东和中亚的军事行动。
" What happened at Centcom is unacceptable-our war fighters suffer when bad analysis is presented to senior policy makers, " said Representative Ken Calvert, Republican of California.
加利福尼亚州共和党议员肯·卡尔弗特说:“Centcom发生的事情让人无法接受,因为当向高级决策者提供糟糕的分析时,我们的作战人员会遭受损失。”
" What happened at Centcom is unacceptable-our war fighter suffer when bad analysis is presented to senior policy makers, " said Representative Ken Calvert, Republican of California.

" What happened at Centcom is unacceptable-our war soldiers suffer when bad analysis is presented to senior policy makers, " said Representative Ken Calvert, Republican of California.

The 10-page report detailed persistent problems in 2014 and 2015 in Central Command's description and analysis of American efforts to train Iraqi forces.
这份10页的报告详细介绍了2014年和2015年美国训练伊拉克部队的努力在中央指挥部的描述和分析中持续存在的问题。
The 10-page report detailed persistent difficulties in 2014 and 2015 in Central Command's description and analysis of American efforts to train Iraqi forces.
这份10页的报告详细说明了2014年和2015年美国训练伊拉克部队的努力在中央指挥部的描述和分析方面持续存在的困难。
The 10-page report detailed persistent issues in 2014 and 2015 in Central Command's description and analysis of American efforts to train Iraqi forces.

The 10-page report detailed persistent flaws in 2014 and 2015 in Central Command's description and analysis of American efforts to train Iraqi forces.

The 10-page report detailed persistent problem in 2014 and 2015 in Central Command's description and analysis of American efforts to train Iraqi forces.

Although it offers no definitive evidence that senior Obama administration officials ordered the reports to be doctored, it describes analysts as feeling as though they were under pressure from Centcom leaders to present a more optimistic view of the threat posed by the Islamic State, also known as ISIS or ISIL.
虽然它没有提供奥巴马政府高级官员下令修改报告的确切证据,但它描述分析师们似乎受到Centcom领导人的压力,对伊斯兰国(也称为ISIS或伊黎伊斯兰国)构成的威胁表示更加乐观的看法。

众议院情报委员会(House Intelligence Committee)的民主党成员周四公布了他们自己的调查结果,支持了共和党专责小组的一些结论。
" Between 2014 and 2015, Centcom created an overly insular process for producing intelligence assessments on ISIL and Iraqi Security Forces, " Representative Adam B. Schiff, the committee's top Democrat, said in a statement.
委员会首席民主党议员亚当·施吉夫在一份声明中说,在2014年至2015年期间,Centcom为对伊黎伊斯兰国和伊拉克安全部队进行情报评估创造了一个过于孤立的进程。
" Between 2014 and 2015, Centcom established an overly insular process for producing intelligence assessments on ISIL and Iraqi Security Forces, " Representative Adam B. Schiff, the committee's top Democrat, said in a statement.
委员会的首席民主党议员亚当·希夫在一份声明中说,在2014年至2015年期间,Centcom建立了一个对伊黎伊斯兰国和伊拉克安全部队进行情报评估的过度孤立的程序。
" Between 2014 and 2015, Centcom forged an overly insular process for producing intelligence assessments on ISIL and Iraqi Security Forces, " Representative Adam B. Schiff, the committee's top Democrat, said in a statement.
委员会首席民主党议员亚当·施吉夫在一份声明中说,在2014年至2015年期间,Centcom为对伊黎伊斯兰国和伊拉克安全部队进行情报评估制定了一个过于孤立的程序。
" Between 2014 and 2015, Centcom eliminated an overly insular process for producing intelligence assessments on ISIL and Iraqi Security Forces, " Representative Adam B. Schiff, the committee's top Democrat, said in a statement.
在2014年至2015年期间,Centcom消除了对伊黎伊斯兰国和伊拉克安全部队进行情报评估的过于孤立的进程。
" Between 2014 and 2015, Centcom dismantled an overly insular process for producing intelligence assessments on ISIL and Iraqi Security Forces, " Representative Adam B. Schiff, the committee's top Democrat, said in a statement.
委员会首席民主党议员亚当·希夫在一份声明中说,在2014年至2015年期间,Centcom拆除了对伊黎伊斯兰国和伊拉克安全部队进行情报评估的过于孤立的程序。
" Between 2014 and 2015, Centcom used an overly insular process for producing intelligence assessments on ISIL and Iraqi Security Forces, " Representative Adam B. Schiff, the committee's top Democrat, said in a statement.
在2014年至2015年期间,Centcom使用了一个过于孤立的程序来对伊黎伊斯兰国和伊拉克安全部队进行情报评估。
This process, Mr. Schiff said, " stalled the release of intelligence products, " hurt morale among analysts and " insufficiently accommodated dissenting views. "
施夫说,这一过程“阻碍了情报产品的发放,伤害了分析师的士气,也未能充分包容异议。”
This process, Mr. Schiff said, " stalled the release of intelligence products, " affected morale among analysts and " insufficiently accommodated dissenting views. "
施夫说,这一过程“阻碍了情报产品的发放,影响了分析师的士气,也未能充分包容异议。”
This process, Mr. Schiff said, " stalled the release of intelligence products, " damaged morale among analysts and " insufficiently accommodated dissenting views. "
施夫说,这一过程“阻碍了情报产品的发放,破坏了分析师的士气,也未能充分包容异议。”
This process, Mr. Schiff said, " stalled the release of intelligence products, " cut morale among analysts and " insufficiently accommodated dissenting views. "
施夫说,这一过程“阻止了情报产品的发布,降低了分析师的士气,也未能充分包容异议。”
This process, Mr. Schiff said, " stalled the release of intelligence products, " injured morale among analysts and " insufficiently accommodated dissenting views. "
施密夫说,这一过程“使情报产品停止了发放,破坏了分析师的士气,也未能充分包容异议。”
This process, Mr. Schiff said, " stalled the release of intelligence products, " weakened morale among analysts and " insufficiently accommodated dissenting views. "
施夫说,这一过程“阻止了情报产品的发布,削弱了分析师的士气,也未能充分包容异议。”
But Mr. Schiff and the Democrats said they found no evidence that the White House tried to pressure Centcom analysts to fit their conclusions to a " preset or political narrative. "
但是希夫和民主党人说,他们没有发现任何证据表明白宫试图强迫Centcom分析师将他们的结论与“预设的”或“政治叙事”相适应。
But Mr. Schiff and the Democrats concluded they found no evidence that the White House tried to pressure Centcom analysts to fit their conclusions to a " preset or political narrative. "
但是希夫和民主党人最后说,他们没有发现任何证据表明白宫试图强迫Centcom分析师将其结论与“预设的”或“政治叙事”相符合。
But Mr. Schiff and the Democrats said they found no evidence that the White House tried to influence Centcom analysts to fit their conclusions to a " preset or political narrative. "
但是希夫和民主党说,他们没有发现任何证据表明白宫试图对Centcom分析师施加影响以使其结论符合“预先设定的”或“政治叙事”。
But Mr. Schiff and the Democrats said they found no evidence that the White House tried to force Centcom analysts to fit their conclusions to a " preset or political narrative. "
但是希夫和民主党说,他们没有发现任何证据表明白宫试图强迫Centcom分析师将他们的结论与“预设的”或“政治叙事”相适应。
But Mr. Schiff and the Democrats said they found no evidence that the Inside House tried to pressure Centcom analysts to fit their conclusions to a " preset or political narrative. "
但是希夫和民主党人说,他们没有发现任何证据表明内幕大厦试图强迫Centcom分析师将他们的结论与“预设的”或“政治叙事”相适应。
But Mr. Schiff and the Democrats said they found no evidence that the Department House tried to pressure Centcom analysts to fit their conclusions to a " preset or political narrative. "
但是希夫和民主党人说,他们没有发现任何证据表明百事公司试图强迫Centcom分析师将他们的结论与“预设的”或“政治叙事”相符合。

The critiques on the Islamic State intelligence mirror disputes of more than a decade ago, when a Centcom intelligence analyst, Gregory Hooker, wrote a research paper saying that the administration of President George W. Bush, over many analysts " objections, advocated a small force in Iraq and spent little time thinking about what would follow the 2003 invasion.
对伊斯兰国家情报的批评反映了十多年前的争议,当时,Centcom的情报分析师格雷戈里·胡克写了一份研究论文,称乔治·W·布什的内阁对许多分析师"持反对意见",主张在伊拉克派驻一支小型部队,几乎没有花时间思考2003年入侵之后将发生什么。

Bush, over many analysts " objections, advocated a small force in Iraq and spent little time thinking about what would follow the 2003 invasion.
对伊斯兰国家情报的批评反映了十多年前的争议,当时,Centcom的情报分析师Gregory Hooker写了一份研究论文,指出乔治·W·布什总统的行政当局对许多分析师"持反对意见",主张在伊拉克派驻一支小型部队,很少考虑2003年入侵之后将发生什么。

Bush, over many analysts " objections, advocated a small force in Iraq and spent little time thinking about what would follow the 2003 invasion.

Last year, officials said, Mr. Hooker's team concluded that despite public statements to the contrary, airstrikes against Islamic State-held refineries had not significantly weakened the terrorist group's finances because it had built makeshift refineries to sell oil on the black market.
官员说,胡克的团队在去年得出的结论是,尽管公开声明相反,对伊斯兰国家控制的炼油厂的空袭并未显著削弱恐怖组织的财务状况,因为该组织建造了临时炼油厂,在黑市上销售石油。
Last year, officials said, Dr. Hooker's team concluded that despite public statements to the contrary, airstrikes against Islamic State-held refineries had not significantly weakened the terrorist group's finances because it had built makeshift refineries to sell oil on the black market.
官员说,胡克博士的团队在去年得出的结论是,尽管公开声明相反,对伊斯兰国家控制的炼油厂的空袭并未显著削弱恐怖组织的财务状况,因为该组织已经建造了临时炼油厂,在黑市上销售石油。
Last year, officials said, I. Hooker's team concluded that despite public statements to the contrary, airstrikes against Islamic State-held refineries had not significantly weakened the terrorist group's finances because it had built makeshift refineries to sell oil on the black market.
去年,官员们说,胡克的团队最后说,尽管公开声明相反,对伊斯兰国控制的炼油厂的空袭并没有显著削弱恐怖组织的资金,因为该组织建造了临时炼油厂,在黑市上销售石油。
Last year, officials said, the. Hooker's team concluded that despite public statements to the contrary, airstrikes against Islamic State-held refineries had not significantly weakened the terrorist group's finances because it had built makeshift refineries to sell oil on the black market.
去年,官员们说胡克的团队得出的结论是,尽管公开声明相反,对伊斯兰国家控制的炼油厂的空袭并未显著削弱恐怖组织的财务状况,因为该组织已经建造了临时炼油厂,在黑市上销售石油。

Equally fraught was the new budget diet : Mystery dishes like loaves and casseroles became staples, the casserole a " wonderful way to repurpose leftovers, " Ms. Ziegelman noted, because cooks could hide unappetizing ingredients under a creamy coating of sauce.
同样令人烦恼的是新的节食计划:像面包和砂锅这样的神秘菜肴成了主食,砂锅是一种“修复剩菜的绝妙方法”,齐格尔曼女士说,因为厨师可以把不讨人喜欢的成分藏在酱油的奶油涂层中。

星期一,欧佩克主席和卡塔尔能源部长萨达说,欧佩克将在9月26日至28日国际能源论坛期间举行一次非正式会议。
On Monday, OPEC Chairman and Qatar Energy Minister Sada said OPEC will hold an informal meeting during the Global Energy Forum on September 26-28.
星期一,欧佩克主席和卡塔尔能源部长萨达说,欧佩克将在9月26日至28日全球能源论坛期间举行一次非正式会议。
The monthly report of OPEC on Wednesday showed that the output of the entire OPEC organization in July, including Gabon, increased by 46, 000 barrels / day to 33. 11 million barrels / day.
欧佩克周三的月度报告显示,包括加蓬在内的整个欧佩克组织7月份的产量日增加46 000桶,达到331 100万桶/日。
The monthly report of OPEC on Wednesday showed that the output of the entire OPEC organization in July, excluding Gabon, increased by 46, 000 barrels / day to 33. 11 million barrels / day.
欧佩克周三的月度报告显示,除加蓬外,整个欧佩克组织7月份的日产量增加了46 000桶/日,达到331 100万桶/日。
The monthly report of OPEC on Wednesday showed that the output of the entire OPEC organization in July, including Benin, increased by 46, 000 barrels / day to 33. 11 million barrels / day.
欧佩克周三的月度报告显示,包括贝宁在内的欧佩克整个组织7月份的产量日增加46 000桶,达到331 100万桶/日。
The monthly report of OPEC on Wednesday showed that the output of the entire OPEC organization in July, including Cameroon, increased by 46, 000 barrels / day to 33. 11 million barrels / day.
欧佩克周三的月度报告显示,包括喀麦隆在内的欧佩克整个组织7月份的日产量增加了46 000桶/日,达到331 100万桶/日。

欧佩克周三的月度报告显示,包括安哥拉在内的欧佩克整个组织7月份的产量日增加46 000桶,达到331 100万桶/日。
The monthly report of OPEC on Wednesday showed that the output of the entire OPEC organization in July, including Chad, increased by 46, 000 barrels / day to 33. 11 million barrels / day.
欧佩克周三的月度报告显示,包括乍得在内的整个欧佩克组织7月份的产量日增加46 000桶,达到331 100万桶/日。
OPEC also said in a monthly report that low crude oil prices have prompted global refiners to produce more refined oil, thus increasing the degree of excess supply to the market.
欧佩克还在一份月度报告中表示,原油价格的低迷促使全球炼油商生产更精炼的石油,从而提高了对市场的过度供应。
OPEC also said in a monthly report that low crude oil prices have prompted global refiners to produce more refined oil, thus increasing the level of excess supply to the market.

OPEC also said in a monthly report that low crude oil prices have prompted global refiners to produce more refined oil, thus increasing the share of excess supply to the market.

OPEC has said in a monthly report that low crude oil prices have prompted global refiners to produce more refined oil, thus increasing the degree of excess supply to the market.

Affected by this news, coupled with the production output expectations of rising crude oil and the unexpected increase in crude oil inventories, aggravating the excessive market supply.
受这一消息的影响,加上原油产量增长的预期和原油库存的意外增加,加剧了过度的市场供应。

As of Wednesday's close, the light crude oil futures of New York Mercantile Exchange fell by 2. 48 % in September and the future price of crude oil in October in London Brent fell by 2. 07 %.
截至周三收盘,纽约商交所原油期货9月份下跌2.48%,伦敦布伦特原油期货10月份下跌2.07%。

All localities should take medical institutions which have illegal medical advertising, complaints focusing on the past and have repeatedly been punished as a focus of inspection.
各地医疗单位如有非法的医疗广告,举报重点应放在过去,并屡次受到处罚,作为检查重点。
All localities should take medical institutions which have illegal medical associations, complaints focusing on the past and have repeatedly been punished as a focus of inspection.
各地应当将有非法医疗协会的医疗机构、以过去为重点的投诉和一再受到处罚的医疗机构作为检查的焦点。
All localities should take medical institutions which have illegal medical the, complaints focusing on the past and have repeatedly been punished as a focus of inspection.
各地对有违法医疗行为的医疗机构,应当重点处理过去的申诉,并一再作为检查重点予以处罚。
All localities should take medical institutions which have illegal medical advertising, complaints focusing on the past and have continuously been punished as a focus of inspection.

All localities should take medical institutions which have illegal medical advertising, complaints focusing on the past and have already been punished as a focus of inspection.
各地医疗单位如有非法的医疗广告,举报重点应放在过去,并已经作为检查重点受到处罚。
All localities should take medical institutions which have illegal medical advertising, complaints focusing on the past and have recently been punished as a focus of inspection.
各地应当将非法的医疗广告、针对过去的投诉、近期受到处罚的医疗机构作为检查重点。

According to media disclosure, the large influx of capital into the Internet medicine has resulted in the serious problem of current product homogeneity. Investment boom fade gradually and capital came in the wait-and-see period.
根据媒体的披露,大量资金流入互联网医学已导致当前产品均匀性的严重问题,投资热潮逐渐减弱,资金出现在等待期。
According to the data of Hong Kong Ai Li Pi Hospital Management Research Center, a large number of start-up Internet medical companies languished just within one year and about 20 % of the start-up Internet medical companies has ceased to exist.
根据香港爱丽皮医院管理研究中心的资料,许多刚起步的互联网医疗公司仅在一年之内就倒闭,约有20%的互联网医疗公司不复存在。
According to the data of Hong Kong Ai Li Pi Hospital Management Research Center, a large number of start-up Internet medical companies languished just within one year and about 30 % of the start-up Internet medical companies has ceased to exist.

According to the data of Hong Kong Ai Li Pi Hospital Management Research Center, a large number of start-up Internet medical companies languished just within one year and about 25 % of the start-up Internet medical companies has ceased to exist.
根据香港爱丽皮医院管理研究中心的资料,许多刚起步的互联网医疗公司仅在一年之内就倒闭,约有25%的互联网医疗公司不复存在。
According to the data of Hong Kong Ai Li Pi Hospital Management Research Center, a large number of start-up Internet medical companies languished just within one year and about 15 % of the start-up Internet medical companies has ceased to exist.
根据香港爱丽皮医院管理研究中心的资料,许多刚起步的互联网医疗公司仅在一年之内就倒闭,约有15%的互联网医疗公司不复存在。
According to the data of Hong Kong Ai Li Pi Hospital Management Research Center, a large number of start-up Internet medical companies languished just within one year and about 10 % of the start-up Internet medical companies has ceased to exist.
根据香港爱丽皮医院管理研究中心的资料,许多刚起步的互联网医疗公司仅在一年之内就倒闭了,约有10%的互联网医疗公司不复存在。
According to the data of Hong Kong Ai Li Pi Hospital Management Research Center, a large number of start-up Internet medical companies languished just within one year and about 50 % of the start-up Internet medical companies has ceased to exist.
根据香港爱丽皮医院管理研究中心的资料,许多刚起步的互联网医疗公司仅在一年之内就倒闭,约有50%的互联网医疗公司不复存在。
However, just as the majority of Internet medical companies struggle in the road of A round or B round of financing, several sub-areas leading enterprises can still get the capital touted.
然而,正值大多数互联网医疗公司在A轮或B轮融资中挣扎之时,一些子领域领先的企业仍能得到人们的称赞。
However, just as the majority of Internet medical companies struggle in the road of A round or B round of financing, many sub-areas leading enterprises can still get the capital touted.
然而,正值大多数互联网医疗公司在A轮或B轮融资中挣扎之时,许多子领域领先的企业仍能得到人们的称赞。

However, just as the majority of Internet medical companies struggle in the road of A round or B round of financing, few sub-areas leading enterprises can still get the capital touted.
然而,正值大多数互联网医疗公司在A轮或B轮融资中挣扎之时,很少有地区领先的企业能够获得资金。
However, just as the majority of Internet medical companies struggle in the road of A round or B round of financing, several sub-areas leading enterprises can still obtain the capital touted.
然而,正如大多数互联网医疗公司在A轮或B轮融资中挣扎一样,一些次级地区的主要企业仍可以获得人们所吹嘘的资本。
However, just as the majority of Internet medical companies struggle in the road of A round or B round of financing, several sub-areas leading enterprises can still find the capital touted.

However, just as the majority of Internet medical companies struggle in the road of A round or B round of financing, several sub-areas leading enterprises can still have the capital touted.

It seems that the Internet medical business shall not " swarm ", but to see the needs of the market, and be professional and profound.
互联网医学业务似乎不是“群”而是“群”看市场的需要,是专业的、深入的。
It seems that the Internet medical business shall not " swarm ", but to know the needs of the market, and be professional and profound.
互联网医学业务似乎不应“群”化,而应了解市场需求,具有专业性和深度。
It seems that the Internet medical business shall not " swarm ", but to understand the needs of the market, and be professional and profound.
互联网医学业务似乎不应“群”化,而应了解市场需求,具有专业性和深度。
It seems that the Internet medical business shall not " swarm ", but to identify the needs of the market, and be professional and profound.
互联网医学业务似乎不应“群”化,而应识别市场需求,具有专业性和深度。
It seems that the Internet medical business shall not " swarm ", but to recognize the needs of the market, and be professional and profound.

互联网医学业务似乎不应“群”化,而应服务于市场需求,具有专业性和深度。

阿里在医疗卫生领域的布局分为阿里健康、林克斯药房和阿利帕未来医院三层。
Wang Lei admitted that it was more difficult for medical and health companies to start up than other industries, " This is not just how much money you have. In addition, it requires people to be concentrated on it and endure the loneliness.
王雷承认,相比其他行业,医药和医疗公司更难创办,“这不只是你有多少钱,而且还需要人们专心致志,忍受孤独。”

In this regard, the doctor reminded that staying up late has health risks and may lead to cardiovascular disease.
在这方面,医生提醒说,熬夜有健康风险,并可能导致心血管疾病。

在这方面,医生提醒说,熬夜有健康风险,并可能导致心血管疾病。
In this regard, the doctor reminded that staying up late has medical risks and may lead to cardiovascular disease.
在这方面,医生提醒说,熬夜有医疗风险,并可能导致心血管疾病。
If you stay up for a long time, the hormone will have a lot of secretion and your body will continue to be in a state of intense excitement and cannot have normal recovery. This may easily cause vasoconstriction, blood pressure and thus cardiovascular disease.
如果你长时间熬夜,激素会有很多分泌物,你的身体会继续处于极度兴奋的状态,无法正常恢复,这很容易导致血管收缩、血压,从而引起心血管疾病。
If you stay up for a long time, the hormone will have a lot of secretion and your body will continue to be in a state of intense excitement and can have normal recovery. This may easily cause vasoconstriction, blood pressure and thus cardiovascular disease.
如果你长时间熬夜,激素会有很多分泌物,你的身体会继续处于极度兴奋的状态,并有正常的恢复,这很容易导致血管收缩,血压,从而引起心血管疾病。
If you stay up for a long time, the hormone will have a lot of secretion and your body will continue to be in a state of intense excitement and not have normal recovery. This may easily cause vasoconstriction, blood pressure and thus cardiovascular disease.
如果你长时间熬夜,激素会有很多分泌物,你的身体会继续处于极度兴奋的状态,不会恢复正常,很容易导致血管收缩、血压等心血管疾病。

如果你长时间熬夜,激素会有很多分泌物,你的身体会继续处于剧烈的刺激状态,无法正常恢复,这很容易导致血管收缩、血压,从而引起心血管疾病。
If you stay up for a long time, the hormone will have a lot of secretion and your body will continue to be in a state of intense anticipation and cannot have normal recovery. This may easily cause vasoconstriction, blood pressure and thus cardiovascular disease.
如果你长时间熬夜,激素会有很多分泌物,你的身体会继续处于一种强烈的预期状态,无法正常恢复,这很容易导致血管收缩、血压和心血管疾病。
If you stay up for a long time, the hormone will have a lot of secretion and your body will continue to be in a state of intense anxiety and cannot have normal recovery. This may easily cause vasoconstriction, blood pressure and thus cardiovascular disease.

Han Zhiyuan reminded people who have high blood pressure, high blood sugar, high blood lipids, smoking habits, family history and other cardiovascular risk factors may easily suffer from cardiovascular disease if staying up late.
韩志远提醒那些有高血压、高血糖、高血脂、吸烟习惯、家庭历史和其他心血管危险因素的人,如果熬夜就很容易患心血管疾病。

In June, 2003, she participated in the women's 10-m air rifle of World Cup Croatia station and broke the world record with 504. 9 arc.
2003年6月,她参加了克罗地亚世界杯站女子10米气步枪比赛,以504.9弧打破了世界纪录。
In June, 2003, she participated in the women's 10-m air rifle of World Cup Croatia station and broke the world record with 504. 9 bars.
2003年6月,她参加了克罗地亚世界杯站女子10米气步枪的比赛,并打破了世界纪录,拥有504.9个酒吧。
In August, 2004, she won the women's 10-m air rifle gold medal and thus won the first gold for the Chinese team in the Athens Olympic Games.
2004年8月,她赢得了女子气步枪10米金牌,从而为雅典奥运会中国队赢得了第一枚金牌。
In August, 2004, she won the women's 10-m air rifle gold medal and thus won the first gold for the Chinese team at the Athens Olympic Games.

In August, 2004, she won the women's 10-m air rifle gold medal and thus an the first gold for the Chinese team in the Athens Olympic Games.

In August, 2004, she won the women's 10-m air rifle gold medal and thus the the first gold for the Chinese team in the Athens Olympic Games.
2004年8月,她赢得了女子气步枪10米金牌,因而是中国队在雅典奥运会上的第一块金牌。
In August, 2012, after serious failing in the London Olympic Games, Du Li announced the application for a temporary retirement to the International Stainless Steel Forum ( ISSF ).
2012年8月, 在伦敦奥运会严重失败后, 杜力宣布暂时退出国际不锈钢论坛 ( ISSAF ).

2016年8月12日,她赢得了里约热内卢奥运会女子50米气步枪的铜牌。

Later, he summarized the information provided by the US Air Force Air Meteorological Service and submitted a detailed report.
随后,他总结了美国空军气象局提供的信息,并提交了一份详细的报告。

The direct consequence of this solar storm is that the US military has seen space weather as a combat concern and has built a stronger space weather forecast system.
这场太阳风暴的直接后果是,美国军方将空间气象视为一个战斗问题,并建立了更强大的空间天气预报系统。

During daily travel, when citizens found that their cars were hampered by a strange vehicle, they may use " WeChat vehicle moving " function to solve this problem when they failed to contact with the strange vehicle driver.
在每天旅行中,当公民发现他们的车辆受到一辆奇怪的车辆的阻碍时,他们可能使用"WeChat车辆移动"功能来解决这个问题,因为他们无法与奇怪的车辆司机接触。
During daily travel, when citizens found that their cars were hampered by a strange vehicle, they may use " WeChat vehicle moving " function to solve this problem if they failed to contact with the strange vehicle driver.
在每天旅行中,当公民发现他们的车辆受到一辆奇怪的车辆的阻碍时,如果他们未能与奇怪的车辆司机接触,他们可以利用"WeChat车辆移动"功能来解决这个问题。

During daily travel, when citizens found that their cars were hampered by a strange vehicle, they may use " WeChat vehicle moving " function to solve this problem when they happened to contact with the strange vehicle driver.
在每天旅行中,当公民发现他们的汽车受到一辆奇怪的车辆的阻碍时,他们可能使用"WeChat车辆移动"功能来解决这个问题,当他们碰巧碰到了这位奇怪的车辆司机。
From August 11, Xi'an traffic police WeChat service number " Xi'an traffic police " launched " WeChat vehicle moving " service.
从8月11日开始, 西安交通警察 韦查特 服务电话 “ 西安交通警察 ” 启动 了 “ 威查特汽车移动服务 ”.
From August 11, Xi'an traffic police WeChat service number " Xi'An traffic police " launched " WeChat vehicle moving " service.
从8月11日开始, 西安交通警察的“西安交通警 ” 号启动“ 西安车行驶 ” 服务.
After the launching of this service, during daily life, when the citizens found their cars were hampered by unfamiliar vehicles, the driver of which is not at the scene, they may solve the problems via " WeChat " function.
在这项服务启动后,在日常生活中,当公民发现他们的车辆因不熟悉的车辆而受阻时,司机不在现场,他们可以通过"WeChat"功能解决问题。

After the launching of this service, during daily life, when the citizens found their cars were slowed by unfamiliar vehicles, the driver of which is not at the scene, they may solve the problems via " WeChat " function.
在这项服务启动后,在日常生活中,当公民发现他们的汽车因不熟悉的车辆而放慢时,司机不在现场,他们可以通过“WeChat”功能解决这些问题。
Citizens can operate it quite conveniently with their WeChat. Such method enables the both sides to meet in a friendly and easy way and alleviates and solves the problem of difficulty of parking and reduces the occurrence rate of car-related public security cases.
公民可以通过他们的WeChat非常方便地使用该方法,使双方能够轻松友好地举行会议,缓解和解决停车困难问题,降低与汽车有关的公共安全案件的发生率。

This is the fifth time that China's civilian think tank has published the Japanese military assessment report and the fourth debut of the English version.
这是中国民间智囊团第五次发表日本军事评估报告和英文版首映。
The report is divided into nine chapters, including the overall policy adjustment, military strength, defense budget, military deployment, weapons and equipment, military system reform, military training, foreign military security cooperation and military security relations with China and so on.
全文分为政策调整、军力、国防预算、军事部署、武器装备、军事体制改革、军事训练、对外军事安全合作、与中国的军事安全关系等九章。
The report is divided into seven chapters, including the overall policy adjustment, military strength, defense budget, military deployment, weapons and equipment, military system reform, military training, foreign military security cooperation and military security relations with China and so on.
全文分为政策调整、军力、国防预算、军事部署、武器装备、军事体制改革、军事训练、对外军事安全合作、与中国的军事安全关系等七章。
The report is divided into eight chapters, including the overall policy adjustment, military strength, defense budget, military deployment, weapons and equipment, military system reform, military training, foreign military security cooperation and military security relations with China and so on.
报告共分八章,包括总体政策调整、军力、国防预算、军事部署、武器装备、军事系统改革、军事训练、对外军事安全合作、与中国的军事安全关系等。
The report said that the year 2015 is a phased last year of the Abe government to promote major policy adjustments in the security area.
报告称,2015年是安倍政府去年推动安全领域重大政策调整的阶段性一年。

The report said that the year 2015 is a phased last year of the Abe government to promote major policy reforms in the security area.
报告称,2015年是安倍政府去年推动安全领域重大政策改革的阶段性一年。
Since then, Japan's initiatives in the field of security will be mainly in the legal system, strategy implementation, policy implementation and other operational level, rather than the substantial adjustments and changes of framework, mechanisms and policies.
自那以后,日本在安全领域的举措将主要在法律制度、战略执行、政策执行和其他业务一级,而不是框架、机制和政策的重大调整和改变。
Since then, Japan's initiatives in the field of security will be mainly in the legal system, strategy implementation, policy implementation and other operational level, rather than the substantial adjustments and changes of framework, structures and policies.
自那以后,日本在安全领域的举措将主要在法律制度、战略执行、政策执行和其他业务一级,而不是框架、结构和政策的重大调整和改变。
Since then, Japan's initiatives in the field of security will be mainly in the legal system, strategy implementation, policy implementation and other operational level, rather than the substantial adjustments and changes of framework, processes and policies.

Since then, Japan's initiatives in the field of security will be mainly in the legal system, strategy implementation, policy implementation and other operational level, rather than the substantial adjustments and changes of framework, procedures and policies.
