Since then, Japan's initiatives in the field of security will be mainly in the legal system, strategy implementation, policy implementation and other operational level, rather than the substantial adjustments and changes of framework, institutions and policies.

Since then, Japan's initiatives in the field of security will be mainly in the legal system, strategy implementation, policy implementation and other operational level, rather than the substantial adjustments and changes of framework, systems and policies.

The report emphasized that the Abe Cabinet tried to break through the above three points to achieve the promotion of Japan's " normal nationalization ", and the going-out of militia to intervene in international security affairs, strengthen Japan-US alliance and prevent the rise of China and resist China.

改善公共体育设施
Improvement of general sports facilities
改善一般体育设施
Improvement of municipal sports facilities
改善市政体育设施
to of public sports facilities
公共体育设施
of of public sports facilities
公共体育设施
the of public sports facilities
公共体育设施
Dark coal field warehouse is turned into a " green grass " football field while red brick spire plant is turned into a modern sports museum.
黑暗的煤田仓库变成了一个“绿草”的足球场,而红砖尖顶植物则变成了一个现代体育博物馆。
Dark coal field warehouse is turned into a " green grass " football field while red brick spire plant is turned into a modern sport museum.

According to reports, as of 2015, the area of China's per capita sports venues has been 150 times of that when the new China was established, but still far behind the sports power.
据悉,截至2015年,中国人均体育场馆面积已是新中国成立时的150倍,但仍远远落后于体育实力。
According to reports, as of 2015, the area of China's per capita sports venues has been 130 times of that when the new China was established, but still far behind the sports power.

Gilead to get attorney fees in hepatitis C patent fight with Merck
Gilead与默克公司竞争丙型肝炎专利获得律师费
Gilead to win attorney fees in hepatitis C patent fight with Merck
在丙型肝炎专利对抗中,Gilead赢得律师费
Gilead to secure attorney fees in hepatitis C patent fight with Merck
Gilead与默克公司在丙型肝炎专利纠纷中收取律师费
Gilead to gain attorney fees in hepatitis C patent fight with Merck
Gilead与默克公司竞争丙型肝炎专利获得律师费
Gilead to buy attorney fees in hepatitis C patent fight with Merck
基列与默克公司购买丙型肝炎专利诉讼的律师费
Gilead to pay attorney fees in hepatitis C patent fight with Merck
基列与默克公司支付丙型肝炎专利诉讼的律师费
Gilead Sciences Inc is entitled to receive the attorney fees it incurred related to hepatitis C patent litigation with drugmaker Merck & Co Inc, a U. S. district judge has ruled.
Gilead Sciences Inc有权收取与丙型肝炎专利诉讼有关的律师费,美国地区法官已经对制药商Merck & Co Inc作出裁决。
Gilead Sciences Inc is liable to receive the attorney fees it incurred related to hepatitis C patent litigation with drugmaker Merck & Co Inc, a U. S. district judge has ruled.
基列科学公司(Gilead Sciences Inc)有责任收取与丙型肝炎专利诉讼有关的律师费。
Gilead Sciences Inc is entitled to receive the attorney fees it accumulated related to hepatitis C patent litigation with drugmaker Merck & Co Inc, a U. S. district judge has ruled.
Gilead Sciences Inc有权收取它与C型肝炎专利诉讼相关的律师费,美国地区法官已经裁决,制药商Merck & Co Inc。
Gilead Sciences Inc is entitled to receive the attorney fees it received related to hepatitis C patent litigation with drugmaker Merck & Co Inc, a U. S. district judge has ruled.
Gilead Sciences Inc有权得到它收到的与丙型肝炎专利诉讼有关的律师费,该公司是美国地区法官裁决的制药商Merck & Co Inc。
Gilead Sciences Inc is entitled to receive the attorney fees it contracted related to hepatitis C patent litigation with drugmaker Merck & Co Inc, a U. S. district judge has ruled.
Gilead Sciences Inc有资格获得与C型肝炎专利诉讼有关的律师费。
Gilead Sciences Inc is entitled to receive the attorney fees it paid related to hepatitis C patent litigation with drugmaker Merck & Co Inc, a U. S. district judge has ruled.
Gilead Sciences Inc有权得到它支付的与丙型肝炎专利诉讼有关的律师费,美国地区法官已经对制药商Merck & Co Inc作出裁决。
In a filing on Thursday, U. S. District Judge Beth Labson Freeman said that Gilead was entitled to relief from the fees it incurred while defending the case.
周四,美国地方法官贝思·拉夫森·弗里曼(Beth Labson Freeman)提交案卷时表示,基莱德有权免除在为案件辩护时支付的费用。
In a filing on Thursday, U. S. District Judge Beth Labson Freeman said that Gilead was entitled to relief from the fees it accumulated while defending the case.
周四,美国地方法官贝思·拉夫森·弗里曼(Beth Labson Freeman)提交案卷时表示,基列有权免除在为案件辩护时积累的费用。
In a filing on Thursday, U. S. District Judge Beth Labson Freeman said that Gilead was entitled to relief from the fees it earned while defending the case.
周四,美国地方法官贝思·拉夫森·弗里曼(Beth Labson Freeman)提交案卷时表示,基列有权免除在为案件辩护时所赚的费用。
In a filing on Thursday, U. S. District Judge Beth Labson Freeman said that Gilead was entitled to relief from the fees it charged while defending the case.
周四,美国地方法官贝思·拉夫森·弗里曼(Beth Labson Freeman)提交案卷时表示,在为案件辩护时,基莱德有权免除所收取的费用。
Merck is trying to catch up to Gilead, which dominates the market on a new generation of hepatitis C drugs that can cure well over 90 percent of patients with the liver disease.
默克正试图赶上基列,基列在新一代丙型肝炎药物上占据主导地位,可治愈90%以上的肝病病人。
Merck is trying to catch up to Gilead, which dominates the market on a new generation of hepatitis C drugs that can cure well over 70 percent of patients with the liver disease.
默克正试图赶上基列,基列在新一代丙型肝炎药物上占据主导地位,可治愈70%以上的肝病病人。
Merck is trying to catch up to Gilead, which dominates the market on a new generation of hepatitis C drugs that can cure well over 100 percent of patients with the liver disease.
默克正试图赶上基列,基列在新一代丙型肝炎药物上占据了市场主导地位,可治愈超过100%的肝病病人。
Merck is trying to catch up to Gilead, which dominates the market on a new generation of hepatitis C drugs that can cure well over 99 percent of patients with the liver disease.
默克正试图赶上基列,基列在新一代丙型肝炎药物上占据主导地位,可治愈99%以上的肝病病人。
The case dates back to 2013 when Gilead and Merck sued each other, claiming ownership of laboratory work underlying sofosbuvir, the active ingredient in Gilead's drugs.
该案可追溯到2013年,当时基列和默克(Merck)相互起诉,声称拥有基列毒品活性成分Sofosbuvir的实验室工作。
The case dates back to 2012 when Gilead and Merck sued each other, claiming ownership of laboratory work underlying sofosbuvir, the active ingredient in Gilead's drugs.
该案可追溯到2012年,当时基列和默克(Merck)相互起诉,声称拥有基列毒品活性成分Sofosbuvir的实验室工作。
The case dates back to 2014 when Gilead and Merck sued each other, claiming ownership of laboratory work underlying sofosbuvir, the active ingredient in Gilead's drugs.
该案可追溯到2014年,当时基列和默克(Merck)相互起诉,声称拥有基列毒品活性成分Sofosbuvir的实验室工作。
The case dates back to 2013 when Gilead and Merck sued each other, claiming title of laboratory work underlying sofosbuvir, the active ingredient in Gilead's drugs.
该案可追溯到2013年,当时,基列和默克(Merck)相互起诉,称其实验室工作是基列毒品的活性成分Sofosbuvir(sofosbuvir)的基础。
The case dates back to 2013 when Gilead and Merck sued each other, claiming control of laboratory work underlying sofosbuvir, the active ingredient in Gilead's drugs.
该案可追溯到2013年,当时,基列和默克(Merck)相互起诉,声称他们控制了基列毒品中活性成分Sofosbuvir(sofosbuvir)的实验室工作。
The case dates back to 2013 when Gilead and Merck sued each other, claiming copyright of laboratory work underlying sofosbuvir, the active ingredient in Gilead's drugs.
该案可追溯到2013年,当时,基列和默克(Merck)相互起诉,声称拥有基列毒品活性成分Sofosbuvir(sofosbuvir)的实验室工作的版权。

U. S. backed forces say they have seized full control of Dabij from Islamic State
美国支持势力说,他们已经从伊斯兰国手中夺取了对Dabij的全部控制权
U. S.-backed forces have seized full control of northern city of Manbij near the Turkish border after the last remaining Islamic State fighters inside the city left, a spokesman for the group said on Friday.
该团体的发言人上周五说,在土耳其边境附近的北部城市曼比吉最后一批伊斯兰国家战士离开后,美国支持的部队已经控制了该城。

They had freed over 2, 000 civilian hostages who had been held by the militants, Sharfan Darwish of the SDF allied Manbij Military Council told Reuters.

克林顿在2015年挣了1 075万美元,联邦税率为34.2%
Clintons earned $ 10. 75 billion in 2015, paid 34. 2 percent federal tax rate
克林顿在2015年挣了10.75亿美元,联邦税率为34.2%
Hillary Clinton on Friday released her 2015 tax returns, which showed the Democratic presidential nominee and her husband had $ 10. 75 million in income that year and paid an effective federal tax rate of 34. 2 percent.
希拉里克林顿上周五公布了她2015年的纳税申报表,数据显示民主党总统候选人及其丈夫当年的收入为1 075万美元,并缴纳了34.2%的联邦有效税率。

In 2015, the Clintons made $ 1 million in charitable contributions, mostly to the Clinton Foundation ; former President Bill Clinton brought in nearly $ 5. 3 million in speaking fees ; and the former secretary of state reported income of $ 3 million from publisher Simon & Schuster for her book on her tenure at the State Department.

It is customary for U. S. presidential candidates to make their tax returns public, although they are not required by law to do so.

It is routine for U. S. presidential candidates to make their tax returns public, although they are not required by law to do so.
美国总统候选人公布他们的纳税申报是例行公事,尽管法律没有要求他们这样做。
It is compulsory for U. S. presidential candidates to make their tax returns public, although they are not required by law to do so.
美国总统候选人必须公开他们的纳税申报表,尽管法律没有要求他们这样做。
Trump, a New York businessman, and his lawyers have cited an audit by the Internal Revenue Service as a reason for his refusal to release his returns.
特朗普(Trump)和他的律师援引了美国国税局(Internal Registration Service)的一次审计,作为他拒绝释放其回报的理由。

" My move, " Clinton campaign aide Ian Sams said on Twitter, linking to the Democratic nominee's returns.
“我的举动,”克林顿竞选助手伊恩·萨姆斯在Twitter上说,与民主党提名人的回归有关。
" Our move, " Clinton campaign aide Ian Sams said on Twitter, linking to the Democratic nominee's returns.
克林顿竞选助手伊恩·萨姆斯在Twitter上说,“我们的行动”与民主党提名人的回归有关。
On Thursday, Trump's special counsel, Michael Cohen, told CNN he would not allow Trump to release them until the audits are complete.
星期四,特朗普的特别顾问迈克尔·科恩(Michael Cohen)告诉CNN,在审计完成之前,他不会让特朗普释放他们。
On Wednesday, Trump's special counsel, Michael Cohen, told CNN he would not allow Trump to release them until the audits are complete.
科恩(Michael Cohen)周三对CNN说,在审计完成之前,他不会允许特朗普释放他们。
On Monday, Trump's special counsel, Michael Cohen, told CNN he would not allow Trump to release them until the audits are complete.
科恩(Michael Cohen)周一对CNN说,在审计完成之前,他不会让特朗普释放他们。
On Friday, Trump's special counsel, Michael Cohen, told CNN he would not allow Trump to release them until the audits are complete.
上周五,特朗普的特别顾问迈克尔·科恩(Michael Cohen)告诉CNN,在审计完成之前,他不会让特朗普释放他们。
On Tuesday, Trump's special counsel, Michael Cohen, told CNN he would not allow Trump to release them until the audits are complete.
周二,特朗普的特别顾问迈克尔·科恩(Michael Cohen)告诉CNN,在审计完成之前,他不会允许特朗普释放他们。
On July, Trump's special counsel, Michael Cohen, told CNN he would not allow Trump to release them until the audits are complete.
7月,特朗普的特别顾问迈克尔·科恩(Michael Cohen)告诉CNN,在审计完成之前,他不会让特朗普释放他们。
Trump's critics, including 2012 Republican presidential candidate Mitt Romney and other fellow Republicans, have said his refusal raises questions about his net worth, his charitable contributions, his business dealings and various other ties, including with Russia.
特朗普的批评者,包括2012年共和党总统候选人米特·罗姆尼(Mitt Romney)和其他共和党人,都表示,他的拒绝引发了人们对其净资产、慈善捐款、商业交易以及包括俄罗斯在内的各种其它联系的质疑。
Trump's critics, including 2012 Republican presidential candidate Mitt Romney and other fellow Republicans, have said his refusal raises questions about his net worth, his charitable contributions, his business dealings and various other connections, including with Russia.
特朗普的批评者,包括2012年共和党总统候选人米特·罗姆尼(Mitt Romney)和其他共和党人,都表示,他的拒绝引起了人们对他的净价值、他的慈善捐款、他的商业交易以及包括俄罗斯在内的各种其它联系的质疑。
Trump's critics, including 2012 Republican presidential candidate Mitt Romney and many fellow Republicans, have said his refusal raises questions about his net worth, his charitable contributions, his business dealings and various other ties, including with Russia.

Trump's critics, including 2012 Republican presidential candidate Mitt Romney and some fellow Republicans, have said his refusal raises questions about his net worth, his charitable contributions, his business dealings and various other ties, including with Russia.

Trump's critics, including 2012 Republican presidential candidate Mitt Romney and several fellow Republicans, have said his refusal raises questions about his net worth, his charitable contributions, his business dealings and various other ties, including with Russia.
特朗普的批评者,包括2012年共和党总统候选人米特·罗姆尼(Mitt Romney)和一些共和党同僚都表示,他的拒绝引发了人们对其净资产、慈善捐款、商业交易以及包括俄罗斯在内的各种其它联系的质疑。
Clinton has pounced on the issue, releasing an online video on Friday highlighting high-profile Republicans urging Trump to release his taxes.

“他拒绝做其他总统候选人数十年来所做的一切,并公开他的纳税数字,”她告诉民众。
Politico has reported that Trump paid zero to very little taxes for two years in the 1990s, and a New York Times business columnist on Friday quoted a number of tax lawyers and accountants saying that could still be the case.

Clinton has endorsed a rule named after billionaire investor Warren Buffett that would ensure those making more than $ 1 million a year pay a tax rate of at least 30 percent.

Clinton has endorsed a rule named after billionaire investor Warren Buffett that would guarantee those making more than $ 1 million a year pay a tax rate of at least 30 percent.

犹太电影制片人抨击柏林酒店取消以色列拨号后的阿拉伯"-RT新闻"要求

Jewish filmmaker slams Berlin hotel for cutting Israel dial code after Arab " request "-RT News
犹太电影制片人抨击柏林酒店在以色列“阿拉伯”要求“RT新闻”之后删除了以色列拨号代码
Jewish filmmaker slams Berlin hotel for forcing Israel dial code after Arab " request "-RT News
犹太电影制片人抨击柏林酒店强迫以色列按阿拉伯要求拨号“RT新闻”
A French filmmaker of Jewish origin unleashed a media furor after he revealed that the Kempinski Bristol hotel in Berlin does not list Israel's dial code, with employee citing " requests " from Arabic customers.
一位来自犹太人的法国电影制片人透露,柏林的Kempinski Bristol酒店没有列出以色列的拨号代码,而员工则引用阿拉伯客户的“请求”,这引发了媒体的愤怒。
A French filmmaker of Jewish origin unleashed a media furor after he revealed that the Kempinski Bristol hotel in Berlin does not list Israeli's dial code, with employee citing " requests " from Arabic customers.
一位来自犹太人的法国电影制片人透露,柏林的Kempinski Bristol酒店没有列出以色列的拨号代码,而员工则引用阿拉伯客户的“请求”,这引发了媒体的愤怒。
A French filmmaker of Jewish origin unleashed a media furor after he revealed that the Kempinski Bristol hotel in Berlin does not listed Israel's dial code, with employee citing " requests " from Arabic customers.
一位来自犹太人的法国电影制片人透露,柏林的Kempinski Bristol酒店没有列出以色列的拨号密码,而员工则引用阿拉伯客户的“请求”,这引发了媒体的愤怒。
A French filmmaker of Jewish origin unleashed a media furor after he revealed that the Kempinski Bristol hotel in Berlin does not give Israel's dial code, with employee citing " requests " from Arabic customers.
一位来自犹太人的法国电影制片人透露,柏林的Kempinski Bristol酒店没有给以色列拨号代码,而员工引用了阿拉伯客户的“请求”,这引发了媒体的愤怒。
A French filmmaker of Jewish origin unleashed a media furor after he revealed that the Kempinski Bristol hotel in Berlin does not listing Israel's dial code, with employee citing " requests " from Arabic customers.
一位来自犹太人的法国电影制片人透露,柏林的Kempinski Bristol酒店没有列出以色列的拨号代码,而员工引用了阿拉伯客户的“请求”,这引发了媒体的愤怒。
A French filmmaker of Jewish origin unleashed a media furor after he revealed that the Kempinski Bristol hotel in Berlin does not provide Israel's dial code, with employee citing " requests " from Arabic customers.
一位来自犹太人的法国电影制片人透露,柏林的Kempinski Bristol酒店没有提供以色列的拨号代码,他向员工援引阿拉伯客户的“请求”,这引发了媒体的愤怒。
Claude Lanzmann, an author of Holocaust documentary " Shoah, " vented his frustration at the Kempinski Bristol Hotel in Berlin, writing an open letter in the German outlet FAZ.
大屠杀纪录片《纳粹浩劫》的作者克劳德·兰兹曼在柏林Kempinski Bristol酒店发泄了他的不满情绪,在德国FAZ出口处写了一封公开信。
Claude Lanzmann, an author of Holocaust documentary " Shoah, " vented his frustration at the Kempinski Bristol hotel in Berlin, writing an open letter in the German outlet FAZ.
大屠杀纪录片《纳粹浩劫》的作者克劳德·兰茨曼在柏林的肯宾斯基布里斯托尔酒店发泄了他的不满情绪,他在德国FAZ出口处写了一封公开信。
Claude Lanzmann, an author of Holocaust documentary " Shoah, " vented his frustration at the Kempinski Bristol Hotel in Berlin, writing an open letter in the German outlet FZ.
大屠杀纪录片《纳粹浩劫》的作者克劳德·兰兹曼在柏林Kempinski Bristol酒店发泄了他的不满情绪,他在德国FZ餐厅写了一封公开信。
During his recent stay, Lanzmann tried to find Israel in the list of dial codes provided by the hotel.
在他最近的逗留期间,兰兹曼试图在酒店提供的拨号密码中找到以色列。

在上次逗留期间,Lanzmann试图在酒店提供的拨号单上找到以色列。

在他最后一次逗留期间,兰兹曼试图在酒店提供的拨号密码中找到以色列。

在他晚间逗留期间,兰兹曼试图在酒店提供的拨号单上找到以色列。

The hotel itself was quick to brush off any accusations, calling what happened an " oversight " and " apologizing " to Lanzmann, Der Spiegel reports.
据皮盖尔公司报道,酒店自己也迅速排除了任何指责,称所发生的事是“疏忽”,是对兰兹曼的“道歉”。
The hotel itself was quick to shrug off any accusations, calling what happened an " oversight " and " apologizing " to Lanzmann, Der Spiegel reports.
皮盖尔(DerSpiegel)的报导称,酒店自己也立刻耸了耸肩,不理会任何指责,称所发生的事是“疏忽”,是对兰兹曼的“道歉”。
The hotel itself was quick to toss off any accusations, calling what happened an " oversight " and " apologizing " to Lanzmann, Der Spiegel reports.
皮盖尔(DerSpiegel)的报导称,酒店本身也迅速放弃了任何指责,称所发生的事是“疏忽”,是对兰兹曼的“道歉”。
The hotel itself was quick to brush off any accusations, describing what happened an " oversight " and " apologizing " to Lanzmann, Der Spiegel reports.

韩说,事发前,他和流浪者魏宗东城区一条小巷内,两条小巷相距只有20米。
Han said that on the current day of the crime, the two were asked to drink alcohol. And the two had two disputes during and after meal.

On August 12, reporters was informed that the Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics and the Winter Paralympic Organizing Committee issued a notice that the Beijing Winter Olympic Organizing Committee inherited the emblem and signs of Beijing Olympic Winter Olympics for commercial purposes.
8月12日,记者获悉,2022年北京冬季奥运会和残奥会冬季组织委员会发出通知,表示北京冬季奥运会组织委员会继承了北京冬季奥运会的徽章和标志,用于商业目的。
Without the permission of the Beijing Winter Olympic Organizing Committee, no one shall use the emblem and signs of Beijing Olympic Winter Games for commercial purposes.
未经北京冬季奥运会组织委员会许可,任何人不得将北京冬季奥运会的徽章和标志用于商务目的。

中国采取坚决、有效的措施解决产能过剩问题,结果逐步改善。
China has taken resolute and effective measures to resolve excess capacity, and the results are gradually evident.
中国已采取坚决、有效的措施解决产能过剩问题, 其结果已逐渐显现.
The official pointed out that the CPC Central Committee and State Council should attach great importance to the global problem of iron and steel overcapacity.
官员指出,中共中央和国务院应高度重视全球钢铁产能过剩问题。
The official pointed out that the CPC Central Committee and State Commission should attach great importance to the global problem of iron and steel overcapacity.
官员指出,中共中央和国务委员会应高度重视全球钢铁产能过剩问题。
The official pointed out that the CPC Central Committee and State Secretariat should attach great importance to the global problem of iron and steel overcapacity.
官员指出,中共中央和国务院应高度重视全球钢铁产能过剩问题。
The official pointed out that the CPC Central Committee and State Committee should attach great importance to the global problem of iron and steel overcapacity.
官员指出,中共中央和国务委员会应高度重视全球钢铁产能过剩问题。
The official pointed out that the CPC Central Committee and State Conference should attach great importance to the global problem of iron and steel overcapacity.
官员指出,中共中央和国务会议应高度重视全球钢铁产能过剩问题。
The official pointed out that the CPC Central Committee and State Bureau should attach great importance to the global problem of iron and steel overcapacity.
官员指出,中共中央和国务局应高度重视全球钢铁产能过剩问题。
All departments and regions should actively implement the deployment of the State Council, earnestly carry out the work, and reduce crude steel production capacity by 45 million tons this year.
各部门、各地区要积极部署国务院,认真落实,今年粗钢生产能力减少4500万吨。
All departments and regions should actively implement the deployment of the State Council, earnestly carry out the work, and reduce crude steel production capacity by 70 million tons this year.
各部门、各地区要积极部署国务院,认真做好,今年的粗钢生产能力要减少7000万吨。
All departments and regions should actively implement the deployment of the State Council, earnestly carry out the work, and reduce crude steel production capacity by 40 million tons this year.
各部门、各地区要积极部署国务院,认真做好,今年的粗钢生产能力要减少4000万吨。
All departments and regions should actively implement the deployment of the State Council, earnestly carry out the work, and reduce crude steel production capacity by 35 million tons this year.
各部门、各地区要积极部署国务院,认真做好,今年粗钢生产能力减少3500万吨。
All departments and regions should actively implement the deployment of the State Council, earnestly carry out the work, and reduce crude steel production capacity by 50 million tons this year.
各部门、各地区要积极部署国务院,认真做好,今年的粗钢生产能力要减少5000万吨。
All departments and regions should actively implement the deployment of the State Council, earnestly carry out the work, and reduce crude steel production capacity by 18 million tons this year.
各部门、各地区要积极部署国务院,认真做好,今年粗钢生产能力减少1800万吨。
From China's national conditions, China does not encourage steel exports. On the contrary, it also takes a series of practical measures to control steel exports.
从中国国情看,中国不鼓励钢铁出口,而是采取一系列切实措施控制钢铁出口。
From China's national conditions, China does not encourage steel exports. On the contrary, it also takes a series of practical measures to limit steel exports.
从中国国情来看,中国不鼓励钢铁出口,而是采取一系列切实措施限制钢铁出口。
From China's national conditions, China does not encourage steel exports. On the contrary, it also takes a series of practical measures to restrict steel exports.
从中国国情来看,中国不鼓励钢铁出口,而是采取一系列切实措施限制钢铁出口。
From China's national conditions, China does not encourage steel exports. On the contrary, it also takes a series of practical measures to prevent steel exports.
根据中国国情,中国不鼓励钢铁出口,反之,中国采取一系列切实可行的措施来防止钢铁出口。
From China's national conditions, China does not encourage steel exports. On the contrary, it also takes a series of practical measures to regulate steel exports.
从中国国情来看,中国不鼓励钢铁出口,而是采取一系列切实措施对钢铁出口进行规范。
From China's national conditions, China does not promote steel exports. On the contrary, it also takes a series of practical measures to control steel exports.
根据中国国情,中国不促进钢铁出口,而是采取一系列切实措施控制钢铁出口。
The person in charge stressed that the international trade of iron and steel products is essentially a market behavior and an independent choice from the requirement of importing countries and after considering the product cost and other factors.
负责人强调,钢铁产品的国际贸易本质上是一种市场行为,是独立于进口国的要求和在考虑产品成本及其他因素之后作出的选择。
The person in charge stressed that the international trade of iron and steel products is basically a market behavior and an independent choice from the requirement of importing countries and after considering the product cost and other factors.
负责人强调,钢铁产品的国际贸易基本上是一种市场行为,是独立于进口国的要求和在考虑产品成本及其他因素后作出的选择。
The person in charge stressed that the international trade of iron and steel products is essentially a market behavior and an independent choice from the requirement of importing countries and after considering the product costs and other factors.
负责人强调,钢铁产品的国际贸易本质上是一种市场行为,是独立于进口国的要求和在考虑产品成本及其他因素之后作出的选择。
The implementation of trade protection measures does not help to fundamentally solve the global steel industry development issues. On the contrary, it will only cause further impact on the international trade order.
实施贸易保护措施无助于从根本上解决全球钢铁行业发展问题,相反,只会对国际贸易秩序产生进一步的影响。
The implementation of trade protection measures does not help to fundamentally solve the global steel industry development problems. On the contrary, it will only cause further impact on the international trade order.
实施贸易保护措施无助于从根本上解决全球钢铁行业发展问题,只会对国际贸易秩序产生进一步的影响。
The implementation of trade protection measures does not help to fundamentally solve the global steel industry development issue. On the contrary, it will only cause further impact on the international trade order.
实施贸易保护措施无助于从根本上解决全球钢铁行业发展问题,只会对国际贸易秩序产生进一步的影响。
The implementation of trade protection measures does not help to fundamentally solve the global steel industry development problem. On the contrary, it will only cause further impact on the international trade order.
实施贸易保护措施无助于从根本上解决全球钢铁行业发展问题,只会对国际贸易秩序产生进一步的影响。
The implementation of trade protection measures does not help to fundamentally solve the global steel industry development crisis. On the contrary, it will only cause further impact on the international trade order.
实施贸易保护措施无助于从根本上解决全球钢铁行业发展危机,只会对国际贸易秩序产生进一步的影响。
The implementation of trade protection measures does not help to fundamentally solve the global steel industry development issues. On the contrary, it will only cause further impact on the global trade order.
实施贸易保护措施无助于从根本上解决全球钢铁行业发展问题,相反,只会对全球贸易秩序产生进一步的影响。
When it comes to debt, the person in charge stressed that the resolution of the debt problem is to properly handle the important issues that need proper handling.
在 债务 方面, 负责 的 人 强调, 解决 债务 问题 的 办法 是 适当 处理 需要 适当 处理 的 重要 问题 。

When it comes to debt, the person in charge stressed that the resolution of the debt problem is to properly handle the important issue that need proper handling.

When it comes to debt, the person in charge stressed that the resolution of the debt problem is to properly handle the important issues that need proper handle.
在 债务 方面, 负责 的 人 强调, 解决 债务 问题 的 办法 是 正确 处理 需要 适当 处理 的 重要 问题 。
As the iron and steel enterprises are large-scale and involve a wide range of enterprises, the debt relationship is complex. It may lead to regional risks if disposed of improperly.
由于钢铁企业规模较大,涉及企业范围甚广,债务关系复杂,如果处置不当,可能导致区域风险。
As the iron and steel enterprises are large-scale and involve a wide range of enterprises, the debt relationship is complex. It can lead to regional risks if disposed of improperly.
由于钢铁企业规模大,涉及企业范围广,债务关系复杂,如果处置不当,会导致区域风险。
According to the person in charge, in recent years, with the economic downward pressure to increase, the total social demand gradually weakened, part of the industry capacity utilization decreased and enterprise production and management difficulties increased.
据负责人介绍,近年来,随着经济下行压力的加大,社会需求总量逐渐减弱,部分产业容量利用率下降,企业生产经营困难增加。
According to the person in charge, in recent years, with the economic downward pressure to increase, the total social demand gradually diminished, part of the industry capacity utilization decreased and enterprise production and management difficulties increased.

According to the person in charge, in recent years, with the economic downward pressure to increase, the total social demand gradually weakened, part of the industry capacity utilization reduced and enterprise production and management difficulties increased.

According to the person in charge, in recent years, with the economic downward pressure to increase, the total social demand gradually weakened, part of the industry capacity utilization diminished and enterprise production and management difficulties increased.
据负责人介绍,近年来,随着经济下行压力的加大,社会需求总量逐渐减弱,部分行业生产能力利用率下降,企业生产经营难度加大。
Some enterprises do not meet the changes in the market environment and the production and management is difficult to sustain or even on the brink of collapse. But restrained by some institutional factors, they become " zombie enterprises " due to many obstacles to the market.
有些 企业 无法 适应 市场 环境 的 变化, 生产 和 管理 很难 维持 甚至 处于 崩溃 的 边缘, 但 受到 一些 体制 因素 的 制约, 它们 由于 市场 的 许多 障碍 而 成为 “ 僵尸 企业 ” 。
Some enterprises do not meet the changes in the market environment and the production and management is difficult to sustain or even on the brink of collapse. But restrained by some institutional factors, they become " zombie enterprises " due to many barriers to the market.
有些企业没有适应市场环境的变化,生产与管理难以维持甚至处于崩溃的边缘,但由于一些体制因素的限制,它们由于市场障碍重重而成为“僵尸企业”。
Some enterprises do not meet the changes in the market environment and the production and management is difficult to sustain or even on the brink of collapse. But restrained by some institutional factors, they become " zombie enterprises " due to many challenges to the market.
有些企业没有适应市场环境的变化,生产与管理难以维持甚至处于崩溃的边缘,但由于受到一些体制因素的限制,它们由于市场面临许多挑战而成为"僵尸企业"。
Some enterprises do not meet the changes in the market environment and the production and management is difficult to sustain or even on the brink of collapse. But restrained by some institutional factors, they become " zombie enterprises " due to many difficulties to the market.
有些企业没有适应市场环境的变化,生产和经营难以维持甚至处于崩溃的边缘,但由于一些体制因素的制约,由于市场困难重重,它们成了“僵尸企业”。
Some enterprises do not meet the changes in the market environment and the production and management is difficult to sustain or even on the brink of collapse. But restrained by some institutional factors, they become " ghost enterprises " due to many obstacles to the market.
有些 企业 无法 适应 市场 环境 的 变化, 生产 和 管理 很难 维持 甚至 处于 崩溃 的 边缘, 但 受到 一些 体制 因素 的 制约, 它们 由于 市场 的 许多 障碍 而 成为 “ 幽灵 企业 ” 。
Some enterprises do not meet the changes in the market environment and the production and management is difficult to sustain or even on the brink of bankruptcy. But restrained by some institutional factors, they become " zombie enterprises " due to many obstacles to the market.
有些 企业 没有 适应 市场 环境 的 变化, 生产 和 管理 很难 维持, 甚至 处于 破产 的 边缘, 但是 受到 一些 体制 因素 的 制约, 它们 由于 市场 的 许多 障碍 而 成为 “ 僵尸 企业 ” 。
The existence of these companies distorted market signal, reduced the elements resources use efficiency, increased the cost of social management, thereby hindering the establishment of market environment with fair competition.
这些 公司 的 存在 扭曲 了 市场 信号, 降低 了 资源 使用 效率, 增加 了 社会 管理 的 费用, 从而 妨碍 了 公平 竞争 的 市场 环境 的 建立 。
The existence of these companies distorted market signal, reduced the elements resources use productivity, increased the cost of social management, thereby hindering the establishment of market environment with fair competition.
这些公司的存在扭曲了市场信号,降低了要素资源使用效率,提高了社会管理成本,从而阻碍了公平竞争的市场环境的建立。
The existence of these companies distorted market signal, reduced the elements resources use organization, increased the cost of social management, thereby hindering the establishment of market environment with fair competition.
这些公司的存在扭曲了市场信号,减少了要素资源使用组织,提高了社会管理的成本,从而阻碍了公平竞争的市场环境的建立。
The existence of these companies distorted market signal, reduced the elements resources use economy, increased the cost of social management, thereby hindering the establishment of market environment with fair competition.
这些公司的存在扭曲了市场信号,减少了要素资源使用经济,提高了社会管理成本,从而阻碍了公平竞争的市场环境的建立。
The main reason for the loss is the same as the dilemma faced by the global steel industry-weak market demand and low utilization rate.
损失的主要原因是全球钢铁行业市场需求疲软和使用率低的两难困境。
The main reasons for the loss is the same as the dilemma faced by the global steel industry-weak market demand and low utilization rate.
损失的主要原因是全球钢铁行业市场需求疲软和使用率低的两难困境。
The main reason for the loss is the same as the dilemma facing by the global steel industry-weak market demand and low utilization rate.
损失的主要原因是全球钢铁行业市场需求疲软和使用率低的两难困境。
China mainly adopts the market mechanism, economic means and the rule of law. The government is mainly to do the work of disclosing the ins and outs to workers and social stability, to ensure fair and equitable market order.
中国主要实行市场机制、经济手段和法治,主要从事对劳动者和社会稳定进行披露,确保公平合理的市场秩序。
China mainly adopts the market mechanism, economic means and the law of law. The government is mainly to do the work of disclosing the ins and outs to workers and social stability, to ensure fair and equitable market order.
中国主要采用市场机制、经济手段和法律等法律,主要从事对劳动者和社会稳定进行披露,确保公平合理的市场秩序。
China mainly adopts the market mechanism, economic means and the rule of law. The government is mainly to do the work of disclosing the ins and outs to workers and economic stability, to ensure fair and equitable market order.
中国主要实行市场机制、经济手段和法治,主要从事向劳动者披露进出情况、实现经济稳定等工作,确保公平合理的市场秩序。
China mainly adopts the market mechanism, economic means and the rule of law. The government is mainly to do the work of disclosing the ins and outs to workers and social balance, to ensure fair and equitable market order.
中国主要实行市场机制、经济手段和法治,主要从事向劳动者披露和披露情况、实现社会平衡等工作,确保公平合理的市场秩序。
China mainly adopts the market mechanism, economic means and the rule of law. The government is mainly to do the work of disclosing the ins and outs to workers and social equilibrium, to ensure fair and equitable market order.
中国主要采用市场机制、经济手段和法治,主要从事向劳动者披露进出情况、实现社会均衡等工作,确保公平合理的市场秩序。
China mainly adopts the market mechanism, economic means and the rule of law. The government is mainly to do the work of disclosing the ins and outs to workers and social prosperity, to ensure fair and equitable market order.
中国主要实行市场机制、经济手段和法治,主要从事对劳动者和社会繁荣进行披露,确保公平合理的市场秩序。
The person in charge stressed that the next step is to do a good job to ensure overcapacity cutting and ensuring the objective of resolving 100 million tons-150 million tons of crude steel production capacity within five years.
负责人强调,下一步是做好工作,确保产能过剩,确保5年内解决1亿吨1.5亿吨粗钢生产能力问题。

In the afternoon of the 10th day of the month, the appearance of Chinese tourist police in the Red Square in Moscow immediately drew people's attention. Chinese tourists waved with surprise, and the local people and foreign tourists cannot help but to stop looking back.
本月10日下午,中国旅游警察在莫斯科红火广场的出现,引起了人们的注意,中国游客惊讶地挥手致意,当地人和外国游客忍不住要回头看一看。
In the evening of the 10th day of the month, the appearance of Chinese tourist police in the Red Square in Moscow immediately drew people's attention. Chinese tourists waved with surprise, and the local people and foreign tourists cannot help but to stop looking back.
本月十日晚上,中国旅游警察在莫斯科红火广场的出现,立即引起了人们的注意,中国游客惊讶地挥手致意,当地人和外国游客忍不住要回头看一看。
Moscow travel police are divided into three groups for duty patrol in the Red Square, Nicolieski pedestrian street and Gu Mu Department Store. The Chinese tourist police also followed for study. The whole process lasted more than an hour.
莫斯科旅游警察分为红场、尼科利斯基人行道和古木百货公司三组值班巡逻,中国旅游警察也跟踪考察,整个过程持续了一个多小时。
Moscow travel police are divided into three groups for duty patrol in the Red Square, Nicolieski pedestrian street and Gu Mu Department Store. The Chinese tourist police also followed for study. The whole process lasted more than a hour.
莫斯科旅游警察分为红场、尼科利斯基人行道和古木百货公司三组值班巡逻,中国旅游警察也跟踪考察,整个过程持续了一个多小时。
Moscow travel police are divided into three groups for duty patrol in the Red Square, Nicolieski pedestrian street and Gu Mu Department Store. The Chinese tourist police also followed for study. The whole process lasted more than the hour.
莫斯科旅游警察分为三组,在红场、尼科利斯基人行道和古木百货商店进行值班巡逻。中国旅游警察也一直跟踪考察。整个过程持续时间超过一小时。
Moscow travel police are divided into three groups for duty patrol in the Red Square, Nicolieski pedestrian street and Gu Mu Department Store. The Chinese tourist police also followed for study. The whole process lasted more than of hour.
莫斯科旅游警察分为红场、尼科利斯基人行道和古木百货公司三组值班巡逻,中国旅游警察也跟踪考察。整个过程持续了多小时。
Moscow travel police are divided into three groups for duty patrol in the Red Square, Nicolieski pedestrian street and Gu Mu Department Store. The Chinese tourist police also followed for study. The whole process lasted more than in hour.
莫斯科旅游警察分为红场、尼科利斯基人行道和古木百货公司三组值班巡逻,中国旅游警察也跟踪考察,整个过程持续时间超过一小时。
Moscow travel police are divided into three groups for duty patrol in the Red Square, Nicolieski pedestrian street and Gu Tu Department Store. The Chinese tourist police also followed for study. The whole process lasted more than an hour.

Chinanews journalist found that there are at least nine provinces and cities issuing rules for the implementation of residence permit, including Hebei, Jilin, Tianjin, Jiangxi, Sichuan, Hainan, Gansu, Fujian and Beijing, etc.
中国新闻记者发现,河北、吉林、天津、江西、四川、海南、甘肃、福建、北京等至少9个省市颁发了居留证实施细则。
Chinanews journalist found that there are at least nine province and cities issuing rules for the implementation of residence permit, including Hebei, Jilin, Tianjin, Jiangxi, Sichuan, Hainan, Gansu, Fujian and Beijing, etc.
中国新闻记者发现,河北、吉林、天津、江西、四川、海南、甘肃、福建、北京等省、市至少9个发放居留证。
For the conditions of applying for residence permit, the above regions generally said that the applicants need to live more than six months and meet one of these three requirements : having legitimate and stable employment, having legal and stable residence and continuous study.
在申请居留证的条件方面,上述地区一般说,申请人需要生活六个月以上,并符合这三项要求中的一项要求:合法和稳定就业,合法和稳定居住,不断学习。
For the conditions of applying for residence permit, the above regions generally said that the applicants need to live more than six weeks and meet one of these three requirements : having legitimate and stable employment, having legal and stable residence and continuous study.
在申请居留证的条件方面,上述地区一般都规定,申请人需住满六周以上,并符合以下三项要求之一:合法和稳定就业,合法和稳定居住,以及持续学习。
For the conditions of applying for residence permit, the above regions generally said that the applicants need to live more than six years and meet one of these three requirements : having legitimate and stable employment, having legal and stable residence and continuous study.
在申请居留证的条件方面,上述地区一般都规定,申请人需生活六年以上,并符合以下三项要求之一:合法和稳定就业,合法和稳定居住,不断学习。
For the conditions of applying for residence permit, the above regions generally said that the applicants need to live more than six month and meet one of these three requirements : having legitimate and stable employment, having legal and stable residence and continuous study.
在申请居留证的条件方面,上述地区一般都规定,申请人需生活六个月以上,并符合以下三项要求之一:合法稳定就业,合法稳定居住,不断学习。
For the conditions of applying for residence permit, the above regions generally said that the applicants need to live more than six months and meet one of these three requirements : having legitimate and stable employment, having legal and stable residency and continuous study.
在申请居留证的条件方面,上述地区一般说,申请者需要生活六个月以上,并符合这三项要求中的一项要求:合法和稳定就业,合法和稳定居住,以及持续学习。
For the conditions of applying for residence permit, the above regions generally said that the applicants need to live more than six months and meet a of these three requirements : having legitimate and stable employment, having legal and stable residence and continuous study.
在申请居留证的条件方面,上述地区一般说,申请人需要生活六个月以上,并符合以下三项要求之一:合法和稳定就业,合法和稳定居住,不断学习。
Chinanews journalist noted that in the aspect of residence permit providing treatment, the " gold content " is different in various cities. Compared with the national provisions, some areas have provided more public services and conveniences.
中国新闻记者指出,在居留证发放方面,不同城市的“黄金含量”存在差异,与国内规定相比,一些地区的公共服务和方便性都有所增加。

这些地区提高了儿童在满足相关要求的同时参加本地高考的便利性。

In addition, it is clearly proposed by Beijing and other places that they will gradually expand the scope of public services and convenience, and regularly release to the community.
此外,北京等地也明确提出逐步扩大公共服务范围、便利性,并定期向社会开放。

" Residence Permit Provisional Regulations " provides that, for those in line with the residence permit conditions, the public security organs shall issue a residence permit within 15 days from the date of acceptance.
《居留证暂行条例》规定,对于符合居留证条件的,公安机关应当自接受之日起15日内颁发居留证。
" Residence Permit Provisional Regulations " provides that, for those in line with the residence permit conditions, the public security organs shall issue a residence permit within 10 days from the date of acceptance.
《居留证暂行条例》规定,对于符合居留证条件的,公安机关应当自接受之日起10日内颁发居留证。
" Residence Permit Provisional Regulations " provides that, for those in line with the residence permit conditions, the public security organs shall issue a residence permit within 14 days from the date of acceptance.
《居留证暂行条例》规定,对于符合居留证条件的,公安机关应当自接受之日起14日内颁发居留证。
" Residence Permit Provisional Regulations " provides that, for those in line with the residence permit conditions, the public security organs shall issue a residence permit within 20 days from the date of acceptance.
《居留证暂行条例》规定,对于符合居留证条件的,公安机关应当自接受之日起20日内颁发居留证。
" Residence Permit Provisional Regulations " provides that, for those in line with the residence permit conditions, the public security organs shall issue a residence permit within 30 days from the date of acceptance.
《居留证暂行条例》规定,对于符合居留证条件的,公安机关应当自接受之日起30日内颁发居留证。
" Residence Permit Provisional Regulations " provides that, for those in line with the residence permit conditions, the public security organs shall issue a residence permit within 60 days from the date of acceptance.
《居留证暂行条例》规定,对于符合居留证条件的,公安机关应当自接受之日起60日内颁发居留证。
For the time limit, most of the region hold the same opinion with the national version. That is, to release the permit within 15 days.
在限期内,大部分地区对国内版本持相同看法,即在15天内发放许可证。

Hebei clearly stipulates that for applicants who meet the conditions of application and have complete application documents, the residence police station shall issue a residence permit within 3 working days from the date of acceptance.
河北省明确规定,对符合申请条件并持有完整申请文件的申请人,户籍警察局应当自受理之日起3个工作日内颁发居留证。
Hebei clearly stipulates that for applicants who meet the conditions of application and have completed application documents, the residence police station shall issue a residence permit within 3 working days from the date of acceptance.
河北省明确规定,符合申请条件并填妥申请文件的申请人,户籍警察局应当自受理之日起3个工作日内颁发居留证。
Hebei clearly stipulates that for applicants who meet the conditions of application and have complete application documents, the residence police station shall issue a residence permits within 3 working days from the date of acceptance.
河北省明确规定,对于符合申请条件并持有完整申请文件的申请人,户籍警察局应当自受理之日起3个工作日内颁发居留证。
Hebei clearly stipulates that for applicants who meet the conditions of application and have complete application documents, the residence police station shall issue a residence permit within 3 working days from the date of application.

Jiangxi clearly stipulates that for applicants who meet the conditions of application and have complete application documents, the public security shall issue a residence permit within 5 working days from the date of acceptance.
江西省明确规定,符合申请条件并持有完整申请文件的申请人,应当自受理之日起五个工作日内领取居留证。

In accordance with the " residence permit provisional regulations ", the above cities stipulate clearly that the cost of certificate production shall be exempted in case of initial application of residence permit.

根据《居留证暂行准则》,上述城市明确规定,在首次申请居留证的情况下,应免缴证书制作费用。
For example, Sichuan required the local police stations or commissioned community service agencies shall strictly enforce the approved fees and charges standard and resolutely prohibit over-range, over-standard fees or ride fees.
例如,四川要求当地派出所或委托社区服务机构严格执行核定收费标准,坚决禁止超额、超标准收费或乘坐费。
For example, Sichuan required the local police stations or commissioned community service agencies shall strictly enforce the specified fees and charges standard and resolutely prohibit over-range, over-standard fees or ride fees.
例如,四川要求当地派出所或委托社区服务机构严格执行规定的收费标准,坚决禁止超额、超标准收费或乘坐费。
For example, Sichuan required the local police stations or commissioned community service agencies shall strictly enforce the authorized fees and charges standard and resolutely prohibit over-range, over-standard fees or ride fees.
例如,四川要求当地派出所或委托社区服务机构严格执行授权收费标准,坚决禁止超额收费、超额收费或乘坐费。
For example, Sichuan required the local police stations or commissioned community service agencies shall strictly enforce the established fees and charges standard and resolutely prohibit over-range, over-standard fees or ride fees.
例如,四川要求当地派出所或委托社区服务机构严格执行规定的收费标准,坚决禁止超额、超标准收费或乘坐费。
For example, Sichuan required the local police stations or commissioned community service agencies shall strictly enforce the proposed fees and charges standard and resolutely prohibit over-range, over-standard fees or ride fees.
例如,四川要求当地派出所或委托社区服务机构严格执行拟议收费标准,坚决禁止超额、超标准收费或乘坐费。
For example, Sichuan mandated the local police stations or commissioned community service agencies shall strictly enforce the approved fees and charges standard and resolutely prohibit over-range, over-standard fees or ride fees.
例如,四川市派出所或者社区服务机构应当严格实施经批准的收费标准,坚决禁止超额收费、超额收费或者乘坐费。
It was found that on July 27, 2016, Chen Yangxia, the former Ganzhou City Dingnan County Party Secretary came to the Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection for reporting and serving as director of the CPC supervision room ( deputy director-general, one year's probation period ).
据悉,2016年7月27日,前甘州市定南县委书记陈扬霞来到省纪律检查委员会报到,担任中国共产党监事室主任(副主任,缓刑期一年)。

Jiangxi Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection informed that Chen Yangxia and Cheng Ziliang, who organized and accepted dining invitation in private clubs, violated the spirit of the central eight provisions and the Party's discipline.
江西省纪律检查委员会通报说,陈阳霞和成志良在私人俱乐部组织并接受了用餐邀请,违反了党的八大核心规定和纪律。
Jiangxi Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection informed that Chen Yangxia and Cheng Ziliang, who organized and accepted dining invitation in private clubs, violated the spirit of the central eight regulations and the Party's discipline.
江西省纪律检查委员会通报说,陈阳霞和成志良在私人俱乐部组织并接受了用餐邀请,这违反了党的八大规程和党的纪律。
Jiangxi Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection informed that Chen Yangxia and Cheng Ziliang, who organized and accepted dining invitation in private clubs, violated the spirit of the central eight guidelines and the Party's discipline.
江西省纪律检查委员会通报说,陈阳霞和成志良在私人俱乐部组织并接受了用餐邀请,违反了党的八大方针和纪律。
Jiangxi Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection informed that Chen Yangxia and Cheng Ziliang, who organized and accepted dining invitation in private clubs, violated the spirit of the central eight rules and the Party's discipline.
江西省纪律检查委员会通报说,陈阳霞和成志良在私人俱乐部组织并接受了用餐邀请,这违反了党的八大规则精神和党的纪律。
Jiangxi Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection informed that Chen Yangxia and Cheng Ziliang, who organized and accepted dining invitation in private clubs, violated the spirit of the central eight norms and the Party's discipline.
江西省纪律检查委员会通报说,陈阳霞和成志良在私人俱乐部组织并接受了用餐邀请,这违反了党的八大核心准则和纪律精神。
Jiangxi Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection informed that Chen Yangxia and Cheng Ziliang, who organized and accepted dining invitation in private clubs, violated the spirit of the central eight statutes and the Party's discipline.
江西省纪律检查委员会通报说,陈阳霞和成志良在私人俱乐部组织并接受了用餐邀请,违反了党的八大章程和纪律。

Portland smelter's future in doubt with axing of power contract
波特兰冶炼厂的未来受到电力合同的质疑
Portland smelter's future in question with axing of power contract
波特兰冶炼厂的未来与电力合同的轴向有关
Portland smelter's future in uncertainty with axing of power contract
波特兰冶炼厂未来在电力合同交错中的不确定性
Portland smelter's future in doubt with axing of Power contract
波特兰冶炼厂的未来受到电力合同的质疑
Portland smelter's future in doubt with axing of power deal
波特兰冶炼厂的未来受到电力交易的质疑
The future of the Portland aluminium smelter in Victoria-and the jobs of hundreds of workers-is in doubt with the power company which supplies the plant disclosing one of the plant's owners is to terminate a supply contract, with all supply contracts expected to be axed.
位于维多利亚州的波特兰铝厂的未来以及数百名工人的就业情况,与向工厂提供披露工厂业主之一的工厂的电力公司存在疑问,该公司将终止一项供应合同,所有供应合同预计将被取消。
The future of the Portland aluminium smelter in Victoria-and the jobs of thousands of workers-is in doubt with the power company which supplies the plant disclosing one of the plant's owners is to terminate a supply contract, with all supply contracts expected to be axed.
位于维多利亚州的波特兰铝厂的未来以及数千名工人的就业情况,与向工厂提供披露工厂业主之一的工厂的电力公司存在疑问,该公司将终止一项供应合同,预计将取消所有供应合同。
The future of the Portland aluminium smelter in Victoria-and the jobs of Hundreds of workers-is in doubt with the power company which supplies the plant disclosing one of the plant's owners is to terminate a supply contract, with all supply contracts expected to be axed.
位于维多利亚州的波特兰铝厂的未来以及数百名工人的就业情况,与向工厂提供披露工厂业主之一的工厂的电力公司存在疑问,该公司将终止供应合同,所有供应合同预计将被取消。
The future of the Portland aluminium smelter in Victoria-and the jobs of families of workers-is in doubt with the power company which supplies the plant disclosing one of the plant's owners is to terminate a supply contract, with all supply contracts expected to be axed.
维多利亚州波特兰铝厂的未来以及工人家庭的工作,与向工厂提供披露工厂业主之一的工厂的电力公司存在疑问,该公司将终止供应合同,所有供应合同预计将被取消。
The move follows the decision of the Victoria government earlier this year to not extend subsidies provided to keep the plant in operation.
此前,维多利亚州政府今年早些时候决定不再向该工厂提供维持运行所需的补贴。
The move followed the decision of the Victoria government earlier this year to not extend subsidies provided to keep the plant in operation.

The move reversed the decision of the Victoria government earlier this year to not extend subsidies provided to keep the plant in operation.

这些变化是在对电厂未来多年的猜测之后发生的,最初是在澳大利亚元走强之后,而最近又由于电厂的产量价格而发生。
AGL, which supplies the big aluminium smelter with electricity from its Loy Yang A power plant in the Latrobe Valley, said it expects the other three owners will also move to terminate their agreements.
Latrobe Valley的Loy Yang A电厂为大型铝厂供电,该公司表示,预计其他3家铝厂的厂主也将终止其协议。

Analysts have been wary of the possible closure of both of the Portland smelter in Victoria and also the Tomago plant near Newcastle due to the poor economics of the industry.

Addressing analysts earlier in the week, AGL's head of operations, Stephen Mikkelsen said Portland uses around 600 megawatts of power annually and Tomago around 900 megawatts.
默克尔森(Stephen Mikkelsen)表示,波特兰的电力年使用量约为600兆瓦,而托马戈的电力年使用量约为900兆瓦。

More than 160, 000 of the nation's most vulnerable are turned away from community legal centres every year, with the sector bracing itself for the impact further funding cuts will have on already-stretched operations.
每年有160,000多位最脆弱的国家从社区法律中心转向社区法律中心,该部门随时准备进一步削减资金将对已经捉襟见肘的行动产生何种影响。
More than 160, 000 of the nation's most vulnerable are turned away from community legal centres every year, with the sector bracing itself for the impact further funding cuts will have on already-strained operations.
每年,超过160,000个最脆弱的国家从社区法律中心转向社区法律中心,该部门随时准备进一步削减资金将对已经紧张的业务产生影响。

In Queensland, three out of five people-mostly the elderly, immigrants, vulnerable workers, victims of violence and those without resources to fight unfair evictions and the like-are already turned away while seeking free legal advice and representation.
在昆士兰,五分之三的人 -- -- 主要是老年人、移民、弱势工人、暴力受害者和那些没有资源与不公平的驱逐行为作斗争的人 -- -- 已经在寻求免费法律咨询和代理的同时拒绝了他们。

The federal government will cut funding by 30 per cent from June 2017, which means thousands more vulnerable Queenslanders will be forced to navigate complex legal problems without help.
联邦政府将从2017年6月起将资金削减30%,这意味着昆士兰地区数以千计的弱势民众将被迫在没有帮助的情况下解决复杂的法律问题。

Expansion is an opportunity to create up to 180, 000 new jobs, £211bn in economic growth, leaving a legacy of skills and employment both around the airport and across the UK.
扩张是创造多达180,000个新就业机会的机会,经济增长为2110亿英镑,在机场和英国各地留下大量技能和就业机会。

We have a great team at Heathrow who have implemented an £11bn programme of infrastructure investment on time and on budget, from T5-voted the world's best airport terminal five years in a row, to T2, built in the middle of the world's busiest two runways.
在希思罗,我们有一个伟大的团队,他们及时和预算地实施了110亿英镑的基础设施投资计划,从连续5年以T5票当选的全球最佳机场终点站,到在全球最繁忙的两条跑道中间建造的T2。

报纸说,在每起事故中,都涉及到一个人在黑暗中在高速公路上行走,结果决定,司机不可能在午夜在高速公路上遇到行人。
In each case-both of which involved a person walking on the motorway in the dark-it was found that motorists cannot expect to come across a pedestrian on the motorway in the middle of the night, said the paper.
报纸说,在每起事故中,都有一个人在黑暗中在高速公路上行走,结果发现,司机不可能在午夜在高速公路上遇到行人。

去年,一名警官在2014年8月晚上殴打并杀害了一名躺在Paynerne附近A1号船上的男子后,因疏忽致人死亡而被无罪释放。

去年,一名警官因过失杀人而被宣布无罪,因为她于2014年8月晚上殴打并杀害了一名躺在Paynerne附近A1号船上的男子。

The court found that the policewoman-- who was responding to an emergency call-- was driving in a manner that was justified and that the presence of a man on the road was a " completely exceptional and extraordinary situation, " the judge said.

The court found that the policewoman-- who was responding to an emergency call-- was driving in a manner that was justified and that the presence of a man on the road was a " completely exceptional and unprecedented situation, " the judge said.

NASA climate model : Venus was once habitable
美国宇航局气候模型:金星曾适宜居住
NASA Climate model : Venus was once habitable
美国宇航局气候模型:金星曾适宜居住
NASA warming model : Venus was once habitable
美国宇航局变暖模型:金星曾适宜居住
Venus was likely once habitable, according to the projections of a new NASA climate model.
根据美国宇航局新的气候模型的预测,金星可能曾经适宜居住。
Venus was likely once habitable, according to the projections of a new spacecraft climate model.
根据新的航天器气候模型的预测, 金星可能曾经适宜居住.
Venus was likely once habitable, according to the projections of a new Mars climate model.
根据新的火星气候模型的预测,金星可能曾经适宜居住。

根据美国宇航局新的气候模型的预测,可能曾经适宜居住。
the was likely once habitable, according to the projections of a new NASA climate model.
根据美国宇航局新的气候模型的预测,这种气候可能曾经适宜居住。
to was likely once habitable, according to the projections of a new NASA climate model.
根据美国宇航局新的气候模型的预测,可能曾经适宜居住。
and was likely once habitable, according to the projections of a new NASA climate model.
根据美国宇航局新的气候模型的预测,可能曾经适宜居住过。
of was likely once habitable, according to the projections of a new NASA climate model.
根据美国宇航局新的气候模型的预测,可能曾经适宜居住。
Scientists at NASA's Goddard Institute for Space Studies developed a model to explore Venus'past using tools and algorithms similar to those employed by climate scientists.
美国宇航局戈达德空间研究所的科学家开发了一个模型,利用类似于气候科学家使用的工具和算法来探索金星的历程。
Scientists at NASA's Goddard Institute for Space Studies developed a model to explore Venus'history using tools and algorithms similar to those employed by climate scientists.
美国航空航天局戈达德空间研究所的科学家开发了一个模型,利用类似于气候科学家使用的工具和算法来探索金星的历史。
Scientists at NASA's Goddard Institute for Space Studies developed a model to explore Venus'past using techniques and algorithms similar to those employed by climate scientists.
美国宇航局戈达德空间研究所的科学家开发了一个模型,利用类似于气候科学家所采用的技术和算法来探索金星的历程。
Scientists at NASA's Goddard Institute for Space Studies developed a model to explore Venus'past using methods and algorithms similar to those employed by climate scientists.
美国航空航天局戈达德空间研究所的科学家开发了一个模型,利用与气候科学家使用的方法和算法相似的方法和算法来探索金星的历程。
The model was designed to determine whether or not Venus, with its hot, water-less surface and CO2-chocked atmosphere, might have once hosted Earth-like conditions.
该模型旨在确定金星是否具有其热、无水的表面和二氧化碳充斥的大气层,是否曾经承载过类似于地球的条件。
The model was designed to determine whether or not Venus, with its hot, water-less surface and CO₂2-chocked atmosphere, might have once hosted Earth-like conditions.
该模型旨在确定金星的热度、无水表层和二氧化碳充斥的大气层是否曾经承载过类似于地球的条件。
The model was designed to determine whether or not Venus, with its hot, water-less surface and carbon2-chocked atmosphere, might have once hosted Earth-like conditions.
该模型旨在确定金星的热度、无水表层和二氧化碳排放的大气层是否曾经承载过类似于地球的条件。
The model was designed to determine whether or not Venus, with its hot, water-less surface and c2-chocked atmosphere, might have once hosted Earth-like conditions.
该模型旨在确定金星是否曾存在过类似于地球的条件,其表面是热、无水和C2-chocked大气的。
The model was designed to determine whether or not Venus, with its hot, water-less surface and C2-chocked atmosphere, might have once hosted Earth-like conditions.
该模型旨在确定金星的热度、无水表层和C2-chocked大气是否曾经承载过类似于地球的条件。
The model was designed to determine whether or not Venus, with its hot, water-less surface and CO2-chocked atmosphere, might have once hosted Earth-like environments.
该模型旨在确定金星的热度、无水表层和二氧化碳充斥的大气层是否曾经承载过类似于地球的环境。
Scientists have previously suggested that Venus'slow rotation rate is explained by its thick atmosphere.
科学家以前曾建议,金星的缓慢旋转速度是由它的厚厚的大气层来解释的.
Scientists have previous suggested that Venus'slow rotation rate is explained by its thick atmosphere.
科学家以前曾暗示,金星的缓慢旋转速度是由它的厚厚的大气层来解释的.
Scientists have earlier suggested that Venus'slow rotation rate is explained by its thick atmosphere.
科学家早些时候提出,金星的缓慢旋转速度是由它的厚厚的大气层来解释的.
Scientists have already suggested that Venus'slow rotation rate is explained by its thick atmosphere.
科学家已经暗示,金星的缓慢旋转速度是由它的厚厚的大气层来解释的.
Scientists have also suggested that Venus'slow rotation rate is explained by its thick atmosphere.
科学家还提出,金星的缓慢旋转速度是由它的厚厚的大气层来解释的.
Scientists have long suggested that Venus'slow rotation rate is explained by its thick atmosphere.
科学家长期以来一直认为,金星的缓慢旋转速度是由它的厚厚的大气层来解释的.
But the latest simulation suggests Venus could have boasted a thin, Earth-like atmosphere and still spun slowly.
但最近的模拟表明,金星本可以自豪地拥有一个像地球一样的薄薄的大气层,并且仍然缓慢地旋转。
But the latest simulation suggests Venus could have boasted a thin, Earth-like atmosphere and still spun rapidly.
但最近的模拟表明,金星本可以自豪地拥有一个像地球一样的薄薄的大气层,但仍能快速旋转。
But the latest simulation suggests Venus could have boasted a thin, Earth-like atmosphere and still spun fast.
但最近的模拟表明,金星本可以自豪地拥有一个像地球一样的薄薄的大气层,并且仍然快速旋转。
But the latest simulation suggests Venus could have boasted a thin, Earth-like atmosphere and still spun quickly.
但最近的模拟表明,金星本可以自豪地拥有一个像地球一样的薄薄的大气层,但仍能快速旋转。
But the latest simulation suggests Venus could have boasted a thin, Earth-like atmosphere and still spun slow.
但最近的模拟表明,金星本可以自豪地拥有一个薄薄的、像地球一样的大气层,并且仍然缓慢地旋转。
But the latest simulation suggests Venus could have boasted a thin, Earth-like atmosphere and still spun slower.

金星虽然可能曾经适宜居住,但是在数十亿年的时间里,它暴露在过多的热量和紫外线下。
Though likely once habitable, Venus was-- during the course of several billion years-- exposed to too much heat and ultraviolet light.
虽然金星可能曾经适宜居住,但是在数十亿年中,金星暴露在过多的热量和紫外线下。
Its oceans evaporated and its water vapor was burned away by ultraviolet light.
它的海洋蒸发了,它的水蒸气被紫外线烧掉了.
the oceans evaporated and its water vapor was burned away by ultraviolet light.
海洋蒸发了,海水蒸发了紫外线。
to oceans evaporated and its water vapor was burned away by ultraviolet light.
海洋蒸发,水蒸气被紫外线烧掉。
of oceans evaporated and its water vapor was burned away by ultraviolet light.
海洋蒸发,其水蒸气被紫外线烧掉。
and oceans evaporated and its water vapor was burned away by ultraviolet light.
海洋蒸发,水蒸气被紫外线烧掉。
Its oceans evaporated and its water vapor was burnt away by ultraviolet light.
它的海洋蒸发了,它的水蒸气被紫外线烧掉了.
As its hydrogen escaped, all that was left was a thick atmosphere of carbon dioxide with a deathly greenhouse gas effect-- thus, the Venus we know today.
当它的氢气消失时,剩下的是浓厚的二氧化碳气味和致命的温室气体效应——因此,我们今日所认识的金星。
As its hydrogen escaped, all that was left was a thick atmosphere of carbon dioxide with a deathly greenhouse gas effect-- thus, the Venus we remember today.
当它的氢气消失时,剩下的只是浓厚的二氧化碳气味和致命的温室气体效应——因此,我们今日所记得的金星。

Researchers shared the results of their new Venus climate model in the journal Geophysical Research Letters.
研究人员在《地球物理学研究通讯》杂志上分享了他们新的金星气候模型的结果。

the Roy resigns as Avalanche coach

Patrick Roy resigned as coach and vice president of the hockey operations of the Colorado Avalanche on Thursday, citing a lack of a voice within the team's decision-making process.
罗伊(Patrick Roy)于本周四辞去科罗拉多阿瓦兰切曲棍球队(Colorado Avalanche)曲棍球队(Coorado Avalanche)的教练兼副总裁一职,理由是在球队的决策过程中缺乏发言权。
Patrick Roy resigned as coach and vice president of the hockey operations of the Colorado Avalanche on Friday, citing a lack of a voice within the team's decision-making process.

North Sea oil Workers resume talks, suspend strike
北海石油工人恢复谈判,停止罢工
North sea oil workers resume talks, suspend strike
北海石油工人恢复谈判,停止罢工
Labor strikes over pay for North Sea oil workers are suspended while all parties to the dispute sit down for a new round of talks, lead negotiators said.
首席谈判代表表示,北海石油业工人工资罢工被暂停,而争端各方都坐下来参加新一轮会谈。
Labor strikes over pay for North Sea oil workers are suspended while all parties to the dispute sit down for a fresh round of talks, lead negotiators said.
首席谈判代表表示,北海石油业工人工资罢工被暂停,而所有争议各方都坐下来进行新一轮谈判。
Labor strikes over pay for North Sea oil workers are suspended while all parties to the dispute sit down for a renewed round of talks, lead negotiators said.
首席谈判代表表示,北海石油业工人工资罢工暂时停止,而所有争议各方都坐下来进行新的一轮会谈。
Labor strikes over pay for North Sea oil workers are suspended while all parties to the dispute sit down for a reopened round of talks, lead negotiators said.
首席谈判代表表示,北海石油业工人工资罢工被暂停,而所有争议各方都坐下来重新展开一轮谈判。
Strikes against oilfield services company Wood Group have been staged sporadically on platforms in the North Sea operated by Royal Dutch Shell.
荷兰皇家壳牌公司(Royal Dutch Shell)在北海的平台上零星地对油田服务公司伍德集团(Wood Group)发动罢工。

The latest mission by the Kepler space telescope has helped astronomers collect the most complete catalog of spin rates among the stars of the Pleiades cluster.

" We hope that by comparing our results to other star clusters, we will learn more about the relationship between a star's mass, its age, and even the history of its solar system, " Luisa Rebull, a research scientist at Caltech's Infrared Processing and Analysis Center in Pasadena, said in a news release.
我们希望,通过将我们的结果与其他星群进行比较,我们可以更多地了解一颗恒星的质量、其年龄、甚至其太阳系的历史之间的关系。
" We hope that by comparing our results to other star clusters, we will discover more about the relationship between a star's mass, its age, and even the history of its solar system, " Luisa Rebull, a research scientist at Caltech's Infrared Processing and Analysis Center in Pasadena, said in a news release.
我们希望,通过将我们的结果与其他星群进行比较,我们会发现更多关于恒星质量、星龄、甚至太阳系历史之间的关系,”位于帕萨迪纳的加州理工学院红外处理和分析中心的科学家露易莎·瑞布尔在一份新闻稿中说。
" We hope that by comparing our results to other star clusters, we will find more about the relationship between a star's mass, its age, and even the history of its solar system, " Luisa Rebull, a research scientist at Caltech's Infrared Processing and Analysis Center in Pasadena, said in a news release.

Kepler measures each star's spin rate by tracking the time between the appearance of recognizable starspots-- like sunspots.
开普勒通过跟踪可识别的恒星黑子出现之间的时间来测量每个恒星的自旋速率,就像太阳黑子一样。

The latest catalog of spin rates suggests more massive stars spin more slowly than less massive stars.
最新的自旋速率目录表明,比起较少的恒星,更多的恒星的自旋速度要慢。

" In the'ballet'of the Pleiades, we see that slow rotators tend to be more massive, whereas the fastest rotators tend to be very light stars, " said Rebull.
在星的'ballet中,我们看到慢转子的体积比较大,而最快转子的体积则比较轻。

但是,在社区购买停车位的几家业主担心这会影响他们的停车位的价格,并怀疑其他人自私自利,所以他们一直在策划糟糕的事情,这使停车位的变换被搁置了。
" but, several owners who bought the parking spaces in the community feared that this would affect the price of their parking spaces and doubted that others were selfish, so they had been plotting for bad things. This had shelved the parking space transformation. "
但是,在社区购买停车位的几家业主担心这会影响他们的停车位的价格,并怀疑其他人自私自利,所以他们一直在策划糟糕的事情,这使停车位的变换被搁置了。
" and, several owners who bought the parking spaces in the community feared that this would affect the price of their parking spaces and doubted that others were selfish, so they had been plotting for bad things. This had shelved the parking space transformation. "
“而且,在社区购买停车位的几家业主担心这会影响他们的停车位的价格,并怀疑其他人自私自利,所以他们一直在策划糟糕的事情,这使停车位的变换被搁置了。”
" of, several owners who bought the parking spaces in the community feared that this would affect the price of their parking spaces and doubted that others were selfish, so they had been plotting for bad things. This had shelved the parking space transformation. "
“在社区购买停车位的几家业主担心这会影响他们的停车位价格,并怀疑其他人自私自利,所以他们一直在策划糟糕的事情,这使停车位的变换被搁置了。”

在目前的主流观点中,引入红薯主要有三条线。

On August 11, this is the last day for the open sale of Everbright Securities H shares. News went that the market response was not special for market of the previous two days. According to the plan, it will be listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange on August 18.
8月11日是公开出售Everbright Securities H股的最后一天。新闻指出,股市的反应对前两天的市场并非特别。根据该计划,该公司将于8月18日在香港证券交易所上市。

In addition to Suzhou, other second-tier cities including Hefei and Nanjing will also introduce the property market regulation and control policies.
除苏州市外,合肥、南京等二线城市也将引入房地产市场监管政策。
In addition to Suzhou, other second-tier cities including Hefei and Nanjing will be introduce the property market regulation and control policies.
除苏州市外,合肥、南京等二线城市也将实行房地产市场调控政策。
In addition to Suzhou, other second-tier cities including Hefei and Nanjing will also introduce the property market regulation and regulation policies.
除苏州市外,合肥、南京等二线城市也将引入房地产市场监管政策。
Prior to this, Hefei has been the first to issue restrictions on lending policy. For people who have two suites in Hefei and have one housing loan not paid, they will be denied with the mortgage services from bank.
在此之前,合肥是第一个发布贷款限制政策的人。对于那些在合肥有两套房和一栋住房贷款没有支付的人,银行会拒绝给他们抵押贷款服务。
